story:
What's it about?
We seek to bring 80's ATCC content to the PC race sim "Asetto Corsa".
Join our community and help bring Australian touring cars of the 80's to your favorite race sim.
Funded by our 80'sATTC Community and others in the Assetto Corsa community.
Once fully funded and completed, this vehicle will be made available to all for FREE.

Our first project is the iconic "Dick Johnson "Tru-Blu" XD Ford Falcon 1980"

What We Need & What You Get

Primarily we need funds to obtain relevant 3D models of a vehicle and donate to modders who bring the models into the game. Already a 3d model of "Tru-Blu" has been purchased and a modder commissioned.

What You Get
Depending on the perk chosen, you get the vehicle, early access and livery options.

Thank you for your time, safe fast laps for all.

Be sure to visit our Facebook Community and Youtube channel for more info.

https://www.facebook.com/80s-ATCC-102138397808415

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC21Y6rha6d4gFG...

story:
"This game has been greenlit by the community" - STEAM

"Check Out The Chosen for a Game Demo Not to Miss" - MIXAMO

"I'm proud to be a part of such a unique project." - D.C. Douglas

"It’s an impressive project" - Alpha Beta Gamer


The Chosen is a game about freedom. Freedom to choose your own path and influence the destiny of the entire Galactic Comunity.

About a year ago, I got the idea for The Chosen, and I immediately knew it could be something huge. So I started work on the cinematic trailer. Once that was finished, and I saw the reactions of the people I showed it to, I decided to take the year off from college and started working on The Chosen full time. About 2 months later, the demo was finished.

With YOUR help, The Chosen has the potential to become the most massive and immersive open-world online game there is!

The Chosen will feature 6 different playable RACES:

You can read more about each one HERE.
Each race will have it's own ships, and aside from capital ships, each class can be shared between races:

Read more about the various ship classes here.

Voice Chat With NPCs - This feature will allow you to interact with many NPCs by talking to them using your microphone. (playable in the demo)

Persistent Universe - Meaning that your actions have consequences, and they will determine your alignment in the game. But just like in real life, nothing is set in stone.

Advanced Combat - You will be able to implement advanced combat tactics, like boarding parties, for example. Send your friends to the enemy ship and take it over, or destroy it from the inside.

Custom ship interiors - You can modify the layout of your ships when in dry-dock (ie. placing each room and module, and even "decorate" the rooms).

Democracy vs Dictatorship - When you find a new inhabited planet you will have a choice: you can open diplomatic relations with the planet and get access to their resources, remain neutral or you can try to enslave the planet. If you succeed in enslaving them you will get access to their resources and tech, but your ships will be prone to sabotage and you will have to quell any uprisings. Enslaved planets CAN be liberated by other players.

Mining - There are 2 types of mining: asteroid mining, and planetary mining. Players can build bases on planets and buy or build massive mobile drilling platforms to help them mine the resources they need for various builds and research. Take care when transporting your resources to your base, others may take advantage and attack you, if you are not protected.

Bases - You will be able to build a base on any inhabitable planet you find, if you have the right amount of resources and the necessary credits.

Terraforming - Some planets are just not inhabitable, but thanks to the technologies developed by R&D companies that no longer stops you. You'll be able to terraform most planets, except gas giants, or planets that are already inhabited.

And the list goes on. Check out the full list of features here: LIST OF FEATURES.

And you can read more about the game and all of it's elements here: ABOUT


Download Windows Version (click here)

Just download and run the installer.
If you don't wish to install the demo, you can still see part of it in the gameplay video.

Download LINUX Version (click here)

1. Download the archive and un-zip to the desired location.
2. In the game folder, find "The Chosen.x86" file.
3. Right click it and select Properties.
4. Tick the "allow execution" box.
5. Run the game.

Download MAC Version (click here)

Here you can download the latest build of the MAC version of The Chosen Demo.
Unfortunately, I currently have no way of checking MAC builds, so I cannot promise maximum quality and/or performance for the MAC build at this time.

If you would like to become a MAC build tester, please contact us via the Contact Us form.

Please note that the campaign has a FIXED FUNDING goal.

Make sure to take advantage of the Early Bird Basic Pack! It's a limited offer.

The budget was carefully calculated to include everything needed to complete production of Phase One (What is Phase One? Read about it in Risks and Challenges):

One year after the end of a successful campaign you will get Phase One of the best and the biggest indie open-world MMORPG to ever hit the virtual shelves!

Every single following update and expansion will be FREE!

You might be thinking "There's no way the goal will cover a full MMO". And you would be right. Partially. A full fledged MMORPG would cost about a million in production costs and years to make. One method I found to bring costs down is to use as many pre-made assets as possible. There is so much amazing 3D content available out there, that it would be a shame to ignore it. This method takes thousands of dollars off the development budget, while supporting the freelance artists that created the amazing assets.

I want to give you a fully playable game as soon as possible and as cheap as possible. That is why I decided to break down the game into Phases. But don't worry, once you buy the game in Phase One you will NEVER have to buy an update or expansion pack ever again. They will all be free!

What is Phase One?

Phase One will be the base on which the rest of the game will be built. It will be fully playable, but, depending on the amount raised here, some features (from the full list) may or may not be available at the beginning, but rest assured that they will be added in time.
This is a game that will NEVER stop growing! From ships to planets and characters, new content will be added on an almost monthly basis.

NO PROBLEM!

Help us by spreading the word about The Chosen and this campaign! Use the share tools on this page, and:
  1. Like our Facebook page
  2. Follow The Chosen on Twitter
  3. Vote for the demo on Steam Greenlight
  4. And you can share all our links on your Facebook page: Links List

Remember, the more people that know about it, the higher the chances of success!

story:
Who We Are

Seeing as you are here, you probably either love paintball or want to try it. We want to make a new experience in paintball, where you select one of four factions, and join the game immediately. 

This is a much different approach than almost any park yet in existence, which split up groups to go to many maps, where new players must wait for a game to start. We will have one large map, in which are several start points, captured by each faction. When your faction captures a point, joining players may start there, and which faction has what points are logged everyday at closing, deciding start points the next day. The game ends when only one faction remains or all remaining factions agree on the beginning of a new game. Each faction's victories are posted, and rewards are given to the faction with the most wins after every tournament period of six months.

  • The map itself will consist of an approximately 20 acre swath of wooded land (see image) wooded with light trees, and has been freshly logged, leaving debris giving the air of the Apocalypse. In the heart of the map will be a settlement town of small buildings, set up after the collapse of society. This will be a major battleground, as the town will contain four of the capture points. Each faction will begin in a corner of the map, equal distances from the town. other capture points will be scattered throughout the wooded area. 


What We Need

The above is a preliminary breakdown and estimation of our $116,000 budget. As we understand this is a very large goal, we have taken a fair amount of time working  it in detail. The majority of the money is going towards the building of the town, due to the high cost of wood.


Another large chunk of the budget is the property (See above picture) more property details are available here.

About 15% of the budget is devoted to the purchase of 50 sets of paintball supplies such as: 

  • Tippmann A5 Paintball Markers
  • HPA Tanks 
  • HPA Compressor
  • Starting Paintballs
Two very small sums are set aside for the purchase of insurance and the formation of an LLC for legal matters.
A very small amount is being set aside for small unforeseen costs, taxes, and fees under the category "In Case of Emergency".

What You Get


The Impact

Any donation, no matter the amount, is important to us. Even the smallest donation helps us along on our goals, and we want to thank even the smallest of donations.

 We hope you will feel as strongly about this project as us and wish you the best.

Risks & Challenges

  1. If our chosen property is bought out, we have several potential back-up properties.
  2. If you are dissatisfied with your experience, we will try our hardest accommodate your concerns.   

Other Ways You Can Help

You can help our business by spreading the word.  Telling family, friends, and random strangers will help us successfully fund this project. If you have any other suggestions, feel free to contact us.

story:
DOWNLOAD DEMO
                                          Free download for PC and Android


Introduction

My name is Chiara Russomanno,

I’m a cartoon designer and I have many friends who are keen on videogames. Some of them are very expert (in this matter), so I started a working party to create

original videogames.

                         

The Game

A village of Marshmallows is under threat by a terrible monster! Each day a magician named Ent, calls for the sacrifice of one of the marshmallows. One of these is sweet Lea who is chosen to be sacrificed. A lot of fear surrounds the marshmallows village.

But why does the monster always torment them?

What does he do with all the victims that are given to him?

What does a gummy bear do in a marshmallows village?

And above all: will clumsy Bob be able to save his beloved Lea?

The Challenges

Marshmallow Adventure is a challenge to your genius and speed. You will have to set traps, kill monsters, dodge ghosts, recover keys…

Lea will not be the only one in danger. How difficult will it be for a little marshmallow, slob such as Bob, to save her! Within the levels there will be other victims of the monster.

Will Bob be able to save them and to overcome new and unforeseen difficulties?

Puzzle or action?

Marshmallow Adventure is a platform game somewhere between puzzle and  adventure game, you can choose two approaches to pass from level to level. One is more fast and instinctive, where you will have to eliminate the monsters before they eliminate you.

The second approach is more difficult, where you will have to examine the environment to set traps and to drink potions in order to overcome the obstacles. It’s your choice!


PRESENTAZIONE                   

Mi Chiamo Chiara Russomanno e ho 24 anni.

Lavoro nel settore dei cartoni animati. Ho creato un team di ragazzi appassionati e molto competenti che condividono il sogno di realizzare videogiochi originali.

 Questa campagna è relativa ad uno dei nostri progetti: Marshmallow Adventure.

È una sfida all’ingegno e alla velocità di chi gioca che dovrà attivare trappole, uccidere mostri, schivare fantasmi e recuperare chiavi.

Col tuo aiuto questo sogno può realizzarsi.


IL GIOCO

Il villaggio dei Marsh è oppresso da un terribile mostro! Ogni giorno Ent (il mago), estrae a sorte qualcuno da sacrificare… E stavolta è toccato alla piccola dolce Lea! Molti misteri circondano il villaggio.

Perché il mostro continua a tormentarli?                                                                               Cosa se ne fa di tutte le povere vittime che gli vengono sacrificate?                            Che ci fa un orsetto gommoso in un villaggio di marshmallow?                                         E soprattutto: riuscirà il goffo Bob a salvare la sua amata?


                                     


LE SFIDE

Marshmallow Adventure è una sfida al tuo ingegno e alla tua velocità: dovrai attivare trappole, uccidere mostri, schivare fantasmi, recuperare chiavi.... e Lea non sarà l’unica in pericolo.                                                                                                                     Quanta fatica per un Marsh piccolo e pasticcione! Disseminati fra i livelli ci saranno altre vittime del terribile mostro. Riuscirà Bob a liberarle? Riuscirà a superare le difficoltà che si presenteranno sempre nuove, inaspettate e imprevedibili?


     

PUZZLE O AZIONE?

Marshmallow Adventure è un platform a metà fra un puzzle game e un gioco di avventura, potrete scegliere due approcci per superare i livelli: uno più istintivo e veloce (dove dovrete eliminare i mostri prima che lo facciano loro!), e uno più impegnativo (dovrete esaminare l’ambiente per attivare trappole e bere pozioni che dissolvono gli ostacoli). A voi la scelta!


            



RICOMPENSE

Innanzitutto, con soli 5 € otterrete l’accesso anticipato a Marshmallow Adventure! Ciò significa che potrete provarlo in esclusiva molto prima dell’uscita ufficiale, e darci suggerimenti durante lo sviluppo.

5€ - SINGLE CANDY: Copia digitale del gioco

10€ - LOVE YOUR PIN: Copia digitale del gioco + set di spillette di Marshmallow Adventure   

20€ - ENIGMA: Copia digitale del gioco + set di spillette di Marshmallow Adventure  + un omaggio misterioso

25€ - LOVE YOUR SHIRT: Copia digitale del gioco + t-shirt

30€ - CHOOSE IT: Copia digitale del gioco + t-shirt (con scritta personalizzata)

40€ - ONE CHOICHE, ONE ENIGMA: Copia digitale del gioco + t-shirt (con scritta personalizzata) + set spille di Marshmallow Adventure!

50€ - BE MARSH: Copia digitale del gioco + set di spillette di Marshmallow Adventure + t-shirt + un disegno esclusivo, realizzato dai nostri artisti, che rappresenta te in versione Marsh

60€ - TASTY MARSH: Copia digitale del gioco + disegno di te in versione Marsh + super omaggio misterioso + set spille Marshmallow Adventure! 

80€ - TENTATION:  Copia digitale del gioco + sketch book di Marshmallow Adventure + disegno di te in versione Marsh

100€ - YOU’RE THE STAR: Copia digitale del gioco + sketchbook di Marshmallow Adventure + t-shirt + set di spillette di Marshmallow Adventure!

150€ - DELICACY: Copia digitale del gioco + t-shirt + set di spillette di Marshmallow Adventure + sketch book + disegno di te in versione Marsh + il tuo nome nei crediti del gioco

200€ - BOB’S BEST FRIEND: Copia digitale del gioco + t-shirt + set di spillette di Marshmallow Adventure + l’opportunità di diventare un Marsh che inseriremo nel gioco! + il tuo nome nei crediti

500€ - MASTER OF CANDY: Copia digitale del gioco + t-shirt + set di spillette di Marshmallow Adventure + disegno realizzato dai nostri artisti di te in versione Marsh + Sketch book + l’opportunità di realizzare un livello assieme al nostro team (eventuale trasferta non inclusa) + il tuo nome nei crediti del gioco + Super omaggio misterioso!

 

OBBIETTIVI

Fare un videogioco è veramente bellissimo ma anche costoso.
Fino ad ora abbiamo lavorato utilizzando tutte le nostre risorse, ma per
completarlo ci occorre il vostro aiuto. Più fondi riusciremo a raccogliere, più cose potremo aggiungere al gioco! E renderlo disponibile su più piattaforme possibili.


Questi sono gli obbiettivi:

 9.000 euro= START realizzazione del gioco per PC

14.000 euro= estensione del gioco ai dispositivi mobili

20.000 euro= aggiunta di molti livelli, inventario e
potenziamenti (la storia si complica)

30.000 euro= modalità multiplayer

dell’uscita ufficiale, e darci suggerimenti durante lo sviluppo.5€ - SINGLE CANDY: Copia digitale del gioco10€ - LOVE YOUR PIN: Copia digitale del gioco + set di spillette di Marshmallow Adventure    20€ - ENIGMA: Copia digitale del gioco + set di spillette di Marshmallow Adventure  + un omaggio misterioso 25€ - LOVE YOUR SHIRT: Copia digitale del gioco + t-shirt30€ - CHOOSE IT: Copia digitale del gioco + t-shirt (con scritta personalizzata)40€ - ONE CHOICHE, ONE ENIGMA: Copia digitale del gioco + t-shirt (con scritta personalizzata) + set spille di Marshmallow Adventure!50€ - BE MARSH: Copia digitale del gioco + set di spillette di Marshmallow Adventure + t-shirt + un disegno esclusivo, realizzato dai nostri artisti, che rappresenta te in versione Marsh60€ - TASTY MARSH: Copia digitale del gioco + disegno di te in versione Marsh + super omaggio misterioso + set spille Marshmallow Adventure!  80€ - TENTATION:  Copia digitale del gioco + sketch book di Marshmallow Adventure + disegno di te in versione Marsh100€ - YOU’RE THE STAR: Copia digitale del gioco + sketchbook di Marshmallow Adventure + t-shirt + set di spillette di Marshmallow Adventure! 150€ - DELICACY: Copia digitale del gioco + t-shirt + set di spillette di Marshmallow Adventure + sketch book + disegno di te in versione Marsh + il tuo nome nei crediti del gioco 200€ - BOB’S BEST FRIEND: Copia digitale del gioco + t-shirt + set di spillette di Marshmallow Adventure + l’opportunità di diventare un Marsh che inseriremo nel gioco! + il tuo nome nei crediti500€ - MASTER OF CANDY: Copia digitale del gioco + t-shirt + set di spillette di Marshmallow Adventure + disegno realizzato dai nostri artisti di te in versione Marsh + Sketch book + l’opportunità di realizzare un livello assieme al nostro team (eventuale trasferta non inclusa) + il tuo nome nei crediti del gioco + Super omaggio misterioso! OBBIETTIVIFare un videogioco è veramente bellissimo ma anche costoso.Fino ad ora abbiamo lavorato utilizzando tutte le nostre risorse, ma percompletarlo ci occorre il vostro aiuto. Più fondi riusciremo a raccogliere, più cose potremo aggiungere al gioco! E renderlo disponibile su più piattaforme possibili.  Questi sono gli obbiettivi: 9.000 euro= START realizzazione del gioco per PC14.000 euro= estensione del gioco ai dispositivi mobili20.000 euro= aggiunta di molti livelli, inventario epotenziamenti (la storia si complica)30.000 euro= modalità multiplayer

story:
Short Summary

Play online with 5-10 players as you attempt to complete your tasks, but be on the look out as one - two of your fellow agents may be the Sleeper Cell.

Agent Objectives:

  • Complete Tasks
  • Discover and eliminate the Sleeper Cell
  • Keep an eye on your fellow agents and watch for suspicious behavior
  • Report dead bodies and meet up to discuss suspicions
  • Call emergency meetings to discuss suspicious behavior

Sleeper Cell Objectives:

  • Elimitate your fellow agents
  • Pretend to complete your tasks to avoid suspicion
  • Sabotage the facility to create chaos and division in the agency

Features

  • Fully interactable Physics Environment
  • Physics Puzzle Tasks
  • In-Game VOIP Chat

What We Need & What You Get

While the base mechanics of the game are fully built and playable, this project is currently under development by a single developer, and to be completely transparent we need to hire a network developer to make sure the "multiplayer" component of the multiplayer game works as intended. With your support and funding we will be able to afford to hire on an experienced network developer that can make sure this game runs properly and you won't run into any issues once you're in and playing with your friends! 

What's in it for you? We want to get the community as involved with the development of this project as possible, that's why we have decided to make an early build of the game available to testing right now for immediate feedback and reactions as early on in development as possible. You can download the current demo here.

What if we don't reach our funding goal? This project is important to us and we will make sure to do as much with whatever we get to continue to make this project great and get it into your hands.

The Impact

With your support, we can make this project not only a reality, but we can make this great and make this the game we have all been waiting for.

With the recent success of games like "Among Us" many people have been looking forward to a similar style of game but for VR, and that is what we aim to accomplish with this project, an online murder mystery part game for VR!

Risks & Challenges

We are confident in our ability to make this project a reality. As you can tell from the currently playable demo  of the project our team has the ability to bring this project to life and with just a bit of your help we can really polish this project and make something great! Since we already have the major components of the project completed there is nearly zero risk involved in this project!

To maintain your trust and support, we will be giving the community a very important role in development! We are doing this by continuing to release alpha builds of the project to backers leading up to Early Access launch on Steam so we can continue to get your user feedback and improve the overall gameplay experience. 

Lastly, we will never delete comments or silence the voices of our community. The core of this project is community-driven and we never want to take that away from you. Not only do we want to use these platforms to communicate updates on development, but most importantly we want to be sure your voice is always heard.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't, or aren't yet comfortable backing this project, please share this project as it will really help us continue working on it!

story:
About Us

Established in 2016, the Pittsburgh Pawngrabbers are one of the original PRO Chess League teams, and stands to promote chess in Pittsburgh, while also supporting the development of chess as an esport. Entering our third season, we embrace our “underdog” reputation with one of the youngest teams in the league, backed by Grandmasters Alexander Shabalov and 15 year old American prodigy, Awonder Liang. This season, the Pawngrabbers look to with its first ever PRO Chess League title.

How You Can Help

Running the Pittsburgh Pawngrabbers is no easy project. Spearheaded by motivated college students with absolutely no external funding, the Pawngrabbers have consistently been one of the most socially active and innovative teams in the PRO Chess League, both on and off the board. While in past seasons our team has been able to offer competitive line-ups every week, the rapidly developing landscape of the PRO Chess League has made it imperative that our team receive external funding to continue matching the high level of results that our fans expect.

This season, our baseline goal is $2000 to cover our operational costs and help compensate our players. To help us reach this goal, the Pawngrabbers have prepared an exciting 2019 program - a stronger social media presence, regularly uploaded video and streaming content, a brand new rewards program for fans, and a website just for Pittsburgh Pawngrabber fans. While our players will be doing their best to win Pittsburgh's first ever PRO Chess League title, we'll be doing our best to support them, and just as importantly, you all - the fans!

Want to be involved? Every and any donation helps! We're really excited about what this season means for the development of the Pittsburgh Pawngrabbers, and we hope that you all will join us on our journey!

The Impact

While this campaign will only last for the duration of the 2019 PRO Chess League Season, the impact that this team will have on the Pittsburgh chess community will last for the far future. In just two years, our online presence has helped build more interest among scholastic players, and created new ways for chess players outside of Western Pennsylvania to become more connected with the Pittsburgh Chess Community

story:
“And now here is my secret, a very simple secret: It is only with the heart that one can see rightly; what is essential is invisible to the eye.” ― Antoine de Saint-Exupéry, The Little Prince

Did you happen to notice that our planet is polluted too fast? That many unique animals are just fading away? Can we do something to help our planet? The core idea of the PaperWorld - saving nature by playing game, since part of the game purchases goes to the Wildlife Protection Fund. Most animals species in the game are in the red list, or their population has decreased too much recently. And it may happen that only books will keep the memories of those animal kinds. Our planet is a fragile, very complex and beautiful world, where everything is related to everything. But tearing page after page from this piece of art, we are moving towards the final act, without thinking about the consequences. In fact, human being is not the author of this book of life, but introduces his own corrections, as a full-fledged master, rewriting the chapter after chapter. Our team hopes that various people playing our game will learn to feel the importance of nature.  

The goals of the game: taking care of animals, exploring location in which those animals live and learning the facts about the wild. The main message of the gameplay for adults is to get distracted from the everyday routine in which we forget that we are an important part of this world. The game does not require online connection or concentrated activities, just immerse yourself into ambient music, play with your favorite animals and relax.

So how do we play the PaperWorld? First we need to assemble an animal model from a sheet of paper. Most of us have assembled origami in our childhood and in the PaperWorld the process is not much more complex. We get the desired animal model by bending each piece at a certain angle. This way we get the animal part assembled. After all animal parts are ready the animal will come to life in a magical way.

 

Starting from this moment we continue to the core game mechanic - the location exploration. However we have not limited the player imagination. A player may put a polar bear into the savannah, or puma into the arctic environment. Nevertheless the game hints will teach and talk about what is habitual for an animal, where it lives and what it eats.

Hints and facts appear near the interactive zones, where different actions take place. The more carefully you explore the location, the more such facts you will find. Moreover different parts of the game world contain various mini games. There are four varieties of mini-games, but depending on the location and mini-game itself it has a unique look and various interesting facts. 

For example, you can run in the classic runner, avoiding obstacles on the river, while learning that grizzlies are very fond of fishing, since fish is rich in proteins, and grizzlies may often be found near ponds where fish is abundant.

Finding matches is an excellent game for training memory. Identify the matching cards, going through different difficulty levels. 

And if you wish to try some mini-game for a lucky then hidden treasure is the right game for you. Compete with a dexterous fox or fast jaguar, trying to find the hidden location treasures faster than the opponent. Of course, you can play this mini-game with any animal you like, but we would not recommend to play it with pumas or bears. 

Catch them all mini-game will teach you how to look after children. Those fumbles constantly strive to escape, but your mission is to pull them back into safe area much like a responsible family head would do.

Another interesting PaperWorld entertainment feature is augmented reality. The feature allows to view or take a shoot with an animal of your choice through your phone’s camera. 

Earn the care hearts, gather protection crystals, relax from the routine under calming music and do not forget that the world needs your care.

We believe that the community needs to know about this game in advance and we believe you would be inspired as much as we are. We have a lot of features that could be added to the game making it more interesting but we just cannot work on them because of a limited budget. The IndieGoGo may help us to build a great unique game that is interesting to play. If the project funding goes successfully, we would know that the community does love the game and its idea as much as we do.

IndieGoGo is an important place for us to grow our loyal community and this is the place we start gaining trust of the game industry and fans. Believe us we will not disappoint you!

This game inspires all of us a lot. The team has enough experience working in the gaming industry and we already see the pre-alpha version of the game looks visually great. We have specifically designed the PaperWorld as a low poly game as it looks similar to paper-crafted world. The low-poly objects are not so resource demanding especially for mobile devices. Yet this is a big challenge for us to fight for our auditory and bring the game to success, remove all bugs and improve performance and user experience. However we have enough time to complete the game and we do not rush to publish the game without careful and throughout testing and playing many hours until we are happy with it. Hence the challenge we see is shifting of deadlines and publishing the game later than we expect. We do believe the publishing will not lag too much from the initial release date and will not disappoint all of your supporters for sure.

There are no other major risks since the game is being actively developed on behalf of our team members although we cannot afford too much features with such a small team of us. Raising funds on IndieGoGo will help us to add more unique content and loveable features. We will also extend the gameplay so that everyone will not be disappointed. Each one of you will be also part of the game if you support it here on IndieGoGo.

We believe in the game industry and want to make the best games in the world. Don’t miss the chance to back the project and be the part of it! In case you cannot back the project for any reason then please spread the word about the campaign! Thank you all for your support!

story:
Short Summary

  • I'm Doug Kent, a game designer with a Master's in Game Design from American University.  This is my first commercial game and I have been working on this vigilantly for a little over a year.
  • Are You a Boat? has a rich story about believing in yourself and overcoming negative views of yourself.  I hope Are You a Boat? ends up being as fun for you to play as I enjoyed making it. 
  • By contributing to Are You a Boat? you will help bring this game to completion and support more great games in the future.

What We Need & What You Get

  • The funding will be going to the upkeep costs it took me to make the game.
  • By supporting this you get the 2D story driven paper platformer, Are You a Boat?
  • With the game being digital and basically completed, whoever contributes will get a copy of the game.

The Impact

  • Are You a Boat? tells a great story about overcoming people's preconceived notions and believing in yourself.  I hope that Are You a Boat? will help garnish positive vibes and thoughts.

Risks & Challenges

  • This is my first major game I have made.  Given the game is digital it should not be difficult releasing to anyone who contributes, however if there are any delays I will be fully transparent.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you are unable to contribute financially or platformers are not for you, tell your friends about Are You A Boat?.

story:
There's a playable demo available for the public! It's still in progress, but we want to share it with you and hear your thoughts. ✌ 
 

Please add Pocket Bravery to your Wishlist on STEAM. Make sure to check it out!

 

 

Pocket Bravery is an original fighting game, made completely hand drawn in pixel art, with a dynamic and responsive gameplay, focused on the characters’ animations with the aim to get fluidity during matches.

In this example, a single attack has 22 individual frames​ 

The game is inspired by classics from the 90s, such as Street Fighter, Fatal Fury and The King of Fighters. And its SD aesthetic was influence on games like Pocket Fighter and other fighting games from Neo Geo Pocket Color. 

But make no mistake, Pocket Bravery was created to be a new and unique fighting game, with original characters, vibrant colors an impressive combat system, designed with high-level players in mind. For beginners, we created a set of features that will teach them how to improve and evolve.

 

The game uses a digital pad and four buttons., two punches and two kicks. You can combine  directional inputs and buttons to execute traditional commands from fighting games such as specials, super specials or even Final Attacks.

 

 

Elemental System

Each character has an element that represents their strength. An element can be physical or supernatural. You can accumulate up to 2 attacks on the elemental bar. Through this system, it is possible to execute elemental attacks that have different characteristics from the others and bring new offensive or defensive possibilities for the player:

 

Cancel System

  • E.Cancel

It allows the player to cancel special attacks into elemental attacks, spending the elemental gauge and half of the power gauge.

 

  • S.Cancel

This system allows the player to cancel special attacks into super specials. Like E.Cancel, this also has a cost: 1 stock of the Power Bar plus half of it.

 

​Taunt

During a match, provocations can bring advantages and disadvantages. When you taunt, the opponent can lose half of their power bar due to being angry. Depending on their personality or relationship with your character, different reactions can happen. Be careful, though: During the taunt animation, the character is vulnerable to attacks.

 

Breaker

The best defense against an opponent's pressure, it can be done while blocking or being hit. It costs half of the elemental bar.

 

 

Character Status

In the character selection screen, along with the fighter's portrait, there are 4 attributes that describe their gameplay: Strength, Speed, Range and Difficulty. You can see them in more detail by pressing the Details button. In this menu, you can check their bio, that includes their nationality, full name, abilities, archetype and some of their input commands. This can help a beginner to know if a character fits with their  preferred gameplay style.

 

Shortcuts

If you are still learning, you’ll have the possibility to use simplified commands. This way you only need to press a single button to make special, super special moves or the final attack. To enable this feature, just go to the options or do it directly on the character selection screen. (Not available on Online Matches).

 

Accessibility

We implement colorblind effects and are working to bring more accessibility options to the final version of the game.  

Languages

The game will feature 12 languages, (this number may increase, depending on our fans). We want our product to be accessible for players who speak totally different languages.

 

Other Features

- Arcade mode

- VS mode

- Online mode

- Training mode

- Combo Maker (original mode to teach beginners in fighting games how to make combos. We'll show more details in near future)

 

 

In Pocket Bravery, a strange phenomenon happened in the world. But only a few people are able to feel and manifest it. There are those who throw energy through their hands, others reinforce their muscles, while certain specialists transfer their essence to objects and weapons. Nobody understands exactly what is happening and everyone tries to discover this mystery in their own way. In the middle of all this, Matilha, a criminal organization, wants to steal ancient artifacts and relics that involve several nations and notable individuals.

Regretful for making all the wrong decisions possible, Nuno seeks redemption, and with that, gets courage to face his parents again. During this journey, he will have to deal with several bad revelations about himself and the source of his powers. But it will not be easy to let go of his bad habits.

For someone who once hated practicing martial arts and preferred to stay at the computer, Mingmei became a skilled master in kung fu, showing how brilliant she was in different things in her life. However, everything comes with a price: for feeling guilty for the theft of a mystical artifact, she devoted all of her time to fulfill tradition and correct things.

There are many ways to feel an adrenaline rush. For Sebastian, the best of them is to win a competition. And his favorite competition is to arrest criminals, even though he’s now walking between being one or not. But in his mind it is a necessary evil to clean up his reputation tainted by corrupt people at Interpol, and who knows, one day, to recover his badge.

Motivated by strong feelings, Hadassa seeks answers to a crime that occurred in her life. This goal has always been in her mind, and when the opportunity came, she didn't think twice about pursuing clues, certain that she has enough capacity to smash the face of anyone who comes her way.

Ekon Ndidi is a pacifist man, but everything has a limit. After having his village invaded by a criminal organization and having his petition ignored by the government and the United Nations, he realized that to win the peace of his people it will be necessary to fight. With a great physical and spiritual strength, Ndidi is willing to change the destiny of the people of his land.

A world karate champion with only 17 years old, Kimberly put all her physical and mental fitness to the test when she joined the CIA and participated in dangerous missions, to unfortunately get away from the job she loved after discovering that not everything was as it seemed. Unable to do nothing, she founded Eagle, a private intelligence and espionage agency. With this, she is now able to keep put fear in all kinds of terrorist threats.

 

She came from the lowest strata of society, and because of this Malika understands the value of wealth better than anyone, being a successful businesswoman who thinks about different social causes, especially the spread of drugs to children from poor neighborhoods, since her brother ran away from home for the same reason. But unfortunately to solve the problem of the neighborhood in which she was born, she will need to deal with people capable of unreal things.

Some fight for a cause, others for money, but Arshavin fights for fame. Determined to be the greatest fighter ever, this man of colossal strength does not know the word "limit" when he comes to exchanging punches with a worthy opponent. However, fame can blind us, and this aim to be recognized puts him in bad situations.

Daisuke was a man who put his duty above everything, but after failing, he saw himself only as a dishonor with no place in the world. Full of negative feelings, he is sure that he will only redeem himself when he gets his revenge, but does not realize how he is leaving the things that really matter behind.

Ximena is a woman covered by mystery. Some think she is capable of talking to Death, others think she is Death itself. Regardless of your opinion, the only certainty is that she is an incredibly skilled killer, capable of eliminating you in a blink of an eye. After all, killing is not a pleasure, since her true pleasures are traveling and enjoying life. In the end, killing is just another business.

 

Unlock all the community goals to meet the boss of the game.

 

 

 

Our stages have animations and variations for each of the 3 rounds. They were created to match with the characters and the story we want to tell.

6 of the 10 stages we are showing are based on real locations. Can you recognize what they are?

 

 

 

 

If the $ 30,000 extended goal is reached, the game will receive a new game mode called TAG STRIKE, which will be played in doubles battles, in the already traditional TAG system (as in Mortal Kombat 9 or The King Fighters XI), but in addition, the player will have the help of assistants, who must be chosen from extra characters (as in Marvel vs Capcom or The King of Fighters 2000).

Master level supporters (or higher) will be able to have their own character as an assistant, be it some original character or some character made from scratch for our universe.

 

 

 

If the $ 40,000 extended goal is reached, the game will have a story mode that will tell all the events of Pocket Bravery. During the campaign it will be possible to make some choices to meet different endings, all of which are official and canon.

And don’t worry, regardless if the goal of story mode is achieved or not, we’ll have Arcade mode available from the launch. 

 

 

If the $ 50,000 extended goal is reached, the game will have a Color Editing mode, so you can go beyond the original and get alternative colors to customize your character exactly the way you want.

 

 

If the $ 60,000 extended goal is reached, the game will receive a mobile version. With gameplay adaptations on the smartphone screen.

 

 

If the $ 70,000 extended goal is reached, the character Son Ji Sung + his stage + his theme song will be produced and available as a DLC in a future update.

 

 

If the $ 80,000 extended goal is reached, the character Homero Silva + his stage + his theme song will be produced and available as a DLC in a future update.

 

 

If the $ 90,000 extended goal is reached, the character Brandon Carter + their stage + their theme song, will be produced and available as a DLC in a future update.

 

 

If the $ 100,000 extended goal is reached, the character “?” + their stage + their theme song, will be produced and available as a DLC in a future update.

Unlock two community goals to meet this character.

 

 

If the $ 110,000 extended goal is reached, the character “?” + their stage + their theme song, will be produced and available as a DLC in a future update.

Unlock three community goals to meet this character.

 

 

Unlock four community goals to reveal this reward.

 

 

Unlock five community goals to reveal this reward.

 

The more, the merrier! If you’re willing to help us grow the Pocket Bravery community, we’ll be happy to reveal in advance the 3 characters in the extended goals, two secret rewards, and who’s the final boss of the game. Don't waste time, join us on Discord, follow us on our social medias and share our game with your friends.

 

 

US$ 1

  • Name in the game credits (Rookie Level)

 

 

US$ 5

  • Name in the game credits (Bronze Level)
  • Exclusive channel for backers on Discord.

 

 

US$ 20

  • All the previous rewards
  • Name in the game credits (Silver Level)
  • Digital copy of the game at launch (PC Version)
  • 3 signed digital illustrations with unique numbering.

 

 

 US$ 50

  • All the previous rewards
  • Name in the game credits (Gold Level) 
  • Become a beta tester (You’ll be able to stream or make videos with each new update even before release) + All the previous rewards
  • Exclusive access to a Discord channel with a “beta tester” role.

 

 

US$ 80

  • All the previous rewards
  • Name in the game credits (Platinum Level) 
  • Immortalize a message with up to 140 characters in the game’s “Secret Files”. (subject to evaluation)
  • Digital Artbook
  • Receive all future DLC's

 

 

US$ 300

  • All the previous rewards
  • Name in the game credits (Diamond Level) 
  • Your own character as a stage cameo (subject to evaluation) ~~Limited up to 40 ~~

 

 

US$ 1.000

  • All the previous rewards
  • Name in the game credits (Master Level) 
  • Create your own assist character (subject to evaluation and only if the Tag Strike goal is reached) ~~ Limited up to 20 ~~ 

 

 

US$ 2.000

  • All the previous rewards
  • Name in the game credits (Warlord Level) 
  • Create your own stage (subject to evaluation) ~~Limited up to 10 ~~ 

 

 

US$ 10.000

  • All the previous rewards
  • Name in the game credits (Creator Level) 
  • Create your own playable character (subject to evaluation) ~~Limited up to 2 ~~

 

In terms of basic content, approximately 50% - 60% of the game is done. 

 

  • If the project is funded we will start working on the game's online mode on July 2021, which will be via GGPO on the Rollback Netcode system.

 

  • And if we reach our goal, even if a minimal amount of unforeseen events appears, Pocket Bravery will be released for PC (Windows, Mac and Linux), Nintendo Switch, Playstation 4, Playstation 5, Xbox One and Xbox Series X / S in the second semester of 2022.

 

We have already released another game, which is part of the same universe as Pocket Bravery, called Guns N’ Runs. It’s a stylish platform, action and shooting game, containing super specials and fast-paced Dash mechanics. In summary, it’s a game that refers to classics like Mega Man, Metal Slug and Celeste. Guns N' Runs is available on STEAM.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are partnered with Razer! We received recognition and support from Razer, who kindly approached us and sent us some peripherals, (keyboard, mouse, headphone and different types of joysticks), to facilitate our work in the development of Pocket Bravery. Thanks, Razer!

 

This is a special stage. It will be available to everyone at the game release. (You can also create yours, however you want, if you are a Warlord supporter or higher)

Everything we have done has been financed by our personal savings, some services provided to third parties and the help of some friends and family. However, to continue creating the game, we need your help. Our goal is to finish Pocket Bravery, no matter how long it takes, but we want to keep the development at full speed, as has been done so far. However, due to the high investment in the project and the need to maintain a quality team, our resources have been exhausted.

And precisely at this very important and decisive moment that we chose Indiegogo. We understand that every money collected will be extremely important to keep the team focused on developing the game.

Furthermore, we really want to hear a big "YES" from our fans and other potential players, enough to feel confident that Pocket Bravery is a game that people want to see launched.

And it is also well known that the value of a Indiegogo goes well beyond the amount raised during the campaign, being here provides us with the best initial feedback cycle that a game studio can expect. We are committed to this project and want confirmation that Pocket Bravery is something you want.

 

We want to thank everyone who has supported us since the beginning and you who are getting to know us right now. We want you to know that we are grateful for this opportunity to have some of your time and interest in our Kickstarter campaign.

Sharing our project with your friends, family and social media would be a huge help for us. Thank you for visiting Pocket Bravery!
story_txt:
There's a playable demo available for the public! It's still in progress, but we want to share it with you and hear your thoughts. ✌  Please add Pocket Bravery to your Wishlist on STEAM. Make sure to check it out!  Pocket Bravery is an original fighting game, made completely hand drawn in pixel art, with a dynamic and responsive gameplay, focused on the characters’ animations with the aim to get fluidity during matches.In this example, a single attack has 22 individual frames​ The game is inspired by classics from the 90s, such as Street Fighter, Fatal Fury and The King of Fighters. And its SD aesthetic was influence on games like Pocket Fighter and other fighting games from Neo Geo Pocket Color. But make no mistake, Pocket Bravery was created to be a new and unique fighting game, with original characters, vibrant colors an impressive combat system, designed with high-level players in mind. For beginners, we created a set of features that will teach them how to improve and evolve. The game uses a digital pad and four buttons., two punches and two kicks. You can combine  directional inputs and buttons to execute traditional commands from fighting games such as specials, super specials or even Final Attacks.  Elemental SystemEach character has an element that represents their strength. An element can be physical or supernatural. You can accumulate up to 2 attacks on the elemental bar. Through this system, it is possible to execute elemental attacks that have different characteristics from the others and bring new offensive or defensive possibilities for the player: Cancel SystemE.CancelIt allows the player to cancel special attacks into elemental attacks, spending the elemental gauge and half of the power gauge. S.CancelThis system allows the player to cancel special attacks into super specials. Like E.Cancel, this also has a cost: 1 stock of the Power Bar plus half of it. ​TauntDuring a match, provocations can bring advantages and disadvantages. When you taunt, the opponent can lose half of their power bar due to being angry. Depending on their personality or relationship with your character, different reactions can happen. Be careful, though: During the taunt animation, the character is vulnerable to attacks. BreakerThe best defense against an opponent's pressure, it can be done while blocking or being hit. It costs half of the elemental bar.  Character StatusIn the character selection screen, along with the fighter's portrait, there are 4 attributes that describe their gameplay: Strength, Speed, Range and Difficulty. You can see them in more detail by pressing the Details button. In this menu, you can check their bio, that includes their nationality, full name, abilities, archetype and some of their input commands. This can help a beginner to know if a character fits with their  preferred gameplay style. ShortcutsIf you are still learning, you’ll have the possibility to use simplified commands. This way you only need to press a single button to make special, super special moves or the final attack. To enable this feature, just go to the options or do it directly on the character selection screen. (Not available on Online Matches). AccessibilityWe implement colorblind effects and are working to bring more accessibility options to the final version of the game.  LanguagesThe game will feature 12 languages, (this number may increase, depending on our fans). We want our product to be accessible for players who speak totally different languages. Other Features- Arcade mode- VS mode- Online mode- Training mode- Combo Maker (original mode to teach beginners in fighting games how to make combos. We'll show more details in near future)  In Pocket Bravery, a strange phenomenon happened in the world. But only a few people are able to feel and manifest it. There are those who throw energy through their hands, others reinforce their muscles, while certain specialists transfer their essence to objects and weapons. Nobody understands exactly what is happening and everyone tries to discover this mystery in their own way. In the middle of all this, Matilha, a criminal organization, wants to steal ancient artifacts and relics that involve several nations and notable individuals.Regretful for making all the wrong decisions possible, Nuno seeks redemption, and with that, gets courage to face his parents again. During this journey, he will have to deal with several bad revelations about himself and the source of his powers. But it will not be easy to let go of his bad habits.For someone who once hated practicing martial arts and preferred to stay at the computer, Mingmei became a skilled master in kung fu, showing how brilliant she was in different things in her life. However, everything comes with a price: for feeling guilty for the theft of a mystical artifact, she devoted all of her time to fulfill tradition and correct things.There are many ways to feel an adrenaline rush. For Sebastian, the best of them is to win a competition. And his favorite competition is to arrest criminals, even though he’s now walking between being one or not. But in his mind it is a necessary evil to clean up his reputation tainted by corrupt people at Interpol, and who knows, one day, to recover his badge.Motivated by strong feelings, Hadassa seeks answers to a crime that occurred in her life. However, fame can blind us, and this aim to be recognized puts him in bad situations.Daisuke was a man who put his duty above everything, but after failing, he saw himself only as a dishonor with no place in the world. story:
Whether you want to design your own professional board game or play the amazing creations of others, the Open Board Game makes it easy using the latest in 3D printing and hacker electronics.

We've been making games for 25 years and been developing for 3D printing for the last three. We're passionate about gaming and we want you to revolution the way board games are produced, new technology allows you to do just that.

The advent of 3D printing means you can self manufacture amazing games created and designed by you and the community.

Don't have a printer, no worries, read about 3D printing services here.

An Open Framework

We have developed a framework which allows the simple creation of board games using this technology and a community site to allow you to share your creations with the world, joining like minded people in collaborative development of groundbreaking game ideas.

The Open Board Game allows you to easily design and build your game using components such as interlocking board pieces, figurines, cards, dice and even interactive electronic elements.

At the core of the Open Board Game framework is a standardized set of interlocking hexagonal bricks that can make up an infinite variety of impressive 3D board landscapes.

These bricks are designed in such a way as to be 3D printed quickly and hassle free on standard home machines for a few cents each. 

We have been developing the Open Board Game framework bricks for over 6 months, working with hundreds of prototypes and possible layouts. The result is a trouble free, easy to print, interconnecting board that can be adapted and refined by you, the community. The standard models are completely open and you can download the models here, to print, hack, modify, use and share freely in your own creations. 

In addition we've included internal support structures so lights, servos, sensors and complete mini controllers can all be included inside the bricks to make parts move and interact with your game design.

You can find out more at our web site.

The First 3D Printed Board Game

To fully test the OBG framework we created example games to inspire the community to work with us to develop this new type of board game.  

Rust to Dust, is an advance wars style strategy battle game with 56 fantastic Battle Robot Figurines. This first game to be designed to work with the interlocking board pieces of the open board game is our test bed and we want to involve you the community in its final stage development.

The robots have 3 classes,  Range, Bruiser and Infantry, each with their own benefits and weaknesses. Attributes that are defined on their accompanying collectible playing cards.

 

Each robot is unique but has inherited features from its clan. We are producing 56 unique robot figurines, two clans of 14 robots each with 4 Bruiser class, 4 Range class and 6 Infantry class robots in 2 poses each. 

Each of these models is unique, created to the highest standard by our artists and ready for 3D printing. 

The game is at first playable stage and over the next two months we will be working to refine the game play with you, and in doing so improve the Open Board Game framework and Community Site. We launched this crowd funding campaign to help us achieve that and at the same time raising awareness of the Open Board Game framework. We hope this example game will inspire you and others to build thousands more games using the Open Board pieces.


To thank you for your help we will make full sets of our robot models available to you for home printing. If you don't have access to a home printer we also offer to professionally print the models using a high end printing service. 

Each one of our backers will also get access to our beta Member's site before the general public has. We currently have two example games, Rust to Dust which is in first playable state, and Miomon, a Pokemon like card game in early concept stage. On the member's site you can download game rules and supporting files, join or start discussions on game improvements or even suggest your own new games and help us begin the board game revolution.

Why Crowd Funding

We are passionately into the board game concept and believe you will be too. A crowd funding campaign helps us (and our backers) gauge the response the idea has, and a successful campaign will allow us to pursue this dream.
The raised funds represent two months costs for our 5 strong team of gaming professionals. Allowing us to dedicate our focus to improvements in game play, complete the second clan designs and improve the Community website.

Getting the idea out into the public eye at beta stage allows us to refine the idea with the communities feedback and give the best possible experience to you.
Stretch goals will include additional designs exclusively for you the backer but will also allow us to deliver more free designs to be available to all.

And overwhelming support of our project by you will allow us to cheaply mass manufacturer the most common basic components of the board bricks, making the Open Board Game concept available to more people, able to build bigger designs more cheaply. 

Risks & Challenges

Its always worrying to back a campaign with unknowns. So we wanted to remove that risk for you, that is why we have already built all 28 of the models in the Doppler Clan and will have completed the Euler Clan before the end of the campaign. All of the perks 3d printed by Shapeways are already complete and ready.  You can see each of the Doppler clan models by following this link to our gallery, and we will be posting regular updates and images on The Euler Clan models over the following weeks.

3D printing is also a very challenging and sometimes frustrating technology. 

 

We understand and have overcome the difficulties encountered in every printing process from home FDM or SLS machines to the latest and most high end printing machines used by services such as Shapeways. Most importantly, we have the know-how to build impressive game figures to take advantage of these new processes. For further independent validation on our ability to deliver, Gartner, the world's leading IT research and advisory company, recommended us as one of the top five coolest companies in 3D printing in their industry report, and MakerBot approached us as one of 8 companies to become part of their MakerBot Ready Apps program when it was launched at the end of last year.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute no problem. We are trying to build a community of open freely distributed models and ideas. You can already download the board pieces as they are totally free to the community. If we succeed we will be able to deliver more free models into the community. 

Regardless of if you back the project or not, if we are successful we will release a basic set of models to build the game for anyone to freely download, print and play. Backers will get the added benefit of up to 56 beautiful robot models to build a fantastic army.

And our stretch goals have more free stuff too. So help us tell the world!

Stretch Goals

Perks

Clan perks are delivered as electronic files for people who own or have access to 3d printers. For those who don't have access to a 3d printer, or prefer high grade prints, we offer many perks using the professional 3d printing service  Shapeways

All physical perks are already complete and will be sent for 3d printing immediately the campaign ends.

For all physical perks delivery details, price and timing please consult Shapeways help page here.  Remember if you back multiple perks  there will be only one shipping cost.

Images used are a digital preview, please also check the materials section and Shapeways for examples of material finish.

Complete Clan Doppler

For the home printer owners or makers out there. The complete Clan Doppler consisting of 14 unique robots ready for 3D printing. 4 Bruiser class robots, 4 Range class and 6 Infantry. Each robot comes with two poses making 28 models in total. See them all at www.openboardgame.com

The models come in STL file format, complete with supports for printing on common machines. This perk grants you a permanent licence to print these models for personal non commercial use.

Two Whole Clans 56 Models

The complete Clan Dopler and Clan Eular. Now you and your friends can have a unique set each including the latest clan in development, Clan Eular. 

Each clan consisting of 14 unique robots ready for 3D printing. 4 Bruiser class robots, 4 Range class and 6 Infantry. Each robot comes with two poses making 28 models in total in each clan, 56 models in total.

The models come in STL file format, complete with supports for printing on common machines. This perk grants you a permanent licence to print these models for personal non commercial use.

Collectors Infantry Figurine

3D printed for you and delivered to your door using high end 3D printing services, this 1.6in (4.1 cm) high model can be ordered in any of 7 colors printed in high end nylon flexible plastic. Delivery costs can be found on Shapeways.com

Cm:3.374 w x 2.798 d x 4.118 h In:1.328 w x 1.102 d x 1.621 h  

Collectors Range Figurine

3D printed for you and delivered to your door using high end 3D printing services, this 1.8in (4.7 cm) high model can be ordered in any of 7 colors printed in high end nylon flexible plastic. Delivery costs can be found on Shapeways.com

Cm:3.754 w x 2.656 d x 4.752 h In:1.478 w x 1.046 d x 1.871 h

Collectors Bruiser Figurine

3D printed for you and delivered to your door using high end 3D printing services, this 1.5in (3.9 cm) high model can be ordered in any of 7 colors printed in high end nylon flexible plastic. Delivery costs can be found on Shapeways.com

Cm:4.314 w x 3.212 d x 3.916 hIn:1.698 w x 1.265 d x 1.542 h

Collectors Triple Figurines

All three of the Collectors models. One Range Class Robot, one Bruiser Class robot and one Infantry class robot. 3D printed for you and delivered to your door using high end 3D printing services, these models can be ordered in any of 7 colors printed in high end nylon flexible plastic.

Gold Infantry Figurine

This robot is 3D printed in 420 Stainless Steel infused with bronze, and has a final composition of approximately 60% steel and 40% bronze.It is then Enrobed in 24k gold and polished to a mild sheen but retains visible print lines. You can also elect to have it plated in Nickel if you prefer.

Cm:3.374 w x 1.72 d x 3.99 h In:1.328 w x 0.677 d x 1.571 h

Gold Range Figurine

This robot is 3D printed in 420 Stainless Steel infused with bronze, and has a final composition of approximately 60% steel and 40% bronze.It is then Enrobed in 24k gold and polished to a mild sheen but retains visible print lines. You can also elect to have it plated in Nickel if you prefer.

Cm:3.754 w x 2.014 d x 4.616 hIn:1.478 w x 0.793 d x 1.817 h

Precious Infantry Figurine

Polished 18k Gold Plated Brass or Sterling Silver. These models go through extensive hand polishing to create a smooth surface texture. The outcome is a beautiful shiny luster with a high level of detail and smooth surface finish. You can also elect to have it plated in 14k rose gold or rhodium. 

Cm:3.374 w x 1.72 d x 3.99 h In:1.328 w x 0.677 d x 1.571 h

Precious Range Figurine

Polished 18k Gold Plated Brass or Sterling Silver. These models go through extensive hand polishing to create a smooth surface texture. The outcome is a beautiful shiny luster with a high level of detail and smooth surface finish. You can also elect to have it plated in 14k rose gold or rhodium. 

Cm:3.754 w x 2.014 d x 4.616 h In:1.478 w x 0.793 d x 1.817 h

Maker's Club Licence

Do you run a MakerSpace, FabLab or 3D printing Cafe? This perk allows you and your members to print out our full 56 Model set for non commercial use. Now you and your members can print out and play Open Board Games, mod them and create their own maker inspired pieces. 
Your members can also join our members site, where we will have a dedicate club space and mention of your organization with exciting projects specifically for makers. Your organisation will have a permanent 300x300 pixel banner on our partners page with accompanying text and web link.

2 Clan sets, Each clan consisting of 14 unique robots ready for 3D printing. 4 Bruiser class robots, 4 Range class and 6 Infantry. Each robot comes with two poses making 28 models in total in each clan, and 56 models in total. 
The models come in STL file format, complete with supports for printing on common machines. This perk grants your club and its members  a  permanent site licence to print these models for non commercial use.

Timeline

Material Data

Polished Gold and Nickel plated steel

This material is 3D printed 420 Stainless Steel infused with bronze, and has a final composition of approximately 60% steel and 40% bronze.It is then Enrobed in 24k gold and polished to a mild sheen but retains visible print lines.

for more information :  https://www.shapeways.com/materials/steel

Polished Gold Plated on Brass

Precious Plated Metals are cast in Shapeways’ Brass before going through extensive hand polishing to create a smooth surface texture. After being cast, we underplate the brass with palladium to provide strength and durability. Your products are then plated with .5 microns of the precious metal of choice. The outcome is a beautiful shiny luster with a high level of detail and smooth surface finish.

Shapeways' Brass consists of 15% zinc, 5% tin, and 80% copper. The palladium and precious metal electroplatings are about .5 micron each, but this can vary based on geometry.

for more information  https://www.shapeways.com/materials/precious-plated-metal

Sterling Silver

Polished silver is lightly hand polished to achieve a smooth finish but still can have some surface texture.

3D Printed Sterling Silver products are made using a three-step process. The products are created with a lost-wax casting process using a high-resolution 3D wax printer. The 3D printed wax model is put in a container and liquid plaster is poured around it to create a mold. After the plaster sets, the wax is melted out and molten silver is poured into the plaster mold. The plaster is then pulled away to reveal the silver and the finished product is polished for a smooth surface.

Polishing gives this material a beautiful finish, but can have an impact on fine details. During the polishing step, fine or sharp-edged details may be polished down.

for more information https://www.shapeways.com/materials/silver?li=nav

Strong flexible plastic

To 3D print in this material, Shapeways start with a bed of Nylon powder and sinter the powder with a laser layer by layer, solidifying the powder as they go. Some visible print lines may occur, but a final polish stage usually eliminates most of this.

for more information https://www.shapeways.com/materials/strong-and-flexible-plastic?li=nav

*note information on materials is supplied by Shapeways Printing Service and thus we are not responsible for any errors omissions or inaccuracies. For more information please visit https://www.shapeways.com/
story_txt:
Whether you want to design your own professional board game or play the amazing creations of others, the Open Board Game makes it easy using the latest in 3D printing and hacker electronics.
We've been making games for 25 years and been developing for 3D printing for the last three. We're passionate about gaming and we want you to revolution the way board games are produced, new technology allows you to do just that.

The advent of 3D printing means you can self manufacture amazing games created and designed by you and the community.
Don't have a printer, no worries, read about 3D printing services here.
An Open Framework
We have developed a framework which allows the simple creation of board games using this technology and a community site to allow you to share your creations with the world, joining like minded people in collaborative development of groundbreaking game ideas.
The Open Board Game allows you to easily design and build your game using components such as interlocking board pieces, figurines, cards, dice and even interactive electronic elements.


At the core of the Open Board Game framework is a standardized set of interlocking hexagonal bricks that can make up an infinite variety of impressive 3D board landscapes.
These bricks are designed in such a way as to be 3D printed quickly and hassle free on standard home machines for a few cents each. 




We have been developing the Open Board Game framework bricks for over 6 months, working with hundreds of prototypes and possible layouts. The result is a trouble free, easy to print, interconnecting board that can be adapted and refined by you, the community. The standard models are completely open and you can download the models here, to print, hack, modify, use and share freely in your own creations. In addition we've included internal support structures so lights, servos, sensors and complete mini controllers can all be included inside the bricks to make parts move and interact with your game design.You can find out more at our web site.
The First 3D Printed Board Game
To fully test the OBG framework we created example games to inspire the community to work with us to develop this new type of board game.
 
Rust to Dust, is an advance wars style strategy battle game with 56 fantastic Battle Robot Figurines. This first game to be designed to work with the interlocking board pieces of the open board game is our test bed and we want to involve you the community in its final stage development.


The robots have 3 classes,  Range, Bruiser and Infantry, each with their own benefits and weaknesses. Attributes that are defined on their accompanying collectible playing cards.
 
Each robot is unique but has inherited features from its clan. We are producing 56 unique robot figurines, two clans of 14 robots each with 4 Bruiser class, 4 Range class and 6 Infantry class robots in 2 poses each. 

Each of these models is unique, created to the highest standard by our artists and ready for 3D printing. 


The game is at first playable stage and over the next two months we will be working to refine the game play with you, and in doing so improve the Open Board Game framework and Community Site. We launched this crowd funding campaign to help us achieve that and at the same time raising awareness of the Open Board Game framework. We hope this example game will inspire you and others to build thousands more games using the Open Board pieces.





To thank you for your help we will make full sets of our robot models available to you for home printing. If you don't have access to a home printer we also offer to professionally print the models using a high end printing service. 

Each one of our backers will also get access to our beta Member's site before the general public has. We currently have two example games, Rust to Dust which is in first playable state, and Miomon, a Pokemon like card game in early concept stage. On the member's site you can download game rules and supporting files, join or start discussions on game improvements or even suggest your own new games and help us begin the board game revolution.

Why Crowd Funding
We are passionately into the board game concept and believe you will be too. A crowd funding campaign helps us (and our backers) gauge the response the idea has, and a successful campaign will allow us to pursue this dream.
The raised funds represent two months costs for our 5 strong team of gaming professionals. Allowing us to dedicate our focus to improvements in game play, complete the second clan designs and improve the Community website.







Getting the idea out into the public eye at beta stage allows us to refine the idea with the communities feedback and give the best possible experience to you.

Stretch goals will include additional designs exclusively for you the backer but will also allow us to deliver more free designs to be available to all.






And overwhelming support of our project by you will allow us to cheaply mass manufacturer the most common basic components of the board bricks, making the Open Board Game concept available to more people, able to build bigger designs more cheaply. 



Risks & Challenges


 Its always worrying to back a campaign with unknowns. So we wanted to remove that risk for you, that is why we have already built all 28 of the models in the Doppler Clan and will have completed the Euler Clan before the end of the campaign. All of the perks 3d printed by Shapeways are already complete and ready.  You can see each of the Doppler clan models by following this link to our gallery, and we will be posting regular updates and images on The Euler Clan models over the following weeks.

3D printing is also a very challenging and sometimes frustrating technology. 

 

We understand and have overcome the difficulties encountered in every printing process from home FDM or SLS machines to the latest and most high end printing machines used by services such as Shapeways. Most importantly, we have the know-how to build impressive game figures to take advantage of these new processes. For further independent validation on our ability to deliver, Gartner, the world's leading IT research and advisory company, recommended us as one of the top five coolest companies in 3D printing in their industry report, and MakerBot approached us as one of 8 companies to become part of their MakerBot Ready Apps program when it was launched at the end of last year.
Other Ways You Can Help

 If you can't contribute no problem. We are trying to build a community of open freely distributed models and ideas. You can already download the board pieces as they are totally free to the community. If we succeed we will be able to deliver more free models into the community. 

Regardless of if you back the project or not, if we are successful we will release a basic set of models to build the game for anyone to freely download, print and play. Backers will get the added benefit of up to 56 beautiful robot models to build a fantastic army.
And our stretch goals have more free stuff too. So help us tell the world!


Stretch Goals






Perks
Clan perks are delivered as electronic files for people who own or have access to 3d printers. For those who don't have access to a 3d printer, or prefer high grade prints, we offer many perks using the professional 3d printing service  Shapeways
All physical perks are already complete and will be sent for 3d printing immediately the campaign ends.
For all physical perks delivery details, price and timing please consult Shapeways help page here.  Remember if you back multiple perks  there will be only one shipping cost.
Images used are a digital preview, please also check the materials section and Shapeways for examples of material finish.
Complete Clan Doppler

For the home printer owners or makers out there. The complete Clan Doppler consisting of 14 unique robots ready for 3D printing. 4 Bruiser class robots, 4 Range class and 6 Infantry. Each robot comes with two poses making 28 models in total. See them all at www.openboardgame.com

The models come in STL file format, complete with supports for printing on common machines. This perk grants you a permanent licence to print these models for personal non commercial use.

Two Whole Clans 56 Models
The complete Clan Dopler and Clan Eular. Now you and your friends can have a unique set each including the latest clan in development, Clan Eular. 

Each clan consisting of 14 unique robots ready for 3D printing. 4 Bruiser class robots, 4 Range class and 6 Infantry. Each robot comes with two poses making 28 models in total in each clan, 56 models in total.
The models come in STL file format, complete with supports for printing on common machines. This perk grants you a permanent licence to print these models for personal non commercial use.

story:
About me

I am a design engineer. My love for mechanisms appeared in childhood. Once I saw the manuscripts with works by Da Vinci, I wanted to do something like that. Now it has become possible with the appearance of a 3D printer. I decided that it would be interesting to you.

What do I want

Da Vinci had a great engineering mind that the people who lived with him at one time, might not appreciate. Most inventions of Da Vinci it was impossible to realize with the help of tools XV - XVI centuries. All technical genius idea remained only on paper - in pictures, the drawings and detailed description. Only five centuries later, people who read the manuscript, tried to embody the idea of Da Vinci to life by designing mechanisms for his drawings. 

I set myself the task to design a part of the machinery with the ability to reproduce their home. Not only repeating appearance. But all the moving parts. 

 

If I see an interest in my work, I think many of them will be completed before the end of the company. Already fully ready to the first model of a catapult. Works on the following devices are conducted. 

The entire construction process is described in the instructions. It does not pose any difficulty, and possible even a child!

 

 

Now you have the opportunity to receive files for printing at discount prices!

 

 

For your contribution you will receive a set of files to the stl format with detailed instructions for assembly. In the instructions have all the necessary information for making machines.

Upon successful completion of the campaign, the first 3 contributor will receive additional remuneration. The first will be able to choose any one perk. The other two can choose any perk lower cost than ordered.

 

You can print these files for your own personal use, but you can not sell or distribute printed elements of digital 3D-model.
