story:
Raid On Coasts , a little title , not popular , you can bring it up , its all up your support amazing guys ! I expect a hand of help from each visitor , each friend and from you ! 

Support the game , fund it and i promiss you wont miss any $ you have funded and support by to the game ! A promess ! With each effort , even little help will make this game great !

Most of it will go to promote to the game at first point , ameliorating the game ( graphics / sounds / effects ) and developer materials needed to work in serious better conditions of developement ! 

Long way to success , come with first step .. Funding !

 

            

Raid On Coasts is a real time strategy game set in a world full of wars where powerful countrys tend to invade and perform raid on coasts of other continents around the world ! 

* Map : Coasts of Yemen ( coasts of middle east ) 

* Teams : - Russian Army 

                   - Usa Army         

 

* Units ( Russian Army ) : - 3 Soldiers (Ak47 / Rpg / Special Forces)

                                                  - 2 Military cars ( transport  /  gunned car  )  

                                                  - 1 Tank ( T90 tank  ) 

                                                  - 2 Jets ( Mig 21  / Su 34  )

 

* Units ( Usa Army )        :   3 Soldiers(M16/M136 /Special Forces)

                                                 - 2 Military cars (transport  /gunned car )  

                                                 - 2 Tank (M60 tank /Abrams tank) 

                                                 - 2 Jets ( F 15   / F 35  ) 

 

             

  •  2 new teams ( chiness army / rebels ) 
  •  a new map situated in china 
  •  Talents tree
  •  New strategies / mechanisms 
  •  Improvements on : Performance / Bots Ai / Graphics ! 
  •  Major bug fixes with every patch 
  •  Multiplayer & co_op ( if possible ) 

 

         

Upvote for the game please on steam and thanks in advance ! 

Steam Page : http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=905095023

 

         

 - I tend to make the game one of best games on steam , i have big plans to make this be a reality and come true ...
I expect a lot of help from you amazing guys , make sure to vote " yes " and share it with your friends and let them know about it , im not selling you promises , its a big responsability for me so you have a good experience while playing the game , i love what im doing and i tend to make my game better then much games ... let it come true and thanks for your attention ! 

 

         

Follow us in different social medias platforms and thanks in advance amazing people !! 

  • Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/raid.on.coasts/
  • Twitter :   https://twitter.com/raid_on_coasts
  • Youtube : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9YqEDAKYqAd5ur4v1FgSeg
  • Indie DB : http://www.indiedb.com/games/raid-on-coasts-early-access

story:
One More Night

Majority of the people love horror stories. It's no secret that horror movies get so many profit, people would love to watch and feel the scary experience from the characters they saw in the movie. But, horror game is a bit different, instead of watching you can experience it like your own. You can move the character around in the way you wanted. From that idea, I inspired to create a horror game with a decent story over it.

This game is not just a walk around the cave or a maze or a house and get ready to be spooked of for no reason. This game has it's own purpose, this game has it own stories.

I love originality. I inspired by some mechanics or stories, yes, but I can ensure you to full plot of this game is pure my own creation. Oh, I got some friends that gave me suggestion to add on the story too.

As a game developer, I'm a new one. I always love game and I always love story-telling. I maybe new, but I have confidence that people who play One More Night will experience something different and try to understand the full plot of the game.

This project is a dream for me, and I can't thank you enough for anyone who are willing to help me in any way they can.

 

Progress so far?

Yes, there is a progress so far. Like the trailer you already can see from this page (YouTube), the video is animated, I didn't take it from the actual game. Inside the real game might be a bit different (because of the adds-on) but the basic layout is decided. That's why the trailer is already seen. I might add another trailer by the time goes, but it depends on how this campaign is going.

The funding we needed is relatively small for a game. Unfortunately, my basic is not a programmer nor the 3D artist. That's I need the funding the pay them. I see myself as the director. I give them the concept and they are fulfilling my vision.

But, most of the funding is for marketing-correlation. I'm thinking of paying Youtuber or Instagram or any kind of marketing. I developed a game before, it went south very quickly because I didn't prepare any fund for marketing, lesson learned.

There are many Youtubers I like for the horror games. Markiplier, Jacksepticeye, Pewdiepie, etc, I don't know how much they worth to feature my game but my goal is for my game to be featured in their channel. Markiplier in my favorite to be honest, so he is my main goal. After that, I will let, hopefully, the ball rolling itself.

Campaign

I'm really grateful about this platform, Indiegogo is a new knowledge for me. There are some of my friends already willing to help me in funding, Indiegogo is the platform I give them and hopefully others to contribute.

Your help, no matter what package you will pick is mean the world to me. It makes me one step closer to really make a living with something I really passionate about.

Like I mentioned, I developed a game before, it's a mobile game called "Release the Snake" but the game haven't updated more than a year so I don't think it will pop up in your App Store or Play Store. If you do find it, go for the credits and you will find my name.

So, to be fair, I'm a rookie in this department. But I believe in my taste and I confident most of people will enjoy the story I represent through this game. One think I will ensure you guys, I will make this game available if the funding is reached. You don't have to be afraid that your help will go in vain. To show my confident I will leave you my personal social media so you guys can reach me out and ask about the development.

Email: stephen.wuisan@gmail.com (feel free to email me)

Twitter: stephwu8 (tweet me and I'll follow you back for more conversation in direct message)

Instagram: stephwu8 (direct message me and I'll reply you asap)

NB: but the social media is my personal page, so excuse me if I tweeted or posted something way of the context. :)

Breaking the Wall

Everything usually not go as smooth as we planned, but I'm ready for any bumps ahead. I will fight for my backers to complete the game even though this campaign is not reaching it's milestone.

The main obstacle is I will need the exact number of money to pay the programmers and artists. But, I will try anything so this game can be come true. I may ask other's help personally or find an investor that can share my vision.

After all, this is my passion.

Goalkeeper

Striker usually scored the goals, midfielder usually assist the ball. But even a goalkeeper has an important part to keep the team become the winning side.If you are not interested on investing in this campaign, hey, I''m grateful enough by you reading through this page.

I believe you know others who will interested to help us completing this campaign. Please, feel free to share this link to them. You can just share our first trailer in YouTube (https://youtu.be/H4jLgaGx9tQ) comment on the comment section, leave a like. It's a major help for me too if the trailer can be seen by a lot of people.

Thank you!
story_txt:
One More Night
Majority of the people love horror stories. It's no secret that horror movies get so many profit, people would love to watch and feel the scary experience from the characters they saw in the movie. But, horror game is a bit different, instead of watching you can experience it like your own. You can move the character around in the way you wanted. From that idea, I inspired to create a horror game with a decent story over it.
This game is not just a walk around the cave or a maze or a house and get ready to be spooked of for no reason. This game has it's own purpose, this game has it own stories.

story:
Short Summary

I'm not going to say something like, "Oh, I really need money because I was raised poorly" or some crap like that, because that would be lying, so far, I've lived a pretty good life, any money donated here would just help make my dreams of producing video games as a job, come true!

I will use the money to (1) help pay for game development software (2) to make sure the games can stay free. (3) help make sure I can keep producing these games.

If you donate you will be helping me and all of my team stay in business and make our dreams come true

What We Need & What You Get

We need the money to pay for things like photoshop to make sprites for the games, and game development software, mostly game maker,
If you donate any money at all, you will be in the credits of all upcoming games of mine under a "Special Thanks" section.  If you donate $3 or more, you will get access to beta versions and will be able to beta test our games.

If we do not reach the goal, any money raised will still go into producing the games, (it would have been a smaller goal but indiegogo makes you have at least a $500 goal.)

Risks & Challenges

Risks could include (but are not limited to) running into bugs that we are unable to patch out.  not having enough money to afford certain software, and, when it comes to game making, many things can go wrong, so anything donated will help fixing those unforeseen events

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't have enough to contribute, or you just don't feel like your money would be well spent, you can help us out by checking out our gamejolt page, or any of our teams youtube channels (linked below)

TEAMS CHANNELS

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjaURNZOsuqB1PZEpMJHFdA

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCva2Sk8rLqjUEhUyCvlY18w

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzwMGuceYT78FyKKnwOBYMQ

GAMEJOLT

http://gamejolt.com/@PlasmaTechnology

OUR WEBSITES

http://sites.google.com/view/plasmatechnology

https://sites.google.com/view/pikmin1324

story:
Unearthed is featured at:
VGVIDS
Gamezinger
Steemkr
N4G
Early Axes

Unearthed is a multiplayer survival game currently  in development by South African based indie studio, Mad Matter Creative. 

Developed in Unreal Engine 4, Unearthed will run on Windows Desktop PC's and Linux with consoles a possibility as a stretch goal.

The goal of the crowdfunding is provide enough funds, to expand the team in order to shape Unearthed into the game it is meant to be.

  • Abducted from Earth, awaken in a Citadel known as The Root.
  • From there explore an open world with seamlessly integrated environmental sectors, or risk life and limb in the Shadow Lands beyond.
  • Gather riches, fame and fortune through craft, combat or sheer cunning.

  • Unearthed’s environmental sectors is the heart of its multi-layered worldscape.
  • Venture deep into vast and unique environmental sectors where diverse flora and fauna create unexpected threats.
  • Each sector progressively becomes all the more dangerous and alien towards its central zones, with flora and fauna changing dramatically.

  • At the fringes of the various environmental sectors lies an uncertain terrain shrouded in shadow. Foreboding structures and fell creatures dwell within and occasionally  assault the border outposts in neighboring sectors.
  • The Shadow Lands are integral to the development of the story of Unearthed.
  • ​The entirety of the Shadow Lands is a PVP zone.

  • Which Environments will Unearthed have on Launch?

How many environments will feature when we launch will hinge on the outcome of the campaign as more funding will allow for greater amounts.

  • Sector 0: "Savannah" “:(Contains The Root Citadel)
  • Sector 1: "Swamp” (Contains three zones, or "sub-environments")
  • Sector 2: "Inland Sea” Contains three zones, or "sub-environments")
  • Sector 3: "Primordial Forest Contains three zones, or "sub-environments")
  • The Shadow Lands which surrounds the Sectors and can be explored, at personal risk.

  • Unearthed is meant to be challenging. Survival encompasses much more than simply maintaining hunger, thirst and temperature.
  • Natural and artificial dangers will prove a daunting dare to the bold and brave.
  • ​Unstable terrain, fluctuating gravity, exploding or toxic flora, poisonous gasses and more will require players to approach each sector and respective zone differently, with the promise of riches or ruin ahead.
  • Find refuge in any of the Outposts within each environmental sector.

  • Play in either third person, OTS, or first person view.
  • ​Competitive multiplayer in the Arena (ranked matches, seasons) where victories will earn prestige and special rewards.
  • Explore a PVE world with select areas dedicated to PVP. 
  • ​Unearthed's stealth system works on visual and auditory detection. Use natural stealth or cloaking devices to outwit your enemy.



  • Server-wide events will unite players in immersive scenarios which contributes to Unearthed’s lore and story line.
  • Such events can come in the form of, among others, a new environment, a ship crashing down, or an incursion of hostile forces.
  • Players will need to work together to face the challenges, or try and brave them on their own.
    ​



  • Detail Matters. Unearthed attempts to mirror the detail normally found in single player games with dynamic details.
  • Blood and burn marks from injuries.
  • Snow, dust, rainwater and mud accumulate upon clothing.
  • ​Environmental materials change in response to weather conditions.


​

  • With detailed character customization options.
     


  • Resources are specific to their environmental sectors. What is abundant in one region might be rare in another.
  • Prices for resources vary between Outposts. 
  • Use mining probes and extractors to track down and extract rare veins of ore.
  • Scan for hidden treasure caches or seek out long-forgotten ruins to uncover rare items and rewards. 
     

  • Create your own sanctuary or simply store your hoarded goods in a living space in The Root or any one of the outposts littered throughout the world.
  • Buy land and create unique and complex structures or the ultimate fortress of solitude.
  • ​Property can be purchased with in game currency which has to be earned through trial and tribulation.



​

  • ​ Thus far,  Unearthed is the work of a single self-taught individual, and founder of Mad Matter, Ragel Alheit.

    "We honestly believe that this game will put SA on the map as an up-and-coming game developer.  Ragel has developed and funded the project to where it is now, all by herself.  Imagine what she can achieve with an expert team and the necessary funds"  Early Axes Gaming

  • While Ragel has been developing and funding Unearthed and its assets herself ; a larger team is essential. 
  • All funds raised will go directly into the development of Unearthed and expanding the team.
  • A successful Indiegogo campaign will ensure that a talented team of individuals,  (local and freelance) can join the ranks of Mad Matter.  Unearthed will be shaped into the game it is meant to be in time for its expected release date (Q2-Q3 2019) which could be earlier depending on the skill of the team.

story:
Dear all, something unexpected happened. Kickstarter is now available in my country, Belgium (it wasn't when I started the campaign on Indiegogo). Since the Indiegogo campaign was not doing that great anyway, I've decided to cancel the Indiegogo campaign and to start over using Kickstarter! Please check out DotCity on Kickstarter or just follow www.dotcitythegame.com.

PS: some new screenshots and a lot more about the gameplay is available on Kickstarter!

story:
The Nexus

The Nexus is an upcoming project planned for Downtown Providence, RI. A restaurant, bar and retail experience - the Nexus will offer something for gamers, geeks and nerds of any persuasion.

We plan to launch the Nexus in November of 2016. Our team has been hard at work on this project for well over a year now, and we need just a small push to get the rest of the way.

Overview

The Nexus will have a lot to offer;
  • Over 3,000 square feet of retail space with everything from collectable card games to board game and wargame products, as well as clothing, swag and even space to play your games. Our retail space will be for all ages.
  • A wide product range from around the world, including cosplay products, LARP products and more.
  • A 2,500 square foot bar and restaurant experience for our adult patrons, offering food, beverages, gaming space and an atmosphere built on your favorite fandoms, hobbies and themes. Run your D&D campaign, play a board game, or go to war with your favorite miniatures all while having a pint and a bite to eat.
  • Space for live music and performances. Joining the best of everything we have to offer for a truly unique experience.
  • In our humble opinion, finally the hangout spot Providence needs.

We have put a lot of work into this project already, and we are at the final stages of completion. We need your help to get there.


What's next?

While the Nexus has been brewing for over a year, we have only a few more obstacles to cross;

  • We are seeking 20,000 USD in funding (or more) help lighten the load with the lease payments and miscellaneous expenses during construction.
  • In order to make this project a reality we need to know that the New England community is ready to welcome us.

We need you;

  • If we do better than 20,000 USD we improve our offering - more products, a higher design budget for the space, and (if we can reach triple our goal) a free invite-only celebration for our backers.
  • Tshirts, swag and exclusive items for our supporters, as well as a crate-style box of random goodies for our higher value contributors, and more!


Our Impact

We want to give Providence the hot spot it deserves for Geeks, Nerds, Gamers and Fandoms of all walks of life. Music, entertainment and the other types of recreation we enjoy don't have to be mutually exclusive.

We want to offer an environment that will allow you to enjoy a night out, play your favorite games, and meet people who share our interests.

We will make this a reality.

The Road Ahead

While we have already struggled through many of the difficulties in getting our project started, there is still a great deal to contend with. Doing a build-out for a retail operation is hard enough, but adding food service and more to the offering can make a project really challenging. Adding to this the cost (in time and money) of hiring new employees, improving our stock and spreading the word has been really daunting.

We will be reaching out to the New England gaming and cosplay communities to help us spread the word about our project, and even bring some hands to bear to help us staff and operate the Nexus. We want this to be your home base as well as ours.

We plan to complete our build-out of our food service and bar space by October 15th, 2016 - just in time for a soft opening. This is an ambitious goal, and we will have more information on this as the fundraiser proceeds.


Getting Involved

Not everyone can help with cash, but that doesn't mean you can't help us make this project happen!

  • Spread the word about us on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and anywhere else you can do it.
  • Indigogo keeps telling us to remind you to use the share tools, so... do that!
  • We are looking for more help! If you have an interest in getting involved as staff or helping us more directly with our promotion efforts, feel free to email us at info@thenexusri.com


We're coming Rhode Island, join us in making the Nexus a reality.

story:
Red Parries in the air, damaging blue and removing all projectiles from the screen.

What Is BoxFighter?

BoxFighter is a Fighting Game designed to be easy to learn while possessing a depth of strategic potential.

BoxFighter is an experiment in procedurally generated art that provides a truly novel experience to players of all skill levels.

BoxFighter is a fusion of classic themes and modern design, breaking away from artistic tradition to let players see into the beating heart of the game’s engine.

BoxFighter is the coalescence of geometry, physics, light, color, and (eventually) sound, fused together in a creative expression of competitive play.

Who are we?

We are Timepiece Games, thank you for coming to learn about BoxFighter. We have been working on this game for four years, and have only begun to plumb the depths of this game’s potential. We are excited to invite you to share in our passion as this game continues to evolve.

Our long-term goals with this game are lofty, but the goals of this campaign are very simple. With your help, we will increase BoxFighter’s reach and appeal, and bring together a community of BoxFighter enthusiasts like yourself.

(Green lands a corner combo against purple)

What makes BoxFighter Special?

If you haven't yet played BoxFighter, you may be wondering why a game filled with simple shapes is worth your time. Below are the four key points that drive us to continue developing our game.

BoxFighter is Fun:

Through rigorous testing, we have reduced the technical difficulty that prevents new players from enjoying high-strategy fighting games. New players absorb game information intuitively, applying astonishing ingenuity in a matter of minutes, while enjoying the spectacle of light and color of BoxFighter’s display.

BoxFighter is Unique:

Procedurally generated graphics allow us to develop new characters at the fraction of the cost of traditional fighting games, and give us the ability to release frequent balance patches as soon as “broken” techniques are discovered.

BoxFighter is Accessible:

Because the art is procedurally generated, rather than stored in the game’s memory, BoxFighter is incredibly processor-light, and runs on hardware at the fraction of the cost of modern gaming consoles.

BoxFighter is Love:

You can rest assured, we’re going to keep working on BoxFighter no matter the outcome of this drive. This campaign an invitation for you to shape the way this game develops, to play at home, and to join us on this excellent adventure.

If you would like to learn more, check out the testimonials link to the left!

(The circles in the background generated with every hit. Their size is determined by hitstun, and their thickness by the damage of the attack)

Where will we go next?

Once we’re finished with our core goals, here’s what we’ll be working on next.

Stretch Goals:

- Donate a cabinet to a homeless youth shelter: We would like to install a BoxFighter cabinet at P:ear, a creative mentorship program for homeless youth, and provide them with development tools to facilitate the growth of computer literacy through game design.

- Netplay + Leaderboards: With the engineering overhaul required for our core goals, adding Netplay will be a relatively simple matter.

- Fractals: Our procedurally generated backgrounds are made of mathematic equations. Circles and basic shapes are easy to make. At this point, we will be able to write equations to create Blooming Flowers, unique Snowflakes, and explosions of Sacred Geometry using the same design principles.

- New Characters: We have several more characters designed at the conceptual level. We look forward to sharing their development with you and letting the community guide us as we expand BoxFighter’s cast.

- Bring BoxFighter to Burning Man!!! After our warm reception at SOAK, a regional arts festival, we have been offered the opportunity to bring BoxFighter to Burning Man, and put Fighting Games on display for 70,000 people seeking new forms of creative expression and community.

Thank you.

For reading, for sharing, and for backing our campaign, you have our sincere thanks. This is our dream, and we are delighted for the opportunity to share it with you.

story:
Agency of the Year

"Assemble your best talents; fight others with the most disturbing, insincere ways and ridiculous betrayals to win that new business pitch"

Agency of the Year is a nasty card game based on the mad world of advertising. Powered by cheap blow tactics and sometimes, irrational minds.

Players assemble their best talents and despicable action tactic cards to take down opponents.

The deck also gears them up with counteraction cards to face disasters. Or even steal their opponent’s best talents. All for the sake of winning project cards from clients. The game gets more ridiculous with cards that will make them lose everything. And be eliminated from the game entirely.

BE CAUTIOUS, THIS GAME IS NOT FOR THE WEAK-WILLED.

Keep the betrayal and backstabbing alive,
AOTY Team




The idiot behind Agency of the Year is Shah Al Zefflee, an ex-suit. Supported by a team of graphic designers and visualisers; Gaik Teng, Juin Yip, Wai Lap, Lim and Candise. We were excited to break our normal work routine to passionately develop this card game, for our love towards the Advertising industry.

We created this game because we thought that these nasty tactics were probably the reasons behind the failure in securing new businesses. This was put together on Indiegogo because we can’t do this alone. We need you, to be our helping hand. To make things happen.

Now, let’s rock and roll.

P/s: We love eating fried chicken with mayonnaise.



The Nonsense Story

The idea of Agency of the Year started when "the snow glows white on the mountain tonight. Not a footprint to be seen. A kingdom of isolation and it looks like I'm the Queen". No, I am just kidding; clearly, that was just a reference from Frozen.
Okay, time to be serious. 

It started out when I asked the youngest, hipster, celebrity-like Executive Creative Director of an international advertising agency based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia – “What will happen if the client doesn't buy your ideas during the pitch?”. He simply said, “Nothing serious will happen. Just move on.” 


Fuck no; his answer was not satisfying at all. 

After sleepless nights, nagging other halves, cups of cola, infinite cholesterol and fat intakes; here we are. A fully developed card game, designed with ridiculous reasons to satisfy our curiosities.

Of course, there were countless arguments among the designers to prove whose illustration was better – and I was the referee. It was fun; not the fight, but in terms of the whole process. 

THE STRUGGLE WAS REAL – we wanted players to be at loggerheads during the game, in a casual manner without trying too hard. We tried 1001 ways to translate betrayal and insincere feelings into visuals. Observing human behaviours for hours, practising sarcastic remarks and jokes; and used them against our friends – secretly translating their reactions into our visuals.

Shah Al Zefflee,
The idiot behind Agency of the Year
P/s: Cheerleaders are the hottest chicks in the world.

Go to our Facebook & Twitter for more information about the Agency of The Year card game.

Special Thanks to Christina Ng, Nicole Sue for proofreading and Yuzainis for his unproven, dodgy insights about going online. 

Risks & Challenges

This campaign is simple; we’d like to facilitate production so that everyone can get a copy of the Agency of the Year deck(s) soonest, after the campaign ends.

We wouldn't want you to waste time checking emails, receiving telegrams and decoding Morse codes; notifying you on production delays. We want you to get straight into action.

How will we utilise your money? – 85% will go to the production of the game and the rest will be used for the shipping preparations; to ensure that you'll be able to receive a decent-looking deck at your doorstep.


Other Ways You Can Help

This project was put on Indiegogo as we’d like to share this project with the rest of the world. It’ll also be the quickest way to get this game in your hands. We believe that this is going to be super awesome. So give us a hand to make this even better and help us materialise this game.

Always feel free to spread the word about Agency of the Year to others around you and share it on your social media – your contribution would be much appreciated.

story:
We'll make everyone who reads this a deal, if we get 1 million real people to subscribe or buy a perk before January 30th, 2019, we will do one standalone game where only those that subscribed or bought a perk through our Indiegogo crowd funding page can participate. And yes, there will be PRIZES!

Excited yet? Well get ready because on the 20th of January 2019 we are going to make an announcement that will blow your socks off!!! This announcement will only be sent to our backers and people that have signed up to participate in these programs before the 20th of January. We will reveal it to everyone else on the 30th of January 2019.

If these programs are successful, in the future we will take the 3 contestants with the highest score and fly them to our studio to participate in a live game show that will be just like the ones on television but streamed live on the internet. Want to win up to $1,000,000 in front of a live studio audience and millions of viewers online? Well don't answer yet because boy do we have a plot twist. Ask yourself how could these people make these programs anymore rewarding then up to $175,000 a day and up to $1,000,000 a week in prizes? Well, if we reach our goal, we will reveal this plot twist in an email to all our backers the day after our campaign ends.

For our backers who bought a perk that allows you to participate in the live testing of our programs, we anticipate running the first test game in March and the standalone live game show, with prizes, in early April.

We are going to apologize up front. We could put up video's of all the program's we've designed but we can't because you know one of these big companies that we tried to contact, who never saw our programs, wouldn't take our calls, ignored our emails, letters and tweets might try to steal our design. Now we can't have that can we?

What We Need & What You Get

You've probably noticed by now that we are only looking to raise $10,000. We know no one on this site believes this type of program can be done for that amount of money. Well you're correct. We decided that if you, the backers believe these programs are worthy, we will raise more then enough. The more we raise, the faster we can bring all 9 games to the public. That's why we offered perks that include an invitation to a live testing of the games, exclusive access to play the first game and cool T-Shirts and Hats. We also wanted to provide a perk that would help businesses and most of the people using this site to raise money for their projects. So we created a perk where for $1,000 and above, you or your business could reach up to 10 million consumers with an ad in our after game email that the consumer will open. So you, or if you know a business that you think might want to place an ad in our after game email, please spread the word. But we are willing to help those on Indiegogo that can't afford the $1,000 perk. If you have an idea that would benefit both of our projects, lets talk.

All perks include a signed letter and your name listed on the game show site. 

The Games

Here's a brief description of 3 of the programs we have designed.

Ever play the old game Hangman? Well we've taken that great game and turned it into a live interactive game show. Each Winning With Words game show will have 30 puzzles. Players will have one minute to solve each puzzle. At the start of each puzzle clickable letters will show up at the bottom of the players device and a solve button. At any time during the selection of letters a player can click the solve button. Players will receive a bonus for each letter selected after clicking the solve button. After clicking the solve button players must solve the puzzle by spelling the word/phrase correctly or get zero points.

When the first puzzle starts, players will be provided with a hint to help solve it. Players will start selecting letters, but they can only select 5 incorrect letters that are not part of the puzzle. After the 5th wrong letter is clicked, the player must solve the puzzle, spelling it correctly, or get zero points.

This applies to all of our games. Each day, the player with the highest score will win the grand prize of up to $100,000. The winners of the random drawings of up to $25,000 will be selected from all players that finished the game show. The weekly grand prize of up to $1,000,000 will only be given away if their are enough players during each game week to support such a prize. The player with the highest score at the end of the week will win the weekly grand prize of up to $1,000,000. Once we start streaming the live game show, the 3 players with the highest scores and 3 guests will be brought to our studio at our expense to compete for the weekly grand prize of up to $1,000,000. There will be prizes for the other 2 contestants. What are they? Well you'll just have to wait and see.

This game will be played live on the internet starting at 9 pm eastern time every night.

3 players will be joined together live on the internet to go head to head against each other in the Ace's High game. At the start of each puzzle, 13 cards will show up on the players screens. One at a time each player will select a card until someone selects the ace. This will go on for 30 puzzles. But what if no one selects the Ace? Well, guess you'll just have to play to find out!

This game will be available to play 24 hours a day and can be played as many times as you want.

2 Players will be paired up live online. There will be 30 card battles per program. Both players will be dealt 13 cards, 2 through ace. The 2 players will select a card at the same time, the player with the highest card wins. But to win the card battle one player must win 3 out of the 5. What if no one gets to 3 wins? All we're going to say for now, good luck!

This game will be available to play 24 hours a day and can be played as many times as you want.

How will the money raised be used?

1. Fund development of the 8 remaining programs. 

2. Hire more staff for development and maintenance of  programs because every day certain parts of each of these programs will need to be changed.

3. Testing and hosting of programs.

4. Marketing.

5. And much more! We could go into all the things that need to be done, but it would make this section really long and unbearable to read. 

 

Can't contribute, that's OK! You Can still Help.

We know some of you on this site can't contribute but still want to help get these game shows up and running. So here's how you can help. Just subscribe on our site and spread the word. Know someone you think might like one of our perks, let them know and provide them the link.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Ludolph is an abandoned town and we came here to plunder it. But you are not the only one who came here. There are 12 players in one game and they all start the game in different neighborhoods in the town.

Your main goal is to steal as much as you can and leave the town alive. You can defend yourself with the weapons which you find in the houses which you entered to steal precious items. Also with these weapons, you can kill others and get their loot to your wealth!

But in all these rush there is a factor which can stick your thievery. Your character has a stress factor and it is increasing all the time which you are in the town. It will make it difficult to walk, shoot and steal as your amount of stress increases.

But also there is a solution. You can decrease your amount of stress with the energy drinks in the market which you can find in the town center if you want to stay more in the town. Don't forget, everyone has the same amount of stress and the others will come here too when they want to stay in the town more.


 

 The weapons which you took from houses have limited ammunition, so be careful. When you enter the town center you can find ammo in the Ludolph Police Center's arsenal. There are no other arsenal or any place you can find ammo so inside and outside of the police center will be dangerous.

 

 There is also a health clinic in the town center so you can heal yourself in there. First aid and adrenaline syringe are the items which you can heal yourself and you can take a limited amount of medical item with you.


   There are 2 exit locations in the town one; North Exit and one South Exit. You can go to these locations and leave the town.

As you can see our development progress is still continuing. We are taking care to apply best principles to our works in each designing, animating and programming.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • The level design of Ludolph Town, Museum and Headquarters Building.
  • Motion mechanics and animations.
  • Game system, database designing and networking.
  • Steam integration.

  • Weapon mechanics and animations.
  • Character rigging and skinning.
  • Improving completed systems for much better results.
  • Dark Mod DLC.
    • This is a new DLC for the main game which players can join or create a clan and build a new town for their clan. You can defend your town and attack to other towns.
  • Co-Op mod.
    • This mod is not a DLC. You can play with your friends against AI and rob a bank.
  • New map for the main game.
    • 4th map of the game. In a street which has stores on both sides, you can rob the stores and fight all other players on a more wide open area. This map more about fun and it will be more bright.
  • The new single player game which includes the backstory of Dark Inside. 
  • Developing for PlayStation and Xbox.
story_txt:
Ludolph is an abandoned town and we came here to plunder it. But you are not the only one who came here. There are 12 players in one game and they all start the game in different neighborhoods in the town.Your main goal is to steal as much as you can and leave the town alive. You can defend yourself with the weapons which you find in the houses which you entered to steal precious items. Also with these weapons, you can kill others and get their loot to your wealth!But in all these rush there is a factor which can stick your thievery. Your character has a stress factor and it is increasing all the time which you are in the town. It will make it difficult to walk, shoot and steal as your amount of stress increases.But also there is a solution. You can decrease your amount of stress with the energy drinks in the market which you can find in the town center if you want to stay more in the town. Don't forget, everyone has the same amount of stress and the others will come here too when they want to stay in the town more.  The weapons which you took from houses have limited ammunition, so be careful. When you enter the town center you can find ammo in the Ludolph Police Center's arsenal. There are no other arsenal or any place you can find ammo so inside and outside of the police center will be dangerous.  There is also a health clinic in the town center so you can heal yourself in there. First aid and adrenaline syringe are the items which you can heal yourself and you can take a limited amount of medical item with you.   There are 2 exit locations in the town one; North Exit and one South Exit. You can go to these locations and leave the town.As you can see our development progress is still continuing. We are taking care to apply best principles to our works in each designing, animating and programming.        
The level design of Ludolph Town, Museum and Headquarters Building.
Motion mechanics and animations.
Game system, database designing and networking.
Steam integration.

Weapon mechanics and animations.
Character rigging and skinning.
Improving completed systems for much better results.

Dark Mod DLC.This is a new DLC for the main game which players can join or create a clan and build a new town for their clan. You can defend your town and attack to other towns.

Co-Op mod.This mod is not a DLC. You can play with your friends against AI and rob a bank.

New map for the main game.4th map of the game. In a street which has stores on both sides, you can rob the stores and fight all other players on a more wide open area. This map more about fun and it will be more bright.


The new single player game which includes the backstory of Dark Inside. 

Developing for PlayStation and Xbox.

story:
Hi Dear Dog Lovers,

My name is Frodo Zhang, I started developing Puppy Pipy during the Covid-19 pandemic lock down. This game started from an idea: If a puppy separate from his/her owner, what kind of tough journey he/she will have until they unite again?

Base on this question, the first idea came up from my mind is about food, what will the poor wondering puppy eating? What happen after eating the rotten or expired food from junkyard?

My answer is the puppy learns how to use poop to attack enemies. So the first skill is Puppy Poop, just like bomb in The Legend of Zelda. After that I decided the category of this game, a puzzle platformer, name from my dog, Pipy, but the species are different, Pipy in game is a 6 weeks-old golden retriever puppy.

Since I was graduated from Mechanical Engineering, I wish this game can pass sense of accomplishment and joy after solve the real physical puzzle to player, the early puzzles are Chain Reaction-type Machine , including Domino-like or self made rolling ball chain reaction puzzle in room that have video on Youtube. This will be the core gameplay of chapter one.

Except Chain Reaction, each stage focuses on a specific physical property as its core gameplay, such as gravity, bounce, rotation, fluid, and lift.

This game has a heartwarming story which is about a 6 week old golden retriever puppy named Pipy looking for his young master.

*We will donate part of profits to animal shelters.

About Puppy Pipy


Puppy Pipy - a video game for all the people who love dogs. This story is about a 6 week old golden retriever puppy. When he was born he got abandoned. A young boy found him near by a trash bin, and he decided to foster this little puppy. But because of some accidents happened, they forced to be separated. Pipy’s journey to find his young master will show everyone about the wonderful relationship between human and dog. The story happens in Los Angeles, 1940.

 

 


Puppy Pipy is a platformer puzzle game created by Unity engine, and we fully used this engine’s physical properties. In order to provide different playing experiences and the way to show the different physical properties in the 5 stages, we made 5 different core gameplay in each stage, which are gravity, bounce, rotation, fluid, and lift. Because of these physical properties are almost same as the real world, there is more than one way to beat each challenge, everyone can opens their mind and finds the fastest way and secret methods to solve all the puzzles they encountered in their journey.

 


Pipy is a smart puppy, even though there are many challenges in his journey, Pipy will use his smart brain and different skills to solve the puzzles. In each stage Pipy will get a unique item, such as Dog poop, tennis, Frisbee, and water gun, these items are very helpful to help Pipy overcomes the challenge and defeat each enemy. In order to make our journey more fun and challenging, Pipy will learn many useful skills such double jump, super dash, gliding, and emergency evasions. If you can use emergency evasion in the right timing, Pipy will move to enemies and defeat them immediately, this skill can also helps Pipy reach to many areas that he can’t get to in the normal situation.




Pipy will meet many friends in his adventure. A black dog will give food to Pipy when he is starved. A hamster will help Pipy escape from prison. A mother duck will ask Pipy’s help to find her son. A kind and smart old lady will give Pipy some wisdom ideas. They are not just simply interacting with Pipy, but also teach Pipy skills.

What We Need & What You Get

  • The game almost finish 3/5,  but do not have enough budget for drawing rest of the characters and background, we need funding for hiring a artist to finish them.
  • Totally about $3000 USD including environment design art , background music and some sound effects.
  • Supporter will get chance to design puzzles and animal characters, even bring your dog in our game. Also every backers name will be in the staff roll credits special thanks part.
  • Puppy Pipy will release on Steam, Epic Games store, Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, Android and iPhone.
  • Currently on Steam Early Access, including chapter one, the other chapters are coming soon. We try to add one new chapter each month.
  • If we don't reach our entire goal, the funds will use on background art, we will do our best reuse them but make it looks different.

From Photo to Game

 

 

  • Puppy Pipy is a video game combines with both good storytelling of puppy and the real physical puzzle. Might be only few games in this hybrid game category.  
  • With backers help, we will make Puppy Pipy more than five chapters, including side story with other characters in the game. We might add multiplayer mode in the future, of course player enable choose different dog they like.

 

The Impact

  • We will donate part of profits to animal shelters.

 

Risks & Challenges

Since Puppy Pipy is almost finish but lack of background art design, the risk is very small.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share us some stories about you and your dog, or some touching stories you heard from other people.
  • Please share Puppy Pipy indiegogo page with your friends if you like this game.
  • You can add Puppy Pipy in your wish list on Steam or purchase it on February 18th.
  • The price on steam will raise after early access.
  • Steam link  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1523010/Pupp...

story:
Hunt be Hunted - Action game set in the Jungle 

survive in the Jungle by Hunting those wild animals with your hunting dog side by side.

Overview

’Hunt Be Hunted’’ is a Hunting game. In order to survive in dangerous place like jungle, where there is no mercy, nobody’s there to rescue you except your dog unless it’s still alive. you ‘ll be in your own with your hunting dog.

Explore the most dangerous and amazing jungle in the world while hunting with your dog, any animal kill gets you money so you can buy any type of weapon (guns, machetes, arrows, even dogs). You will be hunting with your dog in 10 amazing, dangerous and deadliest jungle in the world which are:
1. Amazon Rainforest
2. Sambisa Forest
3. Crooked Forest
4. singy Forest
5. Black forest
6. Aokigahara forest
7. Hoia Baciu forest, Romania
8. Daintree Rainforest
9. Jog Falls
10. Jiuzhaigou
Everyone has a survivor side within themselves, let’s ‘’Hunt Be Hunting’’ reveals yours.

                                            
Everyone knows Jungle isn’t a safe place for an ordinary human being, in the jungle there is everything you don’t wish to come across like tigers, lions, snake, crocodile, rhinoceros, cobra, hyenas, hippopotamus, etc.…. if you don’t kill them, they will certainly kill you for they breakfast or whatever they want to call it. In this game you will be hunting them as well they will be hunting you for their next meal. The most dangerous animal you will kill the most money you will get, you will be hunting in the most dangerous jungle across the world. In this game we’ve selected 10 most wonderful and very dangerous jungle which are:

1-Amazon Rainforest

The Amazon rainforest, covering much of northwestern Brazil and extending into Colombia, Peru and other South American countries, is the world’s largest tropical rainforest, famed for its biodiversity.

 

2-Sambisa Forest

The Sambisa Forest is a forest in Borno State, northeast Nigeria. It is in the southwestern part of Chad Basin National Park, about 60 kilometres (37 mi) southeast of Maiduguri, the capital of Borno State.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

3-Crooked Forest

The Crooked Forest, is a grove of oddly-shaped pine trees located outside Nowe Czarnowo near the town of Gryfino, West Pomerania, Poland. This grove of 400 pines was planted in around 1930, when it was still located within the German province of Pomerania.

 

4- Tsingy Forest

Tsingy de Bemaraha is located near the western coast of Madagascar in Melaky Region at 18°40′S 44°45′E.

 

5-Black forest

The Black Forest is a mountainous region in southwest Germany, bordering France.

 

6-Aokigahara forest

Aokigahara, also known as the Sea of Trees, is a forest on the northwestern flank of Japan's Mount Fuji, thriving on 30 square kilometres of hardened lava laid down by the last major eruption of Mount Fuji in 864 CE.

 

7-Hoia Baciu forest, Romania

The Hoia Forest (Romanian: Pădurea Hoia; Hungarian: Hója-erdő) is a forest situated to the west of the city of Cluj-Napoca, near the open-air section of the Ethnographic Museum of Transylvania.

 

8- Daintree Rainforest

The Daintree Rainforest is a region on the northeast coast of Queensland, Australia, north of Mossman and Cairns.

 

9-Jog Falls

Jog Falls is located near Jog Village in Sagara, Karnataka which is a part of Shimoga district. Jog Falls is also known as, Joga jalapatha and Jogada gundi in the regional Kannada language.

 

10-Jiuzhaigou

Jiuzhaigou is a network of valleys in China’s Sichuan province. In the northern Shuzheng Valley, Nuorilang Waterfall cascades from the edge of a large tree-fringed lake.

As you can see up here every jungle has a number of animals you have to kill to unlock the next dangerous jungle, and every animal kill brings money to your account so you can buy a new weapon or Dog to help you in your hunting.

Main CHARACTER

 

PLATFORMS:

We will release the game on PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, Xbox One and Windows and MacOS in Steam.  

We have little gift for our backers:

Diamond backers = $100

The game + T-shirt with your name on it and sign by the owner of the game

 

 
   

           

Gold Backers = $78
The game + T-shirt with your name on it.

   

 

Silver Backers = $70
The Game + T-shirt

  

 

Platinum Backers = $49
The Game

 

Fanatic Backers = $45
T-shirt your name on it and sign by the owner of the game

 

Regular Backers = $45
T-shirt your name on it

 

Simple backers= $35
T-shirt

 

For those who will like different color you can see the available colors and size.

 

MAROON

 

SMOKE GRAY

 

WHITE

 

KELLY GREEN

 

YELLOW

story:
Short Summary

Hi! I am Chastity VonFae, a pole dancer and aerialist here in Baltimore. 

I have often noticed, and you may have as well, a distinct lack of the proper ambiance for gaming in strip clubs and burlesque venues. And games, much as I love them, have an equally distinct lack of sexy dancing and/or fully stocked bar. Let’s fix it with money!

We’re planning for Friday, September 25th, Comic Con weekend, and we'll be at an undetermined location!

The Event

It's called High Rollers because we're going for a classy casino-styled event, except with games you care about and performances relevant to your interests. 

  • Instead of house games, there are games of Cards Against Humanity and Munchkin, where you donate to charity to enter, and get prizes from Third Eye Comics, and Geppi's gift shop when you win!
  • We will have open gaming space, with reserved tables for backers only.
  • We have a varied line-up: belly dance, pole dancing, aerial ribbons and classic burlesque acts. 
  • The performance and the gaming will be on different floors, so you could spend your entire evening with just one or the other, or mix it up however you please.
  • Lady gamers, we would never forget you (we are you!). If women aren’t your thing, we have got you covered! We’ll have at least two gentleman dancers for you to lure over with dollars to bring luck to your game. (When they're not performing, of course. Can you say Sexy Loki without getting the vapors? Cause I sure can’t.)
This is a by-gamers-for-gamers event, though non-gamers are welcome! There is no shortage of things to see and do, in an environment that is fun, classy, and made for fans of pop culture.

What We Need & What You Get

Our base goal is $3,500. Of that, $2,000 is for the venue and bar, $1100 covers performers and DJs, and $400 covers perks and crowdfunding fees. This is the *bare minimum* we need to make it happen, which is why this is a all-or-nothing (fixed funding) campaign.  If we don't reach our goal, we can't do it.  Everything will be refunded, and the event doesn't happen. But we can reach that goal with just 125 people, so get the word out! 

Our primary perk for backers is advance admission. You get to come play with us and enjoy the show, the fun and the location. Yay! You also get a guaranteed spot, and some perks include table reservations, for varying times and numbers of people. There will be a limit on attendees, so be sure to get a spot for your favorite party people. 

Once we hit that goal, we are in glorious stretch goal territory. A better bar, an arcade, more costumes, more performances, perk boosts, refreshments, we have SO MANY great ideas to make this an awesome time that you'll be talking about for years to come. 

And if this is a *big* success, we'll do it again! Any overage that isn't used to improve the event or perks will go towards reserving the museum for next year.

The Impact

Paying tribute to my beloved games and films in my performances is one of my favorite things to do. Unfortunately, my audiences rarely share my interests enough to recognize me, so I don't get to put on shows that I really want to share. I'm not alone in this; all of the dancers staffing this event are really excited about a themed night with guests who will actually recognize their costumes.  

From the audience's perspective, our organizers and supporters are really interested in being able to  go out for adult entertainment, while still being able to hear each other and sit down for a game with friends.

Our core team is who you see in the video. There's me, and I'm handling the performances, and Erin, who is handling the booking, planning and overall organizing.  Then we've got a bunch of volunteers and performers, just waiting for an audience (that's you)!

Risks & Challenges

It is possible that we might have change location for some reason. In such case, we might have to settle for a different location, but THE SHOW WILL GO ON!

We're are blessed with a wide network of talented entertainers here in Baltimore, so if our performers or DJs need a substitute, we are covered.

Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you can't contribute, and that's cool; we get that.  But you can still help by getting the word out. Indiegogo has a bunch of share tools over there, or just pass it on to someone you know would enjoy this event. 

We are really hoping to get this event off the ground, so we hope you’ll sign up early, and throw in a little extra magic if you can, just so we can all say this happened.

Can't wait to see you there. :)

Chastity VonFae

Our core team is who you see in the video. There's me, and I'm handling the performances, and Erin, who is handling the booking, planning and overall organizing.  Then we've got a bunch of volunteers and performers, just waiting for an audience (that's you)!   Risks & Challenges  
It is possible that we might have change location for some reason. In such case, we might have to settle for a different location, but THE SHOW WILL GO ON!
We're are blessed with a wide network of talented entertainers here in Baltimore, so if our performers or DJs need a substitute, we are covered.   Other Ways You Can Help Maybe you can't contribute, and that's cool; we get that.  But you can still help by getting the word out. Indiegogo has a bunch of share tools over there, or just pass it on to someone you know would enjoy this event. 
We are really hoping to get this event off the ground, so we hope you’ll sign up early, and throw in a little extra magic if you can, just so we can all say this happened.

Can't wait to see you there. :)
Chastity VonFae

story:
Available for: PC, Linux, Mac
Genre: Strategy - Singleplayer & Multiplayer (Cross platform)
Languages: English, Turkish, (willing for many more)

Campaign Type: Fixed Funding- if we cannot reach our goal, you will get your money back.

Our Steam Greenlight page.

Flawed Ones: Puppeteer is a result of my passion that games are not just simple fun sources, but they should be pieces of art. This game is based on the key features that I value most: theme, atmosphere, scenario, characters, decision making, and unique gameplay elements.

Our main character is a simple puppeteer who wanders between towns and cities to make a living. One day he performs a show about some poor children who steal a delicious looking cake, but they are beaten to death by guards. Surprisingly, what happens in his show while he performs, happens right in front of the audience as well. That day our main character, the puppeteer, gains the power of controlling people from his shadow theater stage.

The following events after this intro will be processed in a realistic and logical way. The puppeteer is neither a defender of justice nor bringer of pain and destruction. Within the unjust kingdom that he lives in, he will (or maybe will not) discover his own soul through the temptation of power and benefits, while experiencing the elements of human nature.

Main features:

  • Unique shadow play theme and scenario
  • 8 types of units, 3 types of towers, 3 types of buildings & 1 castle, 6 types of skills/tools, 5 types of buildings which can be captured, and more than 200 upgrades
  • Unique gameplay: Strategy, simulated combat and action combination
  • Indirect decision making system via short shadow play shows
  • Dynamic change between shadow play and cartoonish graphics
  • Cross platform multiplayer available

Making this detailed strategy game and not making a multi player gameplay would be shameful. So we did that too. It is currently working.

Why don't you share a demo if the game is working?

Approaching this kind of development starting with multi player mode is our design choice and our free testing server has room for only 20 people. This kind of strategy game requires a complete AI for proper experience. In the trailer you see a multi player match. Also there are missing animations and sounds, which we will make them with the funding. We can avoid them in the trailer but players would probably irritated by them in a demo edition.

1) Main Strategy Gameplay:

Basically there are 3 main lanes that the player utilizes. Players can capture buildings, build buildings, train units, and use battle tools/skills. Depending on the territories, the scene becomes shady or colorful. Shades represents the puppeteer's area for he controls his army from his shadow play stage. You need to build and upgrade certain buildings to train squads. They all have unique skills which would vary the strategy. For example your Camel Riders can pass through the melee soldiers if they see an Archer or Catapult. But if there is a Spearman, Camel Riders cannot reach the ranged units.

One of the most important factors in this kind of game is distance. Distance affects almost everything in the game. The winning side is always disadvantaged by the distance. For example when player fires the Great Ballista, the cooldown will not start until the arrow hits the target, so the losing side will be able to use them more frequently. 


Buildings which can be captured give bonuses to players. Like increased income, damage, etc. Players can build markets, camps and towers on lanes. Markets give extra income as player builds it farther away from his/her castle. Camps are for garrisoning squads. Towers are for holding armies.

There are over 200 upgrades in total for most of the things in the game. You can increase your Mortar's area of effect, attack speed of your Spearman, construction speed of your towers, capacity of your camps, etc. That helps to create a vast strategical variance.

There are also screens to show you detailed summary of your forces. When you click on your castle, this screen appears.

2) Mini Shadow Theatre Shows:

Mini shows are basically mini games with no close relation to the main story. They are the indirect decision making mechanism of the game and they will affect the game scenario. This will be another unique feature of the game. There will also be direct decisions, which will be chosen by the puppeteer himself.

The player have these options which will affect the main scenario indirectly:

1) Catch the butterfly.

2) Catch and release the butterfly afterwards.

3) Do not catch the butterfly and wait until it flies away.

3) Cinematics:

There are many cinematic scenes in the game. We think our art is really unique and suits well with the concept and scenario. With enough funding, there will be more endings as well!

Here is the intro cinematic with voice over:

       

4) Special Shooter Level:

Well it is a little bit of spoiler but I really want to make an awesome shooter level as well, which you will control a berserk giant elephant mounted by axe throwing barbarians! This will be made if we reach related stretch goal.

We have been working on this project for about a year. We have taken external help from time to time with a very limited budget, and have not worked at any full time job in order to be solely developing this game. At long last, this is our first stop to raise some support for this game. Any contribution is going to help me have an increased budget for making a more detailed game.

We need funding for graphics, sounds, and plugins which will ease the job. Also Unity Pro license (we won't even buy it, we will just subscribe for 1 year for reduced cost). Basically it is needed for everything that I cannot do by myself as the game designer, programmer, and scenarist of the game. The funding will not be used for personal use. Until the last stretch goal, we will spend the entire funding for the game. For this reason we cannot spend money for physical objects which would be sent by cargo. There will hardly remain any extra money unless the funding exceeds the last stretch goal. We plan to use the extra money for translating the game into more languages.

                                            (This graph is mainly for 6000$ case)


    


> $6000:

  • Scenario levels: 7
  • Mini shows: 6
  • Cinematic length: ~23 minutes
  • Battle tools: 6
  • Graphical variety: Sufficient
  • Sound track length: Sufficient
  • Multiplayer: 1v1
  • Naval battles and units: Yes
  • Voice acting: No

> $7000:

  • Scenario levels: 7
  • Mini shows: 6
  • Cinematic length: ~25 minutes
  • Battle tools: 8
  • Graphical variety: Extra
  • Sound track length: Extra
  • Multiplayer: 1v1
  • Naval battles and units: Yes
  • Voice acting: Yes

> $8000:

  • Scenario levels: 7 + bonus shooter level
  • Mini shows: 7
  • Cinematic length: ~28  minutes
  • Battle tools: 8
  • Graphical variety: Extra+
  • Sound track length: Extra+
  • Multiplayer: 1v1
  • Naval battles and units: Yes
  • Voice acting: Yes

> $9000:

  • Scenario levels: 7 + bonus shooter level
  • Mini shows: 7
  • Cinematic length: ~30 minutes
  • Battle tools: 9
  • Graphical variety: Extra++
  • Sound track length: Extra++
  • Multiplayer: 1v1, 2v2
  • Naval battles and units: Yes
  • Voice acting: Yes



> $3 Special Thanks:

We thank you for your contribution. You will receive a custom wallpaper and your name will be written in the credits.

> $5-7-9 Game:

Get the digital copy of the game. You will receive a key to play it on Steam if the game passes Greenlight. Your name will be written in the credits and you will still get a custom wallpaper.

> $14 Silver Package:

All previous perks +

Receive a complete digital copy of the soundtrack.

> $19 Golden Package:

All previous perks +

Receive an exclusive wallpaper, as well as the strategy guide of the game.

> $24 Platinum Package:

All previous perks +

Artwork & development progress book. The book will include materials about concept designs, prototypes, memories and difficulties during the development.

> $29 Titanium Package:

All previous perks +

A short digital comic book which is about the alternate story of the puppeteer.

> $50 Early Access + Special Skin

All previous perks + 

You will be able to play the game before the beta version releases, play multiplayer matches with us, and you will get a special skin only available during crowdfunding, which will be available for multiplayer as well.

> $75 You Are A Puppet

All previous perks +

One of the puppets in the game will be referenced from your face.

> $100 Access Granted

All previous perks +

You will be able to access to our all unused, old material: the very first prototype of the game with the graphics completely done by me 6 months ago which also works on multiplayer. Tons of old screenshots, and 2D models which show how the game evolved into this stage. You will be able to see the whole development progress in all details.

> $150 Producer

All previous perks +

Your name will be written under the title of "Co-producers" in the credits.

> $500 The One That Changes The Story

All previous perks except The One That Tells The Story +

Your face will be referenced to create a very special puppet. That character has an important and direct effect on the story but we cannot tell how. It is a spoiler!

> $500 The One That Tells The Story

All previous perks except The One That Changes the Story +

You will write one of the mini show's with decisions. You will be able to choose decoration and character speeches as well for that show. We will assist you with that for staying loyal to the game's main scenario

Risks

For being a small team, the project was under more risk until showing it here. Currently, with most of the game mechanics ready, the game is planned well enough to be finished. With the funding we are willing to have, the rest of the workload for further development is clear for us. 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can always tell a friend about the game, share the game on social media or vote yes on Steam Greenlight. We would be very happy to get any help to make our dream come true.

Credits

Sounds and Musics:

Ian Bailey

Cinematics | Graphics and Animations:

Faysal Saraban

2D In-game | Graphics and Animations:

Faysal Saraban

İlteriş Bahçeci

Nail Akıncı

Deborah Saez

Christian Hermosilla

Shader and Minor Programming:

Bora Yalçıner

Logo and Artwork:

İlteriş Bahçeci

Voice Actor (Puppeteer):

Steve L. Vernon

story:
DRINKING GAME DICE - D4F

Support our dice game.

It's super easy!

  1. Decide how many dice you would like then click the pink button that says "GET THIS PERK".
  2. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.
  3. You will receive an email to choose your colors (based on your perk).
  4. We receive your color choices and prepare your shipment
  5. You receive your order and enjoy D4F - Ultimate summer drinking game 2016!
     

1 Dice
12 sides
12 rules
Unlimited number of players
Priceless fun with friends

 

We all have those times in our lives when we need to have fun and relax and enjoy with friends.

We love to hang out with friends, drink and party in club.
When you have a gathering of friends, or making party, guest are usually a little stiff, it take time to relax. The easiest way is with good music and a drink. To speed up the heating of fun, we invented a game with dice, which will boost the fun to the maximum. The other option was just sitting, talking and slow drinking. Some time ago, we set our sights on completely changing the way people relax.

In a previous company where I worked on various promotions, I maintained around 150 events a year. I always thinking how can guest's from the club can takes part of the fun with tham further. Companies with drinks, usually had a sweepstakes in which people are awarded with various gifts according to the number of drinks they consume. Gifts lighters, key chains, T-shirts ..

When I was a kid, I remembered how we like to play with small wooden whirligig, turns it spun and fell to one of the sides where is engraved what the player does. Then they were gambling games for money and the rules in style: Give a coin, take a coin, all players give that player a coin ..

I came up with the idea to modify these rules and make my own. I came up with to make cube to throw and that on each side is rule. I designed some 34 rules, the classic cube of six sides had become too small, made a summary of the dodecahedron dice with 12 sides/12 rules. In the second stage I was thinking how to make a cube in multiple languages, it's costly production because for every language I have to make a new mold and a new series of dices. The investment is increasingly growing. I come up with ideas to make ideograms - icons that each has a particular meaning such rules. King - all male players drink, Monkey - drink a sip from the glass of the hands ...

I invented symbols, then found approximate examples in what directions I want to be done, and hired professional designers to improve them. After that is made 3D animation for prototyping with 3D printer. Dice Is sent to friends in various parts of the world to try it with own friends and give their opinion about the game and whole idea.

Incorporating this presentation and with your help, by this way we collect funds for mass production of the first batch of 1,000 pieces of dices. With the dice will come and package which will be given rules of the game in several languages. Although already from icons can be easy concluded what is expected from players to do.

If you are a manufacturer or distributor of some of the drinks we can offer you a special offer through Indiegogo and logo of your brand on the dice 1-2 positions, and on the packaging where will be rules.

We tested it thoroughly, played around the world and used it on the hardest conditions. Everyone LOVED it! And now we are ready to share it with YOU! 

 

 

The enigma of the Roman Dodecahedra

The Roman dodecahedron is a small, hollow object made of bronze or (more rarely) stone, with a geometrical shape that has twelve flat faces. Each face is a pentagon, a five-sided shape. The Roman dodecahedra are also embellished with a series of knobs on each corner point of the pentagons, and the pentagon faces in most cases contain circular holes in them.  More than 200 years after they were first discovered, researchers are no closer to understanding the origin and function of this mysterious object.

The Roman dodecahedra date from the 2nd or 3rd centuries AD, and typicall range from 4cm to 11cm in size. To date, more than one hundred of these artifacts have been found across Great Britain, Belgium, Germany, France, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Austria, Switzerland, and Hungary.

 

The great mystery is: how do they work and what do they do? Unfortunately, there is no documentation or notes about them from the time of their creation, so the function of these dodecahedra has not been determined. Nevertheless, many theories and speculations have been put forward over the centuries: candlestick holders (wax was found inside one example), dice, survey instruments, devices for determining the optimal sowing date for winter grain, gauges to calibrate water pipes or standard army bases, staff or scepter decorations, a toy to throw and catch on a stick, or simply a geometric sculpture.

Another unproven theory claims that the dodecahedra are religious relics, once used as sacred tools for the druids of Britannia and Caledonia. However, there is no written account or archaeological evidence to support this view. Could it be that this strange item was simply a toy or a recreational game for legionnaires, during the war campaigns? Some sources suggest they were the central objects in a bowl game similar to that of our days, with these artifacts used as markers and the players throwing stones to land them in the holes within the dodecahedra.

Despite the many unanswered questions, one thing is certain, the Roman dodecahedra were highly valued by their owners.  This is evidenced by the fact that a number of them were found among treasure hoards, among coins and other valuable items.  We may never know the true purpose of the Roman dodecahedra, but we can only hope that advances in archaeology will unearth more clues that will help solve this ancient enigma.

http://www.foxnews.com/tech/2011/06/10/dodecahedrons-purpose-remains-mystery.html

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roman_dodecahedron
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dodecahedron
http://dodecahedral.com

 

 

 

MEDIA support

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We made idea, game playing rules, original icon design, full promotional kit, web presentation, prototype and need your help to finish it.
We need to reach 5.000US$ or more in funding for making mould and first line of manufacture.
Making mould for mass production is complicated and expencive more than 2.000US$. Yes we can do it cheeper by 3D printing and than each dice will cost around 40US$. 
For your help with this project we offer you back interesting perks with great discount.

 

 

Use it anywhere

The D4F™ can be used on any surface such as bar table or beach. Don’t worry, the surface of the ground doesn’t have to be perfectly smooth or soft. The D4F™ can also endure rougher surfaces such as those with (small) rocks,  or hard pavement.

There is no limitation on player number, more is betther. More friends, more fun, betther game story.

 

Colors

The D4F™ comes in several beautiful colors, and is available exclusively on Indiegogo. 

 

Timeline

 

 

Want to sell the D4F™ in your store?
Awesome! Just click on the button below to email us with your info.

 

 

The Team

The D4F™ team consists of a group of marketing managers who spend their time with new marketing ideas, guerilla marketing, promotional stuff and having fund with friends. Our team has grown to a modest 5 part-timers who share a passion for edm music festivals, traveling, outdoor experiences, relaxing and creating outstanding products. We've got over 25 years of organising high performance events and promotions. 

Risks & Challenges

The risks is not minimal - there is no risk. We play on all or nothing, so if project will be successfully funded we will make D4F dice game. This is one of our many projects what we have done before. So we feel that we know what challenges will arise, and for sure we know how to handle them. You can visit our business profiles on Linkedin and see what we have done before.
We have already received quotes from a manufacture factory and are excited to bring with your suport the D4F-  Drinking game 12 side dice to life.

 

 

 

1. When can I choose the color of my D4F – dice for friends?
We will send out a random colour. If you've purchased more than one D4F, based on your perk option you can choose different available colors!

2. When will I receive my D4F Original?
We can guarantee the first 1,000 pieces to be shipped before the end of July.

3. What is the size of D4F?
D4F is shiped in small packaging, poly bag and cardboard with game rules, dice dimensions are 18 mm x 18 mm.

4. What kind of material is the D4F made of?
Super strong, lightweight, resin with transparent or full non toxic colours. 

5. Where D4F will come from?
D4F origin idea comes from far away childhood days and is made in Croatia / Europe.

6. How many players can play?
D4F dice game can play unlimiter number of players, more is betther, more friends more fun.

7. On what kind of terrain can I use the D4F?
You can play with D4F on almost any terrain. We've tested it on sharp rocks, uneven ground, the jungle, concrete surface, grassland and on all indoors surfaces. 

 

Other ways You Can Help

Any pledge amount brings us one step closer to our goal. We need your help to bring these to market! Help us make Drinking game dice possible by clicking on a perk and trying our product or by helping us spread the word by sharing our page. U can simple use the Indiegogo share tools.


Have a question? If the info above doesn't help, you can ask the project creator directly. Game can be played with any liquid beverage, we encourages everyone to drink and play responsibly. Don't drink and drive!

Thank you so much for your support!
