We receive your color choices and prepare your shipment
You receive your order and enjoy D4F - Ultimate summer drinking game 2016! 
1 Dice12 sides12 rulesUnlimited number of playersPriceless fun with friends We all have those times in our lives when we need to have fun and relax and enjoy with friends.We love to hang out with friends, drink and party in club.When you have a gathering of friends, or making party, guest are usually a little stiff, it take time to relax. The easiest way is with good music and a drink. To speed up the heating of fun, we invented a game with dice, which will boost the fun to the maximum. The other option was just sitting, talking and slow drinking. Some time ago, we set our sights on completely changing the way people relax.In a previous company where I worked on various promotions, I maintained around 150 events a year. I always thinking how can guest's from the club can takes part of the fun with tham further. Companies with drinks, usually had a sweepstakes in which people are awarded with various gifts according to the number of drinks they consume. Gifts lighters, key chains, T-shirts ..When I was a kid, I remembered how we like to play with small wooden whirligig, turns it spun and fell to one of the sides where is engraved what the player does. Then they were gambling games for money and the rules in style: Give a coin, take a coin, all players give that player a coin ..I came up with the idea to modify these rules and make my own. I came up with to make cube to throw and that on each side is rule. I designed some 34 rules, the classic cube of six sides had become too small, made a summary of the dodecahedron dice with 12 sides/12 rules. In the second stage I was thinking how to make a cube in multiple languages, it's costly production because for every language I have to make a new mold and a new series of dices. The investment is increasingly growing. I come up with ideas to make ideograms - icons that each has a particular meaning such rules. King - all male players drink, Monkey - drink a sip from the glass of the hands ...I invented symbols, then found approximate examples in what directions I want to be done, and hired professional designers to improve them. After that is made 3D animation for prototyping with 3D printer. Dice Is sent to friends in various parts of the world to try it with own friends and give their opinion about the game and whole idea.Incorporating this presentation and with your help, by this way we collect funds for mass production of the first batch of 1,000 pieces of dices. With the dice will come and package which will be given rules of the game in several languages. Although already from icons can be easy concluded what is expected from players to do.If you are a manufacturer or distributor of some of the drinks we can offer you a special offer through Indiegogo and logo of your brand on the dice 1-2 positions, and on the packaging where will be rules.We tested it thoroughly, played around the world and used it on the hardest conditions. Everyone LOVED it! And now we are ready to share it with YOU!   The enigma of the Roman DodecahedraThe Roman dodecahedron is a small, hollow object made of bronze or (more rarely) stone, with a geometrical shape that has twelve flat faces. Each face is a pentagon, a five-sided shape. The Roman dodecahedra are also embellished with a series of knobs on each corner point of the pentagons, and the pentagon faces in most cases contain circular holes in them.  More than 200 years after they were first discovered, researchers are no closer to understanding the origin and function of this mysterious object.The Roman dodecahedra date from the 2nd or 3rd centuries AD, and typicall range from 4cm to 11cm in size. To date, more than one hundred of these artifacts have been found across Great Britain, Belgium, Germany, France, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Austria, Switzerland, and Hungary. The great mystery is: how do they work and what do they do? Unfortunately, there is no documentation or notes about them from the time of their creation, so the function of these dodecahedra has not been determined. Nevertheless, many theories and speculations have been put forward over the centuries: candlestick holders (wax was found inside one example), dice, survey instruments, devices for determining the optimal sowing date for winter grain, gauges to calibrate water pipes or standard army bases, staff or scepter decorations, a toy to throw and catch on a stick, or simply a geometric sculpture.Another unproven theory claims that the dodecahedra are religious relics, once used as sacred tools for the druids of Britannia and Caledonia. However, there is no written account or archaeological evidence to support this view. Could it be that this strange item was simply a toy or a recreational game for legionnaires, during the war campaigns? Some sources suggest they were the central objects in a bowl game similar to that of our days, with these artifacts used as markers and the players throwing stones to land them in the holes within the dodecahedra.Despite the many unanswered questions, one thing is certain, the Roman dodecahedra were highly valued by their owners.  This is evidenced by the fact that a number of them were found among treasure hoards, among coins and other valuable items.  We may never know the true purpose of the Roman dodecahedra, but we can only hope that advances in archaeology will unearth more clues that will help solve this ancient enigma.http://www.foxnews.com/tech/2011/06/10/dodecahedrons-purpose-remains-mystery.htmlhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roman_dodecahedronhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dodecahedronhttp://dodecahedral.com   MEDIA support  What We Need & What You GetWe made idea, game playing rules, original icon design, full promotional kit, web presentation, prototype and need your help to finish it.We need to reach 5.000US$ or more in funding for making mould and first line of manufacture.Making mould for mass production is complicated and expencive more than 2.000US$. Yes we can do it cheeper by 3D printing and than each dice will cost around 40US$. For your help with this project we offer you back interesting perks with great discount.  Use it anywhereThe D4F™ can be used on any surface such as bar table or beach. Don’t worry, the surface of the ground doesn’t have to be perfectly smooth or soft. The D4F™ can also endure rougher surfaces such as those with (small) rocks,  or hard pavement.There is no limitation on player number, more is betther. More friends, more fun, betther game story. ColorsThe D4F™ comes in several beautiful colors, and is available exclusively on Indiegogo.  Timeline  Want to sell the D4F™ in your store?Awesome! Just click on the button below to email us with your info.CLICK HERE   
The Team
The D4F™ team consists of a group of marketing managers who spend their time with new marketing ideas, guerilla marketing, promotional stuff and having fund with friends. Our team has grown to a modest 5 part-timers who share a passion for edm music festivals, traveling, outdoor experiences, relaxing and creating outstanding products. We've got over 25 years of organising high performance events and promotions. Risks & ChallengesThe risks is not minimal - there is no risk. We play on all or nothing, so if project will be successfully funded we will make D4F dice game. This is one of our many projects what we have done before. So we feel that we know what challenges will arise, and for sure we know how to handle them. You can visit our business profiles on Linkedin and see what we have done before.We have already received quotes from a manufacture factory and are excited to bring with your suport the D4F-  Drinking game 12 side dice to life.   1. When can I choose the color of my D4F – dice for friends?We will send out a random colour. If you've purchased more than one D4F, based on your perk option you can choose different available colors!2. When will I receive my D4F Original?We can guarantee the first 1,000 pieces to be shipped before the end of July.3. What is the size of D4F?D4F is shiped in small packaging, poly bag and cardboard with game rules, dice dimensions are 18 mm x 18 mm.4. What kind of material is the D4F made of?Super strong, lightweight, resin with transparent or full non toxic colours. 5. Where D4F will come from?D4F origin idea comes from far away childhood days and is made in Croatia / Europe.6. How many players can play?D4F dice game can play unlimiter number of players, more is betther, more friends more fun.7. On what kind of terrain can I use the D4F?You can play with D4F on almost any terrain. We've tested it on sharp rocks, uneven ground, the jungle, concrete surface, grassland and on all indoors surfaces.  
Other ways You Can Help
Any pledge amount brings us one step closer to our goal. We need your help to bring these to market! Help us make Drinking game dice possible by clicking on a perk and trying our product or by helping us spread the word by sharing our page. U can simple use the Indiegogo share tools.Have a question? If the info above doesn't help, you can ask the project creator directly. Game can be played with any liquid beverage, we encourages everyone to drink and play responsibly. Don't drink and drive!Thank you so much for your support!

story:
Doodform is an interesting and exciting team game, the theme of which is the struggle between solid and plane figures. 

   Players of both teams have to kill as many opponents as possible. There is only one card in the deck which kills players, Doodform, and it is impossible to track it. That makes the game more intriguing. This game will not only be a lot of fun, but will also develop your team skills and intuition. 
1 deck of Doodform - 54 playing cards.
There are 13 unique cards.


    We would like people to provide more  interraction between each other, instead of spending time in virtual reality. Creating Doodform, we want to show that time that you spend with friends can be fun without gadgets, and even develop your team skills and intuition.

    We created this campaign to raise funds for the printing and distribution of the game. We need $ 600 for minimum order and all necessary materials. But if we receive more, we will make presents for all backers!  

    We need your support. In return we offer you the following suggestions:

$12+ You will receive one copy of Doodform


$21+ You will receive one copy of Doodform
+ Handmade slider box
+ Letter of thanks from creators 


$29+ You will receive Two copies of Doodform
+ Free worldwide shipping 


$109+ You will receive 10 copies of Doodform
+ Letter of thanks from creators


    Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Make some noise about Doodform.
  • Use share tools on this campaign!

story:
About PlayGiver

    Never ONLY Watching youtube

    Youtube is The Mine

    Ownership benefit : You receive 0.1% of all the gold players produce in your mine in account experience points.

    • The ownership of mines will be reset every quarter.  
    • The mines have a record of all the past owners.  
    • Original owners of video contents! Join Playgiver and get verified as original owners. Once you are verified, you can receive 0.1% of all the gold players produce with your contents in account experience points.
    • Account level up = more hero available

    Beta Access Benefit

    • The Registration Day
    • An opportunity to first register a URLs of a famous YouTube video with more than 100 million views to your mine and be the first on the mine owners list.

    • Seize the opportunity to become the first owner of the URL of famous billions videos like Gangnam Style, What Do You Mean and Hello!

    • Indiegogo Benefit: 6 months of ownership

    Achievement Rewards

    Get achievement rewards by becoming one of our backers with just $1.

      Our Schedule

      Risks & Challenges

      - Updates of our project will be posted on playgiver.com
      Currently, we are developing an IOS version and we have completed an app UI design. The application is not complete yet because we had to revise our development plans and change the design completely but you can still produce resources and level-up your characters completing quests online. We are planning to launch this application officially in December 2017 but since the development planning is complete, the development process will be shortened more than we initially expected. We will try our best to begin the service after launching the BETA Accees in Jul 2017 and also update the UI of the web version so you can fully experience the game after closing the funding.

story:
Short Summary

Hi, I'm Rudy and I'm an indie developer. That's right, there's no company, just me. My primary platform is Android and I have a few apps & games (~20) in Google Play. 

I have plenty of satisfied users, but some of them have switched to iOS. They're looking for apps they used to love on Android, but sadly - there's nothing to be found. And that's where you come in - to fill the emptiness inside their (and your) soul. First app that I'm going to port is Currency Converter!


Why Curency Converter?

  • Paid version has rating 4.7 / 5, free version (with ADs) has rating 4.5 / 5. So the users love the app (even more than other currency converters from big companies)
  • It has been on Google Play since 2009, yet still more and more users download it daily.
  • You can have up to 15 different currencies on screen at the same time.
  • Conversion is super-easy, it takes place just as you type the numbers.
  • Has historical graphs, built-in calculator, colorful themes and works offline.
  • Support for phones, tablets and Android wear.
  • You can add your own custom currency, my personal favorite is "beer currency" - just enter how much one beer costs in your favorite pub and when it's time to go home - you see exactly how much you have to pay :)


What users say?

  • Easy to use and very useful.
  • Great real-time currency app. The ability to customize the interface is a great benefit. Very smooth and intuitive app.
  • Easy Life. A life is easier with this golden app from Android. "Wonderful job, people."
  • Love it. Always fast easy and accurate with multiple currency conversion at the same time great app.
  • Excellently easy to use nice app. Simple and attractive design. Congrats.
  • Excellent for travel. Fast, simple, easy! Great for travelers to get quick conversions without the complexity and can be used offline.
  • Great. This does what is says very well with a nice style and a practical user interface. The developer listens to comments and implements improvements.


Ok, one more screenshot to convince you :)


What I Need & What You'll Get

$1500 should cover:
  • Mac mini - 799.00 € (I'm based in EU, so the prices are in €)
  • iPhone 5s - 389.00 € 
  • Developer account - 99 €
Stretch goals:
  • $2000 - I'll implement tablet layouts for the app
  • $2500 - I'll develop a watch extension, too
  • $4500 - Better equipment equals faster development - I'll work my a** off to bring the app sooner

Simply put -  I'll buy the hardware needed to develop & publish an iOS app. Oh yes, that's it. I don't need funds for marketing, PR, design and other fancy stuff. That part is solved already, because demand is there. 

But I don't want it for free. Nah, that would be selfish (or plain stealing - based on the point of view). Each perk has something small or bigger waiting for you, too. Be it a promo code for the finished app, extra promo codes for Android apps including Interval Timer 4 HIIT Workout+, New Interval Timer, Plumber Reloaded ADFree or Currency Converter+, source codes of my Android games or your own product placement screen in the app - you choose. The most generous backer will own the rights to the source code of this app! After I'm done developing it and the app is published, of course.

So check out the perks and pick the one you love the most!


Perks you might consider

  • Co-worker - this person will get the source code of finished and published app and he will be listed as my personal hero in "thank you" screen.
  • All eyes on me -  your company logo / face / mascot as a splash screen in finished app.
  • This bank of mine - I'll implement your selected bank's exchange rate list (if the bank provides such a list - most central banks do) + you'll be listed as the banker in "thank you" screen.
  • Friends with benefits & We are the Champions - you'll get the source code of my popular games - Unity 3D version of Plumber and Smash'n'Break



The Impact

  • You get to experience the goodness of the Currency Converter first hand.
  • You'll have saying in direction the app development should go.
  • With perks including source code you can publish your own Android game right away!
  • You'll have promo codes for one of the best Android apps straight away, no need to wait after I'm done developing iOS app. Use those Android codes to redeem apps for your self or gift them and make someone else happy!


Risks & Challenges

As an indie developer, challenge is all I do. Every day brings a new challenge. But if you take a look at my portfolio (@halmi.sk), you'll notice that I'm a pretty universal developer. I made apps for Android, Windows phone and even one iOS game in the past. Sure, times have changed, but I believe I can do this. And so do you, otherwise you wouldn't read this far ;)

I've set up this campaign as a fixed campaign, so I think there's no risk for you as a backer. If I don't reach the target goal, you'll be fully refunded. If I do, I'm experienced enough to make this real. And you can gain some neat perks in the process.

Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you cannot pledge any money and that's fine. But you certainly do have some friends and you can tell them about this campaign. So please do so. Share this campaign if you like it. If you don't - tell me. I'll do my best to fix it and make it more appealing to all of you. Use the share buttons directly on IndieGoGo ;)

I've set up this campaign as a fixed campaign, so I think there's no risk for you as a backer. If I don't reach the target goal, you'll be fully refunded. If I do, I'm experienced enough to make this real. And you can gain some neat perks in the process.

story:
What is World of Castles?

World of Castles is an online action-strategy game set in the medieval times. It features a unique combination of constructing your own castle from a large number of blocks, besieging castles of other players, commanding your marshals who collectively lead armies of up to thousand men, and participating in battles as one of these marshals in 1st person view.

What is unique on World of Castles

You can create something, and your creation will not only a be a work of art, but it will have a purpose too. You can test your castle in battles against other players to prove that you did something damn good. Later come the battles, our central point of attention. The fights will be full of action, tactics, realistic atmosphere and thousands of soldiers. The absolute chaos of the battle, wherever you look. All that seen by the eyes of a lord, who stands in the first line. It is this feeling we want to make you experience and why we are here and asking for funds. 
And what are you doing in that fight? You are defending your very own special castle which you have built and you are so proud of! Can it withstand the battle? Will we defend our castle? Who knows... 

 

Why we are on Indiegogo

We have spent 2 years working hard and investing a lot of personal funds to do what you can see. Now as our funds dimnish more and more, we need your help to continue. We would also like to expand our development team to at least 5 people. We know that you deserve to play the perfect game and all the work still awaiting us must be done within a reasonable time. So this is a great way to speed up the development, and in the same time, to get the most valuable feedback from our players.

 

Where our funds go

All costs for the remaining development of 20 months are estimated at 400 000$. Why are we only asking for 25 000$? Surely it will not sustain the entire development, but it is the starting kick-off. More money will come startup programs for begining companies. Some funds will also come from Steam, and the rest we will get from investors. Indiegogo is the crucial start, where we can show our game to you and start our long journey of making this game a reality.

 

Why you should back it right now

You are our special customers, you do not know much about the project, and you still support us in our hardest times. You absolutely deserve a huge discount in the first place! Yet there is a pack full of other benefits. For example, all perks (except the Thank you one) give you at least one month of premium account for free. You can get an early access to play the game early on, and you become our "personal known" players whose seats are limited.

 

Why we decided to make this game

The answer is simple, we wanted so badly to play the game in our heads… However, no similiar game was on the market, so we decided to create it on our own. Once we realized we are able to finish this project, we dug into the creation process with passion. We decided to give the game all the time we have, left our jobs and just do everything for it.

 

Who could like World of Castles

When using your creativity, do you enjoy having an absolute control of everything? Feel free to build your castle from scratch, exactly as you like it. No clue about putting blocks together? Not a problem, you have an option to select from various pre-made castles. You can still keep improving on them or do not not change anything at all. There is one thing you do have to like though - battle! You can enjoy face to face fighting with enemies, swords dancing everywhere while other soldiers cover your back. Or you can excel at tactics, commanding your other marshalls. In this game, simply enjoy whatever you like the most!

 

Basics of the game

Building your own castle

From the beginning each player has a pool of few starting blocks and items which he can use to build his first castles. Participation in battles earns you money and experience. With money you can buy more blocks while with experience you will level up which opens new blocks and other building possibilities. Each player also has a fame limit which is based on his current level. Fame limit indicates how many blocks and items player can place on his castle as these has their own fame value. Each piece has its own use as boiling pitch or ballista for defensive purposes, beds for more soldiers, plants and arts for better moral and so on. Players needs to balance these to find the most effective way to play on current level.

 

Fighting

When a player decides to fight other players, game itself find an opponent with the most similar castle fame. At the beginning of each battle attacker deploys his marshals to the field while defender deploys his marshals inside his castle. Players then give first commands to their marshals and begin fight in 1st person view. Throughout each battle each side has a few tactical calls to give new orders to their marshals from the top down view. Attacker wins if he kills all the enemy marshals or captures the throne in a given time limit. Defender wins if he kills all the enemy marshals or survive the time limit. Players has also a chance to invite their friends to battle. In this case both players fame is add up and the game finds one equivalent defender.


Campaigns

From time to time we plan to publish shorter single player campaigns based on storytelling and role playing. First one will teach the player all the game mechanics while the others will by inspired by true historical stories. For completing these stories player is awarded with other useful blocks, units, items, flags etc. Tutorial campaign and one or two normal campaigns will be accessible to everybody from the beginning.

 

Crowdfunding

 

Monetary Model

Game copy is priced at 25$. With standard game copy you get all features released in the future with this game unlockable for ingame money. So what means season pass or lifetime pass? We want to release new campaign twice a year (after release) and it will be avaible a month sooner to whom who will buy an early access to a campaign for an reasonable price (est as 0.50-1$ per mission). Or you can wait a month and unlock that campaign for ingame currency. Also we will offer premium accounts to get more experience and ingame currency from battles for a fair price (4$ per month or less for longer terms). Why we decided to use this model? We want to make game living, neverending development, we can always improve textures, models, add new campaigns and add new gaming mods. And there we would like to get some extra funds from you, to support our efforts in that way without persuading everyone to "pay, or you will be penalized".

 

Perks

Early bird, alpha and beta access perks ara avaible in early birds, it means if you came among first you can get the game for even much better price!

Alpha access - means you will be avaible to play the game as the first!

Beta access - beta access can still get into the game before the game is oficialy released, but you have to wait longer time, than players in alpha access.

Season pass - means you get 2 campaigns released in the first season unlocked month sooner, than it become avaible for in game currency and absolutely for free.

Lifetime pass - you will get all the stuff ever added to the game among first ones and for free.

Lifetime premium account - you will have neverending premium account, meaning your ingame currency and experience is gathered faster.

 

Stretchgoals

  • 25 000 - Goal Reached!
  • 40 000 - We add national flags to flag generator
  • 75 000 - TBA

Risks and challanges

Gameplay change - As a lot of features are ahead of us there might some features might be added or changed in the name of performance, or it will improve the gameplay or graphics. All such changes will be announced to community through forums and change notes.  Also all change progress will be reflected through social media, so you can keep an eye, what we are doing and give a feedback.

Delivery delay - It is very usual that some games nowadays get delayed, we count with some reserves. But this might happen even to us. This might be mainly caused by development of AI, which needs to be at a good level to make battles serious and enjoyable. We would announce some kind of compensation in this case (longer premium account, campaign ticket etc.). But we will do anthing to keep deadlines, anyway you will be able to watch our progress.

soft game resets during alpha or beta - there might be some patches that might entirely change the game, or game logic, so you might have to rebuild your castle, but we will make sure, your effort put into the game will not be forgotten.

 

Team behind the game

Jakub Hamerník found his new hobby in board game design 7 years ago. „I have started to gain experience when trying to create a video game developer team. Yet we lost programmers on multiple occasions as they got offers from renowned studios... So then I learned 3D graphics and decided to start working on games alone, and learn the entire development pipeline. I wanted to be different and start with one bigger project, rather than many smaller ones. That is how World of Castles got its first few rows of code 2 years ago. 2 years of restless work...“


Michal Hamerník joined the one man team in summer 2016 as a graphic designer with a lot of experience with 3D graphics. He also has a degree in technical engineering.


Darío Blanco joined our team in winter 2016 to compose the game soundtrack.

 

You read the article so far...

We are very happy, you want to know so much about the game. You would probably like to see how looks the gameplay. So here is it:

 

If you like this project, be sure and spread a word about us. Share campaign on your facebook.  Thank you a lot, hope you like it and also do not forget to subscribe our youtube channel, or support our project on Steam Greenlight.
story_txt:
What is World of Castles?World of Castles is an online action-strategy game set in the medieval times. It features a unique combination of constructing your own castle from a large number of blocks, besieging castles of other players, commanding your marshals who collectively lead armies of up to thousand men, and participating in battles as one of these marshals in 1st person view.What is unique on World of CastlesYou can create something, and your creation will not only a be a work of art, but it will have a purpose too. You can test your castle in battles against other players to prove that you did something damn good. Later come the battles, our central point of attention. The fights will be full of action, tactics, realistic atmosphere and thousands of soldiers. The absolute chaos of the battle, wherever you look. All that seen by the eyes of a lord, who stands in the first line. It is this feeling we want to make you experience and why we are here and asking for funds. And what are you doing in that fight? You are defending your very own special castle which you have built and you are so proud of! Can it withstand the battle? Will we defend our castle? Who knows...  Why we are on IndiegogoWe have spent 2 years working hard and investing a lot of personal funds to do what you can see. Now as our funds dimnish more and more, we need your help to continue. We would also like to expand our development team to at least 5 people. We know that you deserve to play the perfect game and all the work still awaiting us must be done within a reasonable time. So this is a great way to speed up the development, and in the same time, to get the most valuable feedback from our players. Where our funds goAll costs for the remaining development of 20 months are estimated at 400 000$. Why are we only asking for 25 000$? Surely it will not sustain the entire development, but it is the starting kick-off. More money will come startup programs for begining companies. Some funds will also come from Steam, and the rest we will get from investors. Indiegogo is the crucial start, where we can show our game to you and start our long journey of making this game a reality. Why you should back it right nowYou are our special customers, you do not know much about the project, and you still support us in our hardest times. You absolutely deserve a huge discount in the first place! Yet there is a pack full of other benefits. For example, all perks (except the Thank you one) give you at least one month of premium account for free. You can get an early access to play the game early on, and you become our "personal known" players whose seats are limited. Why we decided to make this gameThe answer is simple, we wanted so badly to play the game in our heads… However, no similiar game was on the market, so we decided to create it on our own. Once we realized we are able to finish this project, we dug into the creation process with passion. We decided to give the game all the time we have, left our jobs and just do everything for it. Who could like World of CastlesWhen using your creativity, do you enjoy having an absolute control of everything? Feel free to build your castle from scratch, exactly as you like it. No clue about putting blocks together? Not a problem, you have an option to select from various pre-made castles. You can still keep improving on them or do not not change anything at all. There is one thing you do have to like though - battle! You can enjoy face to face fighting with enemies, swords dancing everywhere while other soldiers cover your back. Or you can excel at tactics, commanding your other marshalls. In this game, simply enjoy whatever you like the most! Basics of the gameBuilding your own castleFrom the beginning each player has a pool of few starting blocks and items which he can use to build his first castles. Participation in battles earns you money and experience. With money you can buy more blocks while with experience you will level up which opens new blocks and other building possibilities. Each player also has a fame limit which is based on his current level. Fame limit indicates how many blocks and items player can place on his castle as these has their own fame value. Each piece has its own use as boiling pitch or ballista for defensive purposes, beds for more soldiers, plants and arts for better moral and so on. Players needs to balance these to find the most effective way to play on current level. FightingWhen a player decides to fight other players, game itself find an opponent with the most similar castle fame. At the beginning of each battle attacker deploys his marshals to the field while defender deploys his marshals inside his castle. Players then give first commands to their marshals and begin fight in 1st person view. Throughout each battle each side has a few tactical calls to give new orders to their marshals from the top down view. Attacker wins if he kills all the enemy marshals or captures the throne in a given time limit. Defender wins if he kills all the enemy marshals or survive the time limit. Players has also a chance to invite their friends to battle. In this case both players fame is add up and the game finds one equivalent defender.
CampaignsFrom time to time we plan to publish shorter single player campaigns based on storytelling and role playing. First one will teach the player all the game mechanics while the others will by inspired by true historical stories. For completing these stories player is awarded with other useful blocks, units, items, flags etc. Tutorial campaign and one or two normal campaigns will be accessible to everybody from the beginning. Crowdfunding Monetary ModelGame copy is priced at 25$. With standard game copy you get all features released in the future with this game unlockable for ingame money. So what means season pass or lifetime pass? We want to release new campaign twice a year (after release) and it will be avaible a month sooner to whom who will buy an early access to a campaign for an reasonable price (est as 0.50-1$ per mission). Or you can wait a month and unlock that campaign for ingame currency. Also we will offer premium accounts to get more experience and ingame currency from battles for a fair price (4$ per month or less for longer terms). Why we decided to use this model? We want to make game living, neverending development, we can always improve textures, models, add new campaigns and add new gaming mods. And there we would like to get some extra funds from you, to support our efforts in that way without persuading everyone to "pay, or you will be penalized". PerksEarly bird, alpha and beta access perks ara avaible in early birds, it means if you came among first you can get the game for even much better price!Alpha access - means you will be avaible to play the game as the first!Beta access - beta access can still get into the game before the game is oficialy released, but you have to wait longer time, than players in alpha access.Season pass - means you get 2 campaigns released in the first season unlocked month sooner, than it become avaible for in game currency and absolutely for free.Lifetime pass - you will get all the stuff ever added to the game among first ones and for free.Lifetime premium account - you will have neverending premium account, meaning your ingame currency and experience is gathered faster. Stretchgoals

75 000 - TBA

All such changes will be announced to community through forums and change notes.  Also all change progress will be reflected through social media, so you can keep an eye, what we are doing and give a feedback.Delivery delay - It is very usual that some games nowadays get delayed, we count with some reserves. But this might happen even to us. This might be mainly caused by development of AI, which needs to be at a good level to make battles serious and enjoyable. We would announce some kind of compensation in this case (longer premium account, campaign ticket etc.). But we will do anthing to keep deadlines, anyway you will be able to watch our progress.soft game resets during alpha or beta - there might be some patches that might entirely change the game, or game logic, so you might have to rebuild your castle, but we will make sure, your effort put into the game will not be forgotten. Team behind the gameJakub Hamerník found his new hobby in board game design 7 years ago. „I have started to gain experience when trying to create a video game developer team. Yet we lost programmers on multiple occasions as they got offers from renowned studios... So then I learned 3D graphics and decided to start working on games alone, and learn the entire development pipeline. I wanted to be different and start with one bigger project, rather than many smaller ones. That is how World of Castles got its first few rows of code 2 years ago. 2 years of restless work...“Michal Hamerník joined the one man team in summer 2016 as a graphic designer with a lot of experience with 3D graphics. He also has a degree in technical engineering.Darío Blanco joined our team in winter 2016 to compose the game soundtrack. You read the article so far...We are very happy, you want to know so much about the game. You would probably like to see how looks the gameplay. So here is it: If you like this project, be sure and spread a word about us. Share campaign on your facebook.  Thank you a lot, hope you like it and also do not forget to subscribe our youtube channel, or support our project on Steam Greenlight.

story:
SandBlox is a sandbox building simulation where player imagination comes to life. Build interesting vehicles, planes, helicopters, and other whacky contraptions. Design a wrecking ball to smash through a brick wall and cause a chain reaction. Knock down and run over the test dummies (don't worry, they won't mind!). With an ever-growing assortment of blocks and free updates for life, you'll always have something to build and create.

You can consider this a mix of Besiege and Trailmakers, with some other aspects and components not found in either. Quickly create a vehicle by simply snapping blocks together in the WYSIWYG editor. Add a frame, power source, mechanical parts, and you're in business. Add as many parts as you want. Or, as many as your machine can handle (more on that below).

 

 

Not everyone has a high-end machine. And sometimes, with complex simulations (when you want to drop 1,000 wrecking balls on our poor test dummies) the simulation can get bogged down. SandBlox comes with easy-to-toggle settings and sliders to adjust performance and quality (both visual and physics accuracy). Simply turn off shadows, adjust physics substeps and iterations, and even pixelate the entire game.

Every campaign begs an important question, why crowdfund? As a solo developer, every bit helps and directly impacts the game's progress. Your donations will allow me to treat this as a job, which will ultimately get the game done far faster than finding off hours to do so as a hobby. Some of the assets are easy to make, like a cube and the wrecking ball. But there's a certain limit where an actual artist should step in. I've already gone and commissioned our test dummy from a skilled low poly artist. A good portion of donations will go towards quality 3d models for the game. I also have an audio engineer ready to get started on unique SFX and music.

Like the majority of indie devs, I'm the sole developer. As you may have read above, this is one of the reasons crowdfunding will greatly help me to complete this game. There's no large cut going to overhead on a game studio, or even paying a small team. But being a solo dev shouldn't be seen as a bad thing in and of itself. There's some great aspects to it. Of course, all decisions are made immediately, which speeds up that part of production. But what you get is a handcrafted product at the end of it. Each line of code was put there by me, and I know exactly how the game fits together as a composition. I've also been making simulations for 7 years now, and it's something I'm passionate about. I'm making this game because I want to play it, too.

I can foresee a few challenges in this, but none that worry me. As it stands now, the game is functional, but needs more features and components to be great. One risk is tough bugs or roadblocks in a particular feature. For example, if I was setting up the calculations for realistic rocket propulsion. Sure, rockets are simple enough, but implementing them in a specific way might prove challenging, and there's a risk that that feature is not possible, or not easy to add. Crowdfunding will also be used to solve the unsolvable. In the past, I hired one-time consultation from a mathematician to get a terrain generator algorithm exactly how I wanted. If need be, these challenges will be taken care of thanks to your donations, ultimately leading to a better end result.

The campaign page will be updated regularly. Otherwise, check out the following links:

EvolGames.com

Discord
https://discord.gg/xUCjsfP

Telegram
https://t.me/evolgames

story:
Claim your American Dream!


America’s political situation has never been worse and the whole world is laughing nervously. Play as your favorite oumpa-loumpa Republican candidate or make your way to the top as an immigrant. The goal is easy: Make as much money as possible and try to stay away from those racist politicians who are thirsting to throw you in jail.

    1-3 players are playing the part of Donald Trump, Ben Carson and Ted Cruz while the other 2-4 players are playing as immigrants. The mission for the immigrants is to gather as much money as possible by completing different jobs on the game board. The different job buildings are color coded and are worth different amounts of money. This is how the immigrants make money.

    Donald Trump, Ben Carson and Ted Cruz earn their money through capturing the other players. The one with the most money in the end of the game wins.

    Detailed rulebook and instructions are included.

    --

    I'm in contact with a manufacturer in China who is ready to bring this product to life. I've received a quote for 500 games.

    --

    The "Green Cards" are very important to the game and I could really use all the help I can get from you to write even more. If you have ideas or inputs about the game in general, please don't hesitate to contact me at hello@carlvallin.com

    I can also use all the help I can get to make some noise at the WWW about this campaign so please share and tell your friends and family about this!

     

    Carl

story:
Hello, I am Duan the developer and creator behind Trippin Planets. This is a one-man passion project that I have been creating for over 2 years. 

Let me show you what it is about and why I need you!

Trippin Planets is a space adventure with silly yet realistic physics.

Explore a seamless handcrafted solar system with real astrophysics and orbital mechanics.
Set in deep space Trippin Planets is a single-player game about platforming, solving puzzles and exploration elements.


 

You can travel to various planets with vastly different biomes. With each planet containing hidden energy sources, you seek ancient ruines and solve physics-based puzzles to find them. Each planet will pose unique challenges with different ways to solve. 

Afterward, you can go back to your mother ship to upgrade your abilities and unlock new characters with these energy sources.



This is the main game-play loop: Discover all the energy sources and solve all the puzzles in the solar system to refuel the mother ship.

Trippin Planets is a fun and engaging experience with a new twist to the third-person genre.


 

  • 3D platforming
  • Solve physics-based puzzles
  • Seek ancient ruines and temples
  • Travel between planets with Newtonian physics
  • Explore a fully functioning solar system
  • Drivable rover on planets
  • Discover artifacts
  • Experience zero G
  • Scavenge asteroids
  • Unlock unique abilities and characters

You have the ability to pick up objects and manipulate them with joints. The character can react to anything and everything. 

I've spent countless hours making the best possible active ragdoll system that is both Silly and fun to play with.



I consider Trippin Planets a mix between Grow Home, Human Fall Flat and Gang Beasts.

 

 

Orbit around planets and the solar system with realistic orbital mechanics and astrophysics.
Be careful though, you only have enough fuel for a few trips before a refuel is needed. You don't want to be stranded in an endless elliptical orbit around the star!



You can save on fuel by forwarding time to reach destinations. This comes in handy when you are low on fuel and too far away from the mother ship. Alternatively, you can collect solar energy by flying close to the star. 



There are three types of controlling systems that allow you to reach your destinations:

Docking Thrusters - This allows you to control your spaceship with precision on planetary surfaces and in space.

Jet propulsion - A speed accelerator that can only be used to travel in one direction.

Hyper drive - Every space game needs one:) This can be useful when at a very far distance away from your destination.



Did someone say Alpha Demo? Pledge a $100 to get access to the Closed Alpha. 

 

I have been working on Trippin Planets for over 2 years (the last year full time) and now I would say the game is about 60% complete. All the fundamental and base mechanics are in place and in a playable state. I took a lot of time to nail down the technology behind the game such as the seamless interplanetary travel, atmospheres and physics which is pretty much done already!


The game will initially release on steam for Windows and Mac.
Later versions of the game will release on Playstation 4 and Xbox One depending on how much is earned in the campaign.



While running an Indiegogo campaign comes with a lot of risk and requires a great deal of work, there are several reasons why I think a crowdfunding campaign makes a lot of sense for Trippin Planets:

Developing the game together: Since the beginning of Trippin Planets I have always wanted to build a community around the game and listen to feedback that fans might have. An Indiegogo campaign means I would be able to get even more direct feedback from backers.

Creative freedom: I would love to stay independent and finish the game with complete creative freedom.

Money (of course): The money raised by the campaign would mostly be used to cover my living costs for the end of development and to pay some additional collaborators for music and sound. 



 

 

Risks & Challenges

I’m probably not the first one to tell you that game development always bears certain risks. There is always a chance of unexpected problems that could occur and potentially delay the game. 

That being said I have already been working on Trippin Planets for over two years and the core technology and gameplay are all there, so I’m confident with the timeline I have laid out. 

What will happen if the campaign does not reach it's goal? I am very passionate about making this game and unfortunately I need the funds to be able to keep developing it. I will still work on the game part-time but ultimately delaying the development.

If it is not possible to back the project you can still help by spreading the word:)

 

  Join the Discord Community!

  Like on Facebook!

story:
Hi, my name is Josiah.
I always liked video games, one day I wanted to get more into this fantastic and I started to learn about the world of programming, I had many ideas that when I joined them, resulted in my biggest project: Snowball wars.

From that moment, creating a video game and being able to see how others enjoy it became a life goal.

Snowball wars in a platform game, where our protagonist, a boy of 10 years named Jeff must save its dimension of the collapse, because the crystal that maintained the order was stolen by an enemy, who is dedicated to steal these crystals with the Objective to obtain sufficient power to control all dimensions.

Jeff not happy with the situation decides to go for this evil enemy, in his adventure is transported to other dimensions, which must cross to reach Django, recover the crystal and save its dimension ... along with the other dimensions.

If they decide to donate to my cause I will be deeply grateful to them, if they do not, I will be the same, because I know that at least they gave themselves the time to know my game, and that is valuable for me.


For my campaign I need 3000 USD, I need to buy the license of some programs, as well as give a contribution to those who helped me with this great project that I am carrying out.

So as to be able to take advanced programming courses and be able to make my game something much better than what I aspired to at the beginning.

A reward that I offer to all the people who entered my campaign is a sincere thank you, because your attention also has a significant value for me.

For those who donate a support for this campaign will receive exclusive shorts of the game, as well as images and songs included in the game, also include a personalized video where Jeff deeply thanks them for helping the campaign.

If I did not achieve the goal, I would still feel happy because I know it is a small start to unleash my project and I would take the funds to take courses to continue acquiring more knowledge of programming and music production to make my game something much better .


As in everything, my campaign is not without risks, my main obstacle is the time, because I'm studying a degree many times it is difficult to continue my game, so I try to use those lapses free of time to continue with my Project and progress more and more to its end.

When you want to do something well it takes time, under that phrase I continue my game, and I know that one day I will see it realized.


As I mentioned money is not the only contribution they can make, it would greatly help my campaign by spreading it, sharing it and letting others know about my project, it is very easy for an idea to be lost in the vastness of the internet, but with its help My project will be able to reach more ears.

Thank you for all your attention.

Sincerely yours: Josías Álvarez García

 

 

Hola, me llamo Josías.
Desde siempre me han gustado los videojuegos, un día quise adentrarme más a este fantástico y comencé a aprender acerca del mundo de la programación, tenía muchas ideas que al unirlas, dieron como resultado mi proyecto más grande: Snowball wars.

Desde ese momento, crear un videojuego y poder ver como los demás lo disfrutan se convirtió en una meta de vida.

Snowball wars en un juego de plataforma, en donde nuestro protagonista, un niño de 10 años llamado Jeff debe salvar su dimensión del colapso, debido a que el cristal que mantenía el orden fue robado por un enemigo, quien se dedica hurtar estos cristales con el objetivo de obtener suficiente poder para controlar todas las dimensiones.

Jeff no contento con la situación decide ir por este nefasto enemigo, en su aventura es transportado a otras dimensiones, las cuales debe atravesar para llegar a Django, recuperar el cristal y salvar su dimensión... junto con las otras dimensiones.

Si deciden donar a mi causa les estaré profundamente agradecido, si no lo hacen, lo estaré igual, porque sé que al menos se dieron el tiempo de conocer mi juego, y eso es valioso para mí.


Para mi campaña necesito de 3000 USD, necesito comprar la licencia de algunos programas, así como darles una contribución a aquellos que me ayudaron con este gran proyecto que estoy llevando a cabo.

Así como para poder tomar cursos de programación avanzada y poder hacer de mi juego algo mucho mejor a lo que aspiré al principio.

Una recompensa que ofrezco a todas las personas que ingresaron a mi campaña es un sincero gracias, porque su atención también tiene un valor significativo para mi.

Para aquellos que donen un apoyo para esta campaña recibirán cortos exclusivos del juego, así como imágenes y canciones incluidas en el juego, así mismo incluiré un video personalizado en donde Jeff les agradece profundamente por ayudar a la campaña.

Si no lograra la meta, aún me sentiría feliz, porque sé que es un pequeño comienzo para dar rienda suelta a mi proyecto y ocuparía los fondos para tomar cursos para seguir adquiriendo más conocimiento de programación y producción de música para hacer mi juego algo mucho mejor.
 

Como en todo, mi campaña no está excénta de riesgos, mi principal obstaculo es el tiempo, debido a que estoy estudiando una licenciatura muchas veces me es difícil continuar con mi juego, por eso trato de usar esos lapsos libres de tiempo para continuar con mi proyecto y avanzar cada vez más a su final.

Cuando se quiere hacer algo bien lleva tiempo, bajo esa frase yo continuo mi juego, y sé que un día lo veré realizado.
 

Como ya mencioné el dinero no es la única contribución que pueden hacer, ayudarían mucho a mi campaña difundiéndola, compartiéndola y haciéndole saber a los demás de mi proyecto, es muy fácil que una idea se pierda en la inmensidad del internet, pero con su ayuda mi proyecto podrá llegar a mas oídos.

Gracias por toda su atención.

Atentamente: Josías Álvarez García

story:
Welcome to Runewards!

Runewards is a brand new entrance in the Collectible Card Games category.

Combining the best elements of the genre in an addicting multi-platform game which you play against others competitively or go solo in our single-player or story campaign mode.

Your goal is simple. Collect cards, build decks from 4 distinct races and battle your way to glory.
You play for the highest Total Power each round, but the way to achieve it is not easy. You combine abilities and tactics together to create the perfect strategy, but remember, that so does your opponent.

The game is available now tp download for PC and Android devices.
https://www.runewards.com/downloads#downloadfocus

In Runewards, you have 3 Races with 1 Natural faction (Mercenaries) at launch. Each race has its own style, abilities, features and tactics.

 

The Monsters are the story you hear about in at night. It's the boogeymen hiding beneath the closet, the ghost lurking in your attic or the monster that crawl under your floor.

We tried to make the Monsters seems like a terrifying army.

The Monsters have no compassion or love for anything, not even for their own.

So players who choose to play Monsters has no hesitation to sacrifice their own Units in order to gain massive Power advantage or perhaps flood the Battlefield with tiny Units and boost them later in order to overwhelm your opponent.

 

Humans play for risk and reward and players who choose them know that very well.

The Humans embody trickery and cunning above all else and while they can certainly have a presence on the Battlefield, they prefer to be prepared far in advance.

They can manipulate the flow of the game in many ways, either by claiming cards owned by others or by deciding the fate of a card draw to their favor.

 

Nature players react to the game unfolding around them as Nature only can. They watch the flow of the game and then decide to change it at their will.

Like the name they carry, Nature is all about wild and free. If a piece on the board is not to their liking, they will move it at their will. If they can't move it, they might as well change it. Stones can last for eternity, but even stones eventually break to the elements.

 

The idea is simple. Each card you place on the Battlefield (called Units) has a value that we call Power. Whoever has the highest Total Power at the end of the round , wins it. 

The game is played in a best of 3 rounds so win two of them to net the match.

By combining and chaining different cards abilities and clever deckbuilding, you can create awesome tactics and strategies that will eventually win you the match itself!


In Runewards, we currently have three game modes.

  • Single-Player 
  • Multiplayer (Ranked Gameplay)
  • Campaign

If you wish to just go out and play against a computer, we cooked up some fine goblin-made A.I to fight against. There are a variety of difficulties ranging from easy to insane. Test your newly minted decks and see if they are up for the challenge.

If competitiveness is in your blood, the Multiplayer is just for you. Play against others in a competitive scene with leagues, ranks and bragging rights or just play for fun.The Choice is yours.

When you win a game in Multiplayer mode, you can win a Ward. Once you reach a certain level (20, 15, 10, 5 and 1) you can go up a League. Once you reach the final league (Archon) your League Level changes to World Rank.

 

Our newest addition is a brand new campaign, telling the story of the Runeseeker and his quest for the Runewards.

Meet special bosses, each with a unique ability that will challenge you to think and play differently. At the end of each boss is a reward - a card upgrade!

 

In our Deckbuilder, this is where all the magic happens.

In here, you can view your card collection, building decks from all different races.
Craft new cards or salvage unused or excess ones.


Runewards, contentwise, is close to completion, so why do we need the money?

The answer is simple. Marketing - and tons of it.
In order to reach players from all across the world, the game must be exposed and let us tell you, it doesn't come cheap.

The money you will donate will go into funding marketing campaigns across many platforms (PC, Instagram, Facebook and more!) and allow us to reach as many players as possible.

Additionally, it will allow us to finish our Steam and iOS releases in the near future and continuously fine-tune and polish the game.
We have successfully been Greenlit and has been warmly received by the gaming community but we know that reaching people won't be easy but we willing to bet our money (which we did!) and our time to prove it.

 


Omer Elfassy is the Lead Developer behind Runewards. He has retired from promising career in Starcraft and DOTA in order to focus on development for full time job. He does however defend his competitive honor in Tekken every other friday.

Eyal Medina is the Lead Programmer of Runewards. When he's not doing Runewards he recites the entire script of 300 from head or toy with Unreal Engine at home, you know... just for fun.

Tal Avraham, a developer, handles all aspects of the project and handles the story development of Runewards. An avid reader - he probably owns half of the collection of Forgotten Realms since 1999.


Each of us here in Runewards are gamers from birth. We first did this as a big dream that turned into reality and we need the help and support of the community in order to see this game shown to the world.

We would like to say thank you for every support, share or donation of any kind and we look forward to seeing you in our game.

You can always help by participating and joining our community on this social channels:

Website: https://www.runewards.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Runewards/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Runewards
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCi3laYAMDTKRrc...
Forum: https://forum.runewards.com/

story:
Who am I and why do I care?

I am the founder of Midnight Lynx Entertainment and the creator of Catainium's Tanks. The tank community has yet to have a game that truly takes their interests seriously and passionately. My goal is to bring them what they have always asked for, a tank game both realistic, fun, and historical.

What We Need & What You Get

The goal with this funding is for a demo of the game, once we get a demo going we can expand and become self sufficient, bringing the community more tanks they love. Contributors will receive a demo of the game to play with us on the demo release date, you will also receive increased earnings of the in-game currency for the official release. If our goal is not reached we will still try to bring the game to fruition even if it comes out of our pockets. However we ask you to please help us bring this game to you. Any help we receive will allow to game to come faster and at higher quality!

How does this effect you?

Why do you care? There are plenty of other tank games right? How is this different? Well I will tell you what is different. This game is created by volunteers who have a passion for history and tanks, not a profit driven company that treats history second rate. Tanks from similar eras will fight tanks of similar eras.We listen to the concerns of the community and will try our best to implement mechanics that most players are comfortable with. The game is not meant to be grindy or frustrating. This game is not mean to force your hand deep into your pockets. Why help? Why not! Receiving the benefit of increased earnings and being able to play the demo will be a fun time you will never forget.

Challenges

We face the challenge of being a small company of volunteers. We cannot pump out assets at the rate of million dollar companies. Which is precisely why we need help. Most of our problems such as tanks physics and server space can be solved with funding. Armor and ballistic mechanics will require much research but we can do it.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word. Even a $5.00 helps if many people are in on it! We try our hardest to bring this game to you. Our volunteers and staff thank you for your eagerness for Conflict Attrition.
