story:
ARTICADE

Hello everyone, this is Linda, part of ARTICADE team  from Shenzhen China.  We aim to make hardware for learning and entertainment. Arcade-Console (we also name it Arcade-C) is our campaign in Indiegogo, it is an entertainment project mostly based on Raspberry Pi and Retropie (a game system). Hope that you wil like this project, all your supports are the motivation for me to bright more projects.

Arcade-Console

This  Metal-Acrylic box sizes 30*21.5. The bottom box of Arcade-Console is metal, covered by a Acrylic console board. On  the console board, the cute red joystick places on the left, which mostly used for direction controlling.  Six color buttons are placed on the right according to classic Arcade layout. One Select button and one Start button for function setting.

  • Arcade-Console with Pi
    The control board of this version is Raspberry Pi 3B+. Raspberry Pi 3B+ is a single-board computer, whose CPU is Broadcom BCM2837B0, support full-size HDMI. With Game OS Retrope, you can play thousands games by adding emulators.
  • Arcade-Console with Pizero
    The control board of this version is Raspberry Pi zero WH. RPi zero WH is much smaller and much chipper than the Raspberry Pi 3B+, of cause much "weaker". RPi zero WH unable to drive some big games, which you need to think about when you back for the Arcade-C with Pizero version
  • Arcade-joystick for PC
    This is the USB version, which allows you to plug to PC or Raspberry Pi and use it as a USB console. If you want a big Arcade game console or a external console of Arcade-Console with Pi. You can think about this version. The Arcade-joystick for PC version doesn't have speakers.

All the three versions use the same enclosure,  their differences are control boards inside. Raspberry Pi 3 B+ is placed on the left side, USB adapter is on the center and Pi zero is set on the right.

What you will get （Peaks）

Pack 1: Arcade-C without Pi (Basic)

The buttons and joysticks included here are common version. This Pack can support Raspberry Pi 2B/3B/3B+/Zero/Zero W/Zero WH

- Acrylic console board x1
- Metal bottom box x1
- Joystick x1
- Color buttons x8
- Arcade Game HAT x1
- Anti-Slip rubber x4
- Speakers x1
- Button cables x8
- Joystick cable x1
- HDMI cable x1
- Screwdriver x1
- Screw pack x1

Pack 2: Arcade-C Without  Pi (Advanced)

The components included in this pack are same as Pack 1. The only difference is that the joystick and buttons are advance version which has higher quality. This kit can support Raspberry Pi 2B/3B/3B+/Zero/Zero W/Zero WH

Pack 3: Arcade-J for PC (Basic)

The buttons and joysticks included here are common version.

- Acrylic console board x1
- Metal bottom box x1
- Joystick x1
- Color buttons x8
- PS3 Game controller pack x1
- Anti-Slip rubber x4
- Screwdriver x1
- Screw pack x1

Pack 4: Arcade-J for PC (Advanced)

The components included in this pack are same as Pack 3. The only difference is that the joystick and buttons are advance version which has higher quality. 

Pack 5: Arcade-C with Pizero (Basic)

The buttons and joysticks included here are common version. This Pack can also support Raspberry Pi 2B/3B/3B+/Zero/Zero W/Zero WH

- Acrylic console board x1
- Metal bottom box x1
- Joystick x1
- Color buttons x8
- Arcade Game HAT x1
- Anti-Slip rubber x4
- Speakers x1
- Button cables x8
- Joystick cable x1
- HDMI cable x1
- Screwdriver x1
- Screw pack x1
- Raspberry Pi zero WH
- 16G SD card
-5V power adapter

Pack 6: Arcade-C With  Pizero (Advanced)

The components included in this pack are same as Pack 5. The only difference is that the joystick and buttons are advance version which has higher quality. This kit can support Raspberry Pi 2B/3B/3B+/Zero/Zero W/Zero WH

Pack 7: Arcade-C with Pi (Basic)

The buttons and joysticks included here are common version. This Pack can also support Raspberry Pi 2B/3B/3B+/Zero/Zero W/Zero WH

- Acrylic console board x1
- Metal bottom box x1
- Joystick x1
- Color buttons x8
- Arcade Game HAT x1
- Anti-Slip rubber x4
- Speakers x1
- Button cables x8
- Joystick cable x1
- HDMI cable x1
- Screwdriver x1
- Screw pack x1
- Raspberry Pi 3B+
- 16G SD card
-5V power adapter

Pack 8: Arcade-C With  Pi (Advanced)

The components included in this pack are same as Pack 7. The only difference is that the joystick and buttons are advance version which has higher quality. This kit can support Raspberry Pi 2B/3B/3B+/Zero/Zero W/Zero WH
story_txt:
ARTICADEHello everyone, this is Linda, part of ARTICADE team  from Shenzhen China.  We aim to make hardware for learning and entertainment. Arcade-Console (we also name it Arcade-C) is our campaign in Indiegogo, it is an entertainment project mostly based on Raspberry Pi and Retropie (a game system). Hope that you wil like this project, all your supports are the motivation for me to bright more projects.Arcade-ConsoleThis  Metal-Acrylic box sizes 30*21.5. The bottom box of Arcade-Console is metal, covered by a Acrylic console board. On  the console board, the cute red joystick places on the left, which mostly used for direction controlling.  Six color buttons are placed on the right according to classic Arcade layout. One Select button and one Start button for function setting.
Arcade-Console with PiThe control board of this version is Raspberry Pi 3B+. Raspberry Pi 3B+ is a single-board computer, whose CPU is Broadcom BCM2837B0, support full-size HDMI. With Game OS Retrope, you can play thousands games by adding emulators.
Arcade-Console with PizeroThe control board of this version is Raspberry Pi zero WH. RPi zero WH is much smaller and much chipper than the Raspberry Pi 3B+, of cause much "weaker". RPi zero WH unable to drive some big games, which you need to think about when you back for the Arcade-C with Pizero version

Arcade-joystick for PCThis is the USB version, which allows you to plug to PC or Raspberry Pi and use it as a USB console. If you want a big Arcade game console or a external console of Arcade-Console with Pi. You can think about this version. The Arcade-joystick for PC version doesn't have speakers.
All the three versions use the same enclosure,  their differences are control boards inside. Raspberry Pi 3 B+ is placed on the left side, USB adapter is on the center and Pi zero is set on the right.What you will get （Peaks）Pack 1: Arcade-C without Pi (Basic)The buttons and joysticks included here are common version. This Pack can support Raspberry Pi 2B/3B/3B+/Zero/Zero W/Zero WH- Acrylic console board x1- Metal bottom box x1- Joystick x1- Color buttons x8- Arcade Game HAT x1- Anti-Slip rubber x4- Speakers x1- Button cables x8- Joystick cable x1- HDMI cable x1- Screwdriver x1- Screw pack x1Pack 2: Arcade-C Without  Pi (Advanced)The components included in this pack are same as Pack 1. The only difference is that the joystick and buttons are advance version which has higher quality. This kit can support Raspberry Pi 2B/3B/3B+/Zero/Zero W/Zero WHPack 3: Arcade-J for PC (Basic)The buttons and joysticks included here are common version.- Acrylic console board x1- Metal bottom box x1- Joystick x1- Color buttons x8- PS3 Game controller pack x1- Anti-Slip rubber x4- Screwdriver x1- Screw pack x1Pack 4: Arcade-J for PC (Advanced)The components included in this pack are same as Pack 3. The only difference is that the joystick and buttons are advance version which has higher quality. Pack 5: Arcade-C with Pizero (Basic)The buttons and joysticks included here are common version. This Pack can also support Raspberry Pi 2B/3B/3B+/Zero/Zero W/Zero WH- Acrylic console board x1- Metal bottom box x1- Joystick x1- Color buttons x8- Arcade Game HAT x1- Anti-Slip rubber x4- Speakers x1- Button cables x8- Joystick cable x1- HDMI cable x1- Screwdriver x1- Screw pack x1- Raspberry Pi zero WH- 16G SD card-5V power adapterPack 6: Arcade-C With  Pizero (Advanced)The components included in this pack are same as Pack 5. The only difference is that the joystick and buttons are advance version which has higher quality. This kit can support Raspberry Pi 2B/3B/3B+/Zero/Zero W/Zero WHPack 7: Arcade-C with Pi (Basic)The buttons and joysticks included here are common version. This Pack can also support Raspberry Pi 2B/3B/3B+/Zero/Zero W/Zero WH- Acrylic console board x1- Metal bottom box x1- Joystick x1- Color buttons x8- Arcade Game HAT x1- Anti-Slip rubber x4- Speakers x1- Button cables x8- Joystick cable x1- HDMI cable x1- Screwdriver x1- Screw pack x1- Raspberry Pi 3B+- 16G SD card-5V power adapterPack 8: Arcade-C With  Pi (Advanced)The components included in this pack are same as Pack 7. The only difference is that the joystick and buttons are advance version which has higher quality. This kit can support Raspberry Pi 2B/3B/3B+/Zero/Zero W/Zero WH

story:
ServerTycoon is a Construction, Strategic and Management Video Game where players have to manage a Datacenter and earn game coins offering services to their customers.

Your company can be listed on the ServerTycoon Stock Exchange and players can buy shares from other friendly or competitor companies and take profits, but remember pirates and competitors will try to stop you with frequent cyber attacks so, manage and improve your systems, organise your defences and try to climb the top of the hi-tech finance!

Your will also play seasonal Quests. You can create a party and face challenges and riddles. Try to solve quests with your skills ...and discover what's in the  Server Tycoon Cyberbox.

Starter Kit

When the game starts we give you all you need to start earning game coins with your virtual company:

  • your company building on one random street of The Valley
  • an entry-level server (you can upgrade it as soon as you have earned enough money...)

The Server

The Server is the main actor of the game's scene. You can buy custom components to assemble a powerful machine capable to gain coins at higher speed and resist to cyber attacks on time.

Services + Time = Coins

When you install a server and switch it on it starts offering services to your customers immediately.

This generates coins that are kept into the server itself until you move them into your Vault.

If an attack succeed all coins contained into a server could be stolen!

The Vault

The Vault is a special server aimed to host your coins and keep them safe from most common cyber attacks. It’s a kind of hardware wallet...

Upgrade it to store more and more coins and to resist to newest and hardest attacks techniques.

In ServerTycoon, coins are not transferred from people (your customers) to service providers (you) through bank institutes. They are a kind of cryptocurrency generated directly into the server that offers a service.

In other words coins are special files that can physically travel via internet, and that's the reason why cyber pirates want to attack you at all time...

Multiplayer

Everyone, no matter which platform you use, will be able to play against (or together) all other players in a consistent massive multiplayer world.

ServerTycoon will be downloadable for everyone with a short tutorial to play. However, to play the full game and unlock all features you will need an account:

Standard Account

To play ServerTycoon you need an account. The Standard Account will be sold at 14.99 EUR and with it you will have all the game's features unlocked and ready to play.

Creator Account

We believe the Game will be awesome and we love it but for whom who wants to play an additional exclusive game feature we created the Creator Mode.

The Creator Account unlocks, in addition to all of them already included in the Standard one, an additional feature. You will access to an easy-to-use and effective tool that will let you design your own Datacenter, define custom hardware and sell it in the in-game Store for all other players. The Creator Account will be sold at 29.99 EUR.

Funder Account

To those who help us in this campaign, we are offering an additional exclusive perk. You'll benefit of a starting 50% lifetime discount in the in-game store. Discount percentage increases on a pledge basis according to the following values: 40€/50%, 99€/75%.  You will be also invited to define an hardware (name, tech spec and aspect) that will be released with the game.  The Funder Account will not be offered for sale. It is an exclusive perk limited to the crowdfunding campaign.

Should the campaign be successful, ServerTycoon will be available by the end of Q4-2019, for PC Windows, MacOS and GNU/Linux with the following game features:

  • Grown and manage your server farm
  • Hardware purchasing and management
  • Comply with Contracts to earn Coins
  • Cyber Attack and Defence system
  • Network cables Management
  • Disruptions (flooding/cooling and power failures, network down, etc.)
  • Complete Seasonal Quests to receive exclusive rewards and unlock Achievements
  • Hire skilled technicians to unlock new technologies
  • Play Third Person and First Person View modes

 Moreover, we planned to release the following additional features by the end of Q1-2020:

  • Anti fire and HVAC (heat, ventilation and air conditioning) management
  • Buy and Sell Company Shares in the internal Stock Market
  • Sell your buildings to buy bigger ones

Please note that our estimations are based on our current team and the ability to put effort in the project. Needless to say, the more ServerTycoon is funded the more resources we will put in the project and so anticipate the releases dates.

"The best defense is a good offense"

As mentioned above, pirates will pass their time attacking you, but as soon as they do it, something remains on your server..:

  • the footprint (the network address): if the stolen coins have been already moved in the attacking server you can try to rescue them, or even just revenge... next time he will remember of you ;)
  • the script used for the attack: use it to understand what was wrong with your defence script, why the attacker ones is more efficient than yours and be prepared to learn new defence techniques
  • a temporary protection against further attacks coming from that address: your firewall will automatically blacklist the attacking address for a short period, restore your server before this basic protection expires!

Attacks and defenses are both based on Corewars scripts made of few instructions you can learn in minutes. When starting ServerTycoon a tutorial will teach you the basics of this art. Initially there will be two basic scripts included in you firewall.

Your Staff

As soon as you have earned enough game coins, you can hire your first technician from the Employment Agency, send them to IT Trainings to improve their skills and be able to reduce systems setup and technical interventions time. Make them become Cyber Security Experts, System Engineers, etc...

Manage your staff: hire people, train them, rent their skills, and even fire them!

Game quests are released periodically over time. Be sure to complete them all. Here below some examples:

  • Golden Ages: Retrace the whole history of Datacenter from ENIAC to Supercomputers;
  • Locks 'n' Gates: Form a party and use your skills to solve logic games or computer trivia to unlock ServerTycoon Cyber Boxes;
  • Blockchains Apocalypse: Find out new ways to make money using EVERY computational resource. Set up your rig but beware of heat and power consumption;
  • Subsea Farm: Free cooling... unlimited building space... and also free power! But the down side of the coin are an initial high-cost and not possibility to upgrade or maintenance. Be smart and plan your datacenter successfully;
  • Singularity: Use Bio-Machines made of tissues and neurons instead of silicon, gold and other metals. This scenario offers you an outlook of a dystopian future but beware... shut down your servers before they will prevail on you!

Please note: the Quests listed above could be subject to minor changes in title and contents.

5 € Supporters

We appreciate all the support we can get, even if you cannot afford more. This will let you follow the campaign and see the same updates as all the other backers. Your name will be mentioned in a special web page, on the ServerTycoon website, dedicated to our crowdfunding campaign.

10, 20, 40 and 99 € Supporter

All our Bakers that will contribute with 10 EUR, or more, will receive an Account to play ServerTycoon forever plus:

  • your name in the game credits page
  • a thank-you letter sent to your preferred address
  • an initial capital of Game Coins base on your pledge (read below)
  • one Techie of the Employment Agency will have your Nickname and Avatar (No other Techies will be created at the end of the campaign)
  • you can configure your Techie with a professional profiles available at your pledge level (read below)
  • you will have a bunch of experience points (XP) to distribute on relevant skills of your Techie, based on your pledge (read below)
  • your Techie will be available and ready to work in your company
  • your Techie exclusive plastic Badge customised with your Nickname, Avatar and a QRCode to redeem a special content in ServerTycoon. You can also use your badge to activate the Augmented Reality ServerTycoon explorer mobile App.

 

Here below the pledge levels:

10 € Mega-Supporters

  • The Standard Account: allows you to play the game
  • you can choose 1 of 2 professional profiles for your Techie
  • 5 XP to distribute to your Techie skills (pledge level 1)
  • 25k Coins

20 € Giga-Supporters

  • The Creator Account: unlocks the Creator Mode, you'll be able to design your own Datacenter plan, your custom Hardware (and sell it on the in-game store)
  • you can choose 1 of 4 professional profiles for your Techie
  • 10 XP to distribute to your Techie skills (pledge level 2)
  • 75k Coins
  • our Exclusive ServerTycoon mousepad (Augmented Reality ready)

40 € Tera-Supporters

  • The Funder Account: with a 50% lifetime discount on in-game store
  • you can choose 1 of 6 professional profiles for your Techie
  • 20 XP to distribute to your Techie skills (pledge level 3) 
  • 175k Coins
  • your name in the game's credits
  • a funder-class building in the Funder's Park
  • a green spot in the Funder's Park of The Valley with your Nickname
  • your Avatar in the buildings Rolling Poster visible to all players
  • our Exclusive ServerTycoon mousepad (Augmented Reality ready)
  • the ServerTycoon printed user manual

99 € Peta-Supporters

  • The Funder Account: with a 75% lifetime discount on in-game store
  • you can choose 1 of 8 professional profiles for your Techie
  • 40 XP to distribute to your Techie skills (pledge level 4)
  • 375k Coins
  • your name in the game's credits
  • a funder-class building in the Funder's Park
  • a green spot in the Funder's Park of The Valley with your Nickname
  • your Avatar in the buildings Rolling Poster visible to all players
  • our Exclusive ServerTycoon mousepad (Augmented Reality ready)
  • the ServerTycoon printed user manual
  • our Exclusive 3D Printed model, our tribute to the history of Computers

Physical Perks table

Digital Perks table

We reserve the right to refuse nickname and avatars. Offensive material (e.g., hate speech, encouraging violence against others, etc), pornographic material, material (e.g., political, religious, etc) that is likely to be upsetting, insulting, or objectionable to some or most people will not be allowed.

Please note that these are 3D printed products intended for decorative purposes. They are not suited to be used as toys or to be given to underage children. The products should not come into contact with electricity and be kept away from heat. They are not food safe.

We created the game’s name, logo, code, art and concept. The 3D printed scale model perks are strongly based on shape of historical computer. This would be our little tribute to some of the brands that made the history of computer. All these companies owns the copyright of their respective products and brand names.

 

What we already have

We already have some work done. In particular we have:

  • a renewed game design resulting from the feedbacks collected from our followers
  • a prototype you can see in the gameplay clips and images here and in our Facebook, Twitter and YouTube channels
  • algorithms for some of the features like attack/defence, real estate, shop & inventory
  • some 3D models of buildings and equipments used for prototyping
  • a very first prototype of the mobile porting

What we still need

We would complete ServerTycoon as soon as we can but we still needs some important pieces... web services still need to be improved and completed, music and sounds are missing, performances are not perfect, many game contents are still to be created, etc…

Your pledge will be invested in hardware costs, software costs, production costs, legal fees, publishing fees, licensing, trademark and copyright fees, as well as in marketing and advertising... We aren't a large corporation with PR teams and endless euro to spend. We're just two guys that strongly believe in ServerTycoon and, of course, in your support.

We have foreseen the following budget allocation but percentages could slightly vary:

20000 € Stretch Goal

Mobile Edition: We are focusing all our effort to release  the PC version as soon as possible. But since we already spent a lot of time preparing a very good mobile prototype that recreates the same PC Gameplay, with your help we will hire additional resources fully assigned to this porting. (Est. delivery by the end of Q3 2020)

25000 € Stretch Goal

2D Pixel Art Graphics: Currently the game development is based on a brand new graphic engine which make use of a isometric and First Person View 3D modes. But we still strongly believe that the 2D Pixel-Art interface creates a magic atmosphere and a significantly different Game Experience so if you also believe in this please help us and let the magic happen! (Est. delivery Q1 2021)

30000 € Stretch Goal

Multi language: We are hopefully making a game able to entertain people from all around the world. With the aim of maximising the game experience we kindly ask you to help us raising funds to involve in the team professionals able to create a more natural-language translations (Est. delivery by the end of Q2 2020).

 

PC System Requirements

  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+, macOS 10.11+, Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • CPU: SSE2 instruction set support

 

Thank you for taking the time to check out our project. We truly appreciate it! If you'd like to get involved, any amount helps - head back up to the top of the page, and look for the big 'Back It' button on the right-hand side.

story:
PLAY THE OPEN ALPHA

Enjoy the first level of chapter 1 at this link:

https://playgamesperu.itch.io/el-viaje-de-lucius

 

Lucius is a child who dreams that some day he would be able to touch the stars and travel inside them. He enjoys his happy childhood in the countryside surrounded by the tranquillity of nature in what appears to be a normal and carefree life.

One night as he was sleeping he woke up at midnight… startled by a blinding light which came through his bedroom window and woke him up. Once the light had disappeared he realized that he was alone at home and decided to explore - it is at that moment that our journey begins.

"The Journey of Lucius" is a 2D sidescroller adventure for Windows PC. Immersed in a range of scenarios the player strives to explore this unique world and its magical atmosphere.

The game is designed to contain 18 levels and 6 bosses at the end of 3 conceptual levels.

Lucius will start his adventure with 3 initial hearts which may be increasing as the game progresses.

The initial skill of Lucius is to stun enemies jumping on them and being able to lift them up and launch them as projectiles. This would defeat them if hitting another opponent or a wall.

Inside the game you will be able to obtain weapons that will help you to finish your adventure, defeat enemies and discover new passages and hidden items.

In total about 50 different enemies will be found in the game.

Lucius : A 10-year-old child and the main character of the game.

Shiny: A guiding light with beautiful eyes which accompanies Lucius during his journey.

Big Angel: Appears after defeating each boss.

Bosses: Medi, Momo, Basty, Perl, Sick and B. Lucky 

Some enemy concept art

Some level concept art

"Play Games Peru" is a Peruvian game development studio born in May 2015 as an initiative of Jose Lira. We currently have six titles in the Google Play Store and will keep on creating more for the same platform.

With The Journey of Lucius however, we feel that the game is conceptually unique and has potential beyond a mobile game and would best be experienced on a desktop PC.

Let me introduce you to our team:

Jose Lira - Game Designer & Programmer.

Karl Gutierrez - Art.

Edward Zela - Level Designer.

Marcos Apaza - Programmer.

If we reach the desired goal, a release date for PC of Q4 2017 the latest will be very much feasible.

We will however not be able to do this without you.

The money collected for "The Journey of Lucius" will be used in the following way:

In addition rewards for your fantastic support may include:

  • T-shirts with official logos of "The Journey Of Lucius".
  • Official installation media to install the game directly to your PC.
  • Virtual books with the art of the game.
  • A big Thank You via e-mail.
  • Video of appreciation by the entire staff of "Play Games Peru".
  • Your name in the credits of the game.

 In case of failure to reach the goal, your money will be refunded.

If you are interested in seeing "The Journey of Lucius" become reality but are unable to support the project financially, there are other ways to help out:

  • Become a fan of our official Facebook page.
  • Follow us at Twitter.
  • Share this campaign with your friends on social networks.
  • Share your opinion about the game and ways to improve it.
  • Follow this campaign in Indiegogo and stay tuned for updates.
  • Use the integrated tools on Indiegogo to share this project further.
Thank you very much
story_txt:
PLAY THE OPEN ALPHA
Enjoy the first level of chapter 1 at this link:
https://playgamesperu.itch.io/el-viaje-de-lucius
 

Lucius is a child who dreams that some day he would be able to touch the stars and travel inside them. He enjoys his happy childhood in the countryside surrounded by the tranquillity of nature in what appears to be a normal and carefree life.

One night as he was sleeping he woke up at midnight… startled by a blinding light which came through his bedroom window and woke him up. Once the light had disappeared he realized that he was alone at home and decided to explore - it is at that moment that our journey begins.

"The Journey of Lucius" is a 2D sidescroller adventure for Windows PC. Immersed in a range of scenarios the player strives to explore this unique world and its magical atmosphere.
The game is designed to contain 18 levels and 6 bosses at the end of 3 conceptual levels.
Lucius will start his adventure with 3 initial hearts which may be increasing as the game progresses.
The initial skill of Lucius is to stun enemies jumping on them and being able to lift them up and launch them as projectiles. This would defeat them if hitting another opponent or a wall.

Inside the game you will be able to obtain weapons that will help you to finish your adventure, defeat enemies and discover new passages and hidden items.

In total about 50 different enemies will be found in the game.

Lucius : A 10-year-old child and the main character of the game.
Shiny: A guiding light with beautiful eyes which accompanies Lucius during his journey.
Big Angel: Appears after defeating each boss.
Bosses: Medi, Momo, Basty, Perl, Sick and B. Lucky 

Some enemy concept art

Some level concept art

story:
Who we are

We are two on the team right now. I'm the programmer and my friend is the visual artist. He does all of the textures and I do all of the programming.

I am a self-taught programmer, but I have studied some courses in programming. I can program in C#, JavaScript, HTML, and Python.

What do we do with the money we have received

The money will go to get our game up on Steam, buy licenses for programs, website and domain and advertising.

What is the game about

You are the best pilot in the world. The David Petterson foundation has converted the whole world to a 2D space. It only exists one space rocket who can fly in 2D. You, as the best pilot in the world, is the pilot who is going to fly this ship and kill "The Supreme David". You need to get the 3D stone. This is your mission.

In which state is the game?

Right now is the game in a state where you can play, it but it only exists one level. We are planning on giving you update notes every weak until the first beta gets released. 

Other ways you can help

If you don't want to spend money, but still want to help us. What can you do?

  • If you are good at programming(C# / Unity) or good at drawing pixel art just mail us at space.zone.game@gmail.com (don't expect to be paid)
  • Tips you friends.

story:
Cubanoid is a hardocore puzzle that represents a massive labyrinth packed with dangerous traps, enemies and logical brain twisters. Just one improper step and you are excluded. At the initial stages of its development the game looked like classical puzzle Sokoban, the main goal of which was to place boxes into corresponding places. Although new ideas have been arising. We did our best to implement them making the game interesting and unique.

There are 25 handcrafted levels with pleasant graphics, exclusive background music and cumbersome brain teasers that will make you think hardly. We have realized 80% of planned functionality at the moment. User interface and thorough testing should be processed with until the official release in December, 2017.

 

  • 25 handcrafted levels
  • Awesome and atmospheric sound background created exclusively for the game
  • Puzzles with buttons - put the puzzles on special buttons to activate them
  • World rotation - you can move through 3 dimensions in this world that greatly helps you in  puzzle solving
  • Energy - in order to move in the game you need energy. Gather cartridges to refill energy
  • Thorns - dangerous traps that are automatically activated every second. They can be on continuously and in order to disable this trap, you need to reach the corresponding button.
  • Lava - avoid lava not to drown in this dangerous liquid
  • Fragile floor - having stepped on this floor, you have a moment to decide what way to move further otherwise you will fall down into abyss
  • Current - you need to find the source of current and disable it, otherwise you won’t be able to proceed..Sometimes you may use it to clear up the way.   
  • Moving walls - long halls keep hidden threats that can suddenly throw you down into the abyss
  • Astral floor - is highly unstable and can disappear under your feet
  • 360 degrees turrets - the echo of the past, left after the first geometrical war, being dangerous as previously. It allows to make several shots and rotates 360 degrees.
  • Wandering fire-balls - hot balls moving in non-predictable way. It is better not to get close to these objects.
  • Teleporter - be careful and consider the side you enter the teleporter, since you can be caught in the trap or even fall down. Having special keys you can open the teleporters in the game, that is actually the aim of the game.

 

Our team includes 3 persons only although our ambitions and strivings make each work hardly. We had been working in different spheres previously, accumulating programming, design and project management skills. About half a year ago we decided to take new, extremely interesting approach - game developing.

We realized that really good product does not tolerate even a little compromise and were completely involved into its planning. Having saved some money we left our jobs and concentrated on implementing the new idea. Six hard-working months have passed. Within this time lots of coffee has been drunk and we are ready to represent the results, our first game.

We have a goal that made us change our life drastically. Six months have passed since we plunged ourselves into game developing and we are absolutely sure that the project of any compexity will be realized by our team. Time and human resources define the success of our projects, therefore we have strong desire to turn our team into large-scale game development company. Certainly it is thorny and difficult path, but we are ready to face the challenges. Your support is foremost for us and means we are on the right way. Each cent you invest will be contributed into developing new projects and in exchange of your support we offer you the unique possibility to access early versions of our games and their copies to be developed in the future. Stay tuned and follow our official website, Facebook and Twitter pages.

 

If you can't back the project, you can still help it by telling about the project to your friends and family. Also, we'd be extremely grateful if you share the Indiegogo Campaign page. The campaign will reach its goal faster with your help.

Thank you for being with us!

story:
Why simple games are so popular?

Everybody likes to compete and break a records of their friends.

When the game is so simple but you can't achieve your friend's record, you start to play this game everywhere and every time.
 

Which disadvantages are in the popular simple games?

Of course, there isn't a financial goal.

Imagine that all developers add material bonuses for gamers if they achieve an announced level or a record (for example 10 000 points).

Interest in this games will increase in several times.

 

What does our team want to do?

We want to create not only cool game, but we want to develop CRAZY HYIP, which will spread through all World and all gamers could take part in World Championship with the main prize - BTC (amount BTC will depend on collected money).
We'll attract all popular bloggers in the World and make an unbelievable boom.


It will be very cool!


Conditions of the competition and prizes for gamers we will announce after completing campaign on the Indiegogo.

 


Thanks everybody for your attention and funding!

story:
HUNGRY PANDA ADVENTURE - IT'S ALL ABOUT THE PANDAS!
Panda pictures and videos in this campaign © Pandas International

My name is Paul Alvarado Mendoza and i'm a Social Entrepreneur at Tensaii in Umeå, Sweden. Our partner Pandas International is a non-profit organisation based in Colorado, USA. Together we proudly present the Hungry Panda Adventure a mainstream puzzle game that will be donating up to 90% of the profits to Pandas International. We need your support to develop this game and make it available worldwide 2015/2016 to help save the Giant pandas from extinction. 

"You play a free game, you have fun and you help save some pandas"

We invite YOU to support this project and support us in this campaign so that we can develop the Hungry Panda Adventure.

Donate, buy a perk, share the campaign on social media, LIKE our Facebook page.
 Join us and let's save some pandas! 

Hungry Panda Adventure - LIKE OUR FACEBOOK PAGE
Share this Tweet and ask people to retweet

When buying a perk you will be able to add size, color or goods for the Bronze, Silver, Gold, Diamond and Platinum Perks.
 Remember If the campaign is not a success you will get a full refund. 

When seeing the Giant panda we can't help falling in love with them. It saddens us that they are endangered and there are less than 2000 Giant pandas left on the planet. There are around 1600 in the wild and 300 in captivity. They really need our help now! 

"Endangered means we have time... Extinction is forever" - Pandas International

There are several challenges when taking care of pandas, one is economical. Just taking care of one panda costs around 10,000$ each year. Funds are really important to be able to increase the panda population. 

Increasing the panda population, would increase costs and the need for more donations. There are a lot of good people donating funds today and a lot of non-profit organisations that are doing their best to save the pandas.

But the situation is far from sustainable. It might never become sustainable, because non-profit organisations are not businesses. They do not focus on making profits and therefore lack a sustainable business model that's why they need funds.

OUR PROPOSAL FOR A SOLUTION
We propose to create a sustainable business model with a separate product. The product being the Hungry Panda Adventure. We chose a game because games reach billions of people and make billions of dollars each year. With big volumes we can make more profits and spread the knowledge about the pandas and their situation. 

WHY WE CHOSE INDIEGOGO & WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

With your support we can have this game available for download on IOS and Android 2015/2016. The faster we make the game available the better it will be for the pandas. This is an urgent matter! Your contribution is vital for this project to be launched soon. We need you're help! 

We chose crowdfunding because we don't want to change our creative freedom with the Hungry Panda Adventure game concept or the donation model. We want to donate up to 90% of the profits to Pandas International. The donation model is the most vital components of the project, we don't want to change it at all! 
 
There are a lot of people that think that we are a bit crazy. Why would i go to such lengths to see this project through. But what motivates me is that If 10 million people play our free game, for a couple of hours per month over a period of a year. The ad revenue could be around 1.8 million dollars per year, or more. What if this is the future of how you support a cause, by playing free games? My dream is bigger than Hungry Panda Adventure, but this is a test of the concept, if this doesn't get funded, then why bother trying other similar concepts? This is why we need your support! 

There are two things that have motivated me to continue. First of all I am grateful to Pandas International for believing in me, the idea and supporting it. Second of all almost everyone that hears about the project loves the concept. If the game was available today, they would download it and play it. We welcome any kind of feedback about the game, the idea or our campaign. Please feel free to comment and hopefully we can improve. 

We chose Indiegogo's fixed funding because we need your support to really make this project real. Our dream of helping the pandas should be a common struggle, join us, make this project real by supporting us. Let's save some pandas! 

We have invested in developing a simple prototype and mock-ups that are shown in this campaign. By making a prototype it is easier to communicate the game concept when developing the game that will be released. 

Let's keep our eyes on the prize! Let's work together and let's save some pandas!  


THE HUNGRY PANDA ADVENTURE!

The Hungry Panda Adventure will be available for FREE when released. You won't ever need to buy anything in the game with real money. Coins are collected easily in the game! With coins you buy items, buy power ups, boosters and more. The more you play, the higher you can score, collect more coins and help save more pandas! 

HOW TO PLAY 
The Hungry Panda Adventure is about a really hungry panda. By collecting food tiles you can feed him. But be careful, because you are constantly playing against the clock. When you feed the panda you level up and score more points. While playing the game and collecting food tiles you will receive time bonuses that adds time to the timer.  



You will be able to connect to social media and compete with friends in the scoreboard page. There is a booster wheel that can be spun freely once a day. You will be able to win free boosters daily. Boosters are used to boost one game. 

Your name in the game credits with Bronze, Silver, Gold, Diamond and Platinum perks

Purchasing the Bronze, Silver, Gold, Diamond and Platinum perks will get you onto the Credits page inside the game. It will be in alfabetical order with name, city and country. Platinum Perks will be shown first, then diamond, gold, silver and lastly bronze perks.       

Buy a perk and get an awesome gift, spread the word, share the project, like hungry panda adventure on Facebook! 

SHORT ABOUT ME 

Thank you for reading this far!
My name is Paul Alvarado Mendoza. I'm 33 years old and live in Umeå Sweden. I have a masters degree of science in User Experience design. I have been working with project leading and user experience design since my graduation in 2008. I have been lucky to have worked with a lot of different things - vehicle safety research, cultural studies and how it affects design, theories for designing complex systems, responsive web design, in-car entertainment design, game concepts, apps, gamification and more. 

I am also a proud co-founder of a non-profit organisation since 2012 by the name of Reach Sweden. With Reach we try to connect people from different cultures, social and educational levels to fight segregation and prejudices. We use dance and art as a tool to spread awareness and fundraise to support different causes. We have raised funds to doctors without borders, SOS barnbyar and more. Since our work in Reach i've been interested in social entrepreneurship and social innovation. 


I started a company Tensaii in march 2015 based in Umeå. I wanted to work with innovative projects that could help others. We are a IT consultancy firm that invests our profits into social entrepreneurship projects that we are very passionate about. By hiring us, we can work on social innovations that can change the world. The Hungry Panda Adventure is our first social entrepreneurial project and far from our last social project. Join us in finding new ways of healing the world. 

"Play a free game, have fun and let's save some pandas"

ABOUT THE PERKS
We have tried to be socially responsible in our perk gifts as well. Most of the gifts are Ecological/Organic and Fairtrade. The Swedish perk gifts with Hungry Panda Adventure print, the bambu pen, cloth bag and t-shirt are provided by Gröna Tryck. The fantastic chocolate is provided by Plantations.

When buying a perk you will be able to add size, color or goods for the Bronze, Silver, Gold, Diamond and Platinum Perks.
Remember If the campaign is not a success you will get a full refund. 

The American and Pandas international perk gifts with Pandas International print, the eco magnet, travel coffee mug and t-shirt are provided by Pandas International. 

To be able to minimize shipping costs for our supporters in different parts of the world. We have some gifts that are shipped from Sweden with cheaper shipping for the European market and some that are shipped from USA for our american supporters. If you don't feel like buying a perk, please donate, even one dollar can make a difference in the end to reach our initial goal of a 30,000 dollars. 

Please provide the needed contact information so that we will be able to send the wallpaper and perk gifts. Thank you for your support. 


HOW FUNDS FROM THE CAMPAIGN ARE GOING TO BE DISTRIBUTED 

The main campaign of 30,000$ of those funds around 45 - 55% will go to actually developing the game. Around 45% (40-50%) will go to cover merchandise costs in the Perks and 5% are Indiegogo fees.

Reaching 30,000$ or more - Hungry Panda Adventure 

Reaching the main goal of 30,000$ we will have around 15,000$ after campaign costs. This will not cover all of the development costs, but it will cover enough to get started and to develop the Hungry Panda Adventure to a playable BETA version available for IOS. We will have power ups, boosters, combination tiles, and more available in this beta version.    

We will keep you posted on our Facebook page so like the Hungry Panda Adventure Facebook page to get updated! 

Let's save some pandas!

STRETCH GOALS FOR HUNGRY PANDA ADVENTURE
Reaching the stretch goals means developing a better game, spreading the game more and increasing the chances of saving more pandas. So Let's save some pandas!


RISKS

Game development is a tough business and it's costly to develop good games. Reaching the 100,000 dollars First Release Goal would make it possible to release a stable first version for both IOS and Android. But reaching the main goal of 30,000 or 50,000 goal we are able to start development.

The risks decreases the higher stretch goal we reach. The funding goal that would give us the best chances to save some pandas and of success is the 200,000 Instant Success stretch goal. To deliver both survival mode and story mode, having the game available in several languages and more plattforms it can reach more people and we can save more pandas. 

Working with IT projects has it's risks, however since I have worked as an IT-consultant, both project leader and user experience designer for several years and am well aware of many development risks and how to avoid them. We also have outsourcing contacts and teams in Europe that are available to support our development with knowdledge. 

The gifts in the perks could be delayed a couple of weeks if the volumes are very high. Everyone will get their gift. It might just take longer before they arrive but we promise that we will work really hard to ship all the goods. Paul from Tensaii in Sweden and Andrea from Pandas International in USA will be doing the shipping. If the campaign is a success we will start the shipping from October. We will do our best to provide the goods in December 2015 and the latest in February 2016. We will keep all the donators updated on the progress. 

FEEL FREE TO CONTACT ME

If you have any questions don't hesitate to ask, i'll do my best to answer as soon as possible. Interested to help, support this project in any way, please contact me. 

E-mail: paul.alvarado.mendoza@tensaii.com
Twitter: @TensaiiTogether
Facebook: Hungry Panda Adventure

Best regards
Paul Alvarado Mendoza & Pandas International

The ad revenue could be around 1.8 million dollars per year, or more. What if this is the future of how you support a cause, by playing free games? My dream is bigger than Hungry Panda Adventure, but this is a test of the concept, if this doesn't get funded, then why bother trying other similar concepts? This is why we need your support! There are two things that have motivated me to continue. First of all I am grateful to Pandas International for believing in me, the idea and supporting it. Second of all almost everyone that hears about the project loves the concept. If the game was available today, they would download it and play it. We welcome any kind of feedback about the game, the idea or our campaign. Please feel free to comment and hopefully we can improve. We chose Indiegogo's fixed funding because we need your support to really make this project real. Our dream of helping the pandas should be a common struggle, join us, make this project real by supporting us. Let's save some pandas! We have invested in developing a simple prototype and mock-ups that are shown in this campaign. By making a prototype it is easier to communicate the game concept when developing the game that will be released. 
Let's keep our eyes on the prize! Let's work together and let's save some pandas!  

THE HUNGRY PANDA ADVENTURE!The Hungry Panda Adventure will be available for FREE when released. You won't ever need to buy anything in the game with real money. Coins are collected easily in the game! With coins you buy items, buy power ups, boosters and more. The more you play, the higher you can score, collect more coins and help save more pandas! 
HOW TO PLAY The Hungry Panda Adventure is about a really hungry panda. By collecting food tiles you can feed him. But be careful, because you are constantly playing against the clock. When you feed the panda you level up and score more points. While playing the game and collecting food tiles you will receive time bonuses that adds time to the timer.  
You will be able to connect to social media and compete with friends in the scoreboard page. There is a booster wheel that can be spun freely once a day. You will be able to win free boosters daily. Boosters are used to boost one game. 

Your name in the game credits with Bronze, Silver, Gold, Diamond and Platinum perks
Purchasing the Bronze, Silver, Gold, Diamond and Platinum perks will get you onto the Credits page inside the game. It will be in alfabetical order with name, city and country. Platinum Perks will be shown first, then diamond, gold, silver and lastly bronze perks.       
Buy a perk and get an awesome gift, spread the word, share the project, like hungry panda adventure on Facebook! SHORT ABOUT ME Thank you for reading this far! My name is Paul Alvarado Mendoza. I'm 33 years old and live in Umeå Sweden. I have a masters degree of science in User Experience design. I have been working with project leading and user experience design since my graduation in 2008. I have been lucky to have worked with a lot of different things - vehicle safety research, cultural studies and how it affects design, theories for designing complex systems, responsive web design, in-car entertainment design, game concepts, apps, gamification and more. 


I am also a proud co-founder of a non-profit organisation since 2012 by the name of Reach Sweden. With Reach we try to connect people from different cultures, social and educational levels to fight segregation and prejudices. We use dance and art as a tool to spread awareness and fundraise to support different causes. We have raised funds to doctors without borders, SOS barnbyar and more. Since our work in Reach i've been interested in social entrepreneurship and social innovation. 

I started a company Tensaii in march 2015 based in Umeå. I wanted to work with innovative projects that could help others. We are a IT consultancy firm that invests our profits into social entrepreneurship projects that we are very passionate about. By hiring us, we can work on social innovations that can change the world. The Hungry Panda Adventure is our first social entrepreneurial project and far from our last social project. Join us in finding new ways of healing the world. 
"Play a free game, have fun and let's save some pandas"


ABOUT THE PERKSWe have tried to be socially responsible in our perk gifts as well. Most of the gifts are Ecological/Organic and Fairtrade. The Swedish perk gifts with Hungry Panda Adventure print, the bambu pen, cloth bag and t-shirt are provided by Gröna Tryck. The fantastic chocolate is provided by Plantations. When buying a perk you will be able to add size, color or goods for the Bronze, Silver, Gold, Diamond and Platinum Perks.Remember If the campaign is not a success you will get a full refund. The American and Pandas international perk gifts with Pandas International print, the eco magnet, travel coffee mug and t-shirt are provided by Pandas International. To be able to minimize shipping costs for our supporters in different parts of the world. We have some gifts that are shipped from Sweden with cheaper shipping for the European market and some that are shipped from USA for our american supporters. If you don't feel like buying a perk, please donate, even one dollar can make a difference in the end to reach our initial goal of a 30,000 dollars. Please provide the needed contact information so that we will be able to send the wallpaper and perk gifts. Thank you for your support. 























HOW FUNDS FROM THE CAMPAIGN ARE GOING TO BE DISTRIBUTED 
The main campaign of 30,000$ of those funds around 45 - 55% will go to actually developing the game. Around 45% (40-50%) will go to cover merchandise costs in the Perks and 5% are Indiegogo fees.


Reaching 30,000$ or more - Hungry Panda Adventure 
Reaching the main goal of 30,000$ we will have around 15,000$ after campaign costs. This will not cover all of the development costs, but it will cover enough to get started and to develop the Hungry Panda Adventure to a playable BETA version available for IOS. We will have power ups, boosters, combination tiles, and more available in this beta version.    We will keep you posted on our Facebook page so like the Hungry Panda Adventure Facebook page to get updated! Let's save some pandas!
STRETCH GOALS FOR HUNGRY PANDA ADVENTUREReaching the stretch goals means developing a better game, spreading the game more and increasing the chances of saving more pandas. So Let's save some pandas!






















RISKS
Game development is a tough business and it's costly to develop good games. Reaching the 100,000 dollars First Release Goal would make it possible to release a stable first version for both IOS and Android. But reaching the main goal of 30,000 or 50,000 goal we are able to start development.The risks decreases the higher stretch goal we reach. The funding goal that would give us the best chances to save some pandas and of success is the 200,000 Instant Success stretch goal. To deliver both survival mode and story mode, having the game available in several languages and more plattforms it can reach more people and we can save more pandas. Working with IT projects has it's risks, however since I have worked as an IT-consultant, both project leader and user experience designer for several years and am well aware of many development risks and how to avoid them. We also have outsourcing contacts and teams in Europe that are available to support our development with knowdledge. The gifts in the perks could be delayed a couple of weeks if the volumes are very high. Everyone will get their gift. It might just take longer before they arrive but we promise that we will work really hard to ship all the goods. Paul from Tensaii in Sweden and Andrea from Pandas International in USA will be doing the shipping. If the campaign is a success we will start the shipping from October. We will do our best to provide the goods in December 2015 and the latest in February 2016. We will keep all the donators updated on the progress. 
FEEL FREE TO CONTACT ME
If you have any questions don't hesitate to ask, i'll do my best to answer as soon as possible. Interested to help, support this project in any way, please contact me. 
E-mail: paul.alvarado.mendoza@tensaii.comTwitter: @TensaiiTogetherFacebook: Hungry Panda AdventureBest regards

Paul Alvarado Mendoza & Pandas International

story:
Airsoft Arena Schweiz

Hallo lieber Leser, Airsoft Begeisteter, Interessent

Wir, der Airsoft Verein S.I.F.A. und im Namen der Mitglieder sowie des Präsidenten und Vize Präsidenten, möchten euch unsere Idee von einer Airsoft Arena in der Schweiz präsentieren und begeistern können.

Wir stehen für Swiss Indoor Federation of Airsoft und möchten die erste kommerziell und professionell genutzte Airsoft Arena der Schweiz eröffnen.

Die Personen unter euch welche mit dem Mannschafts-Sport schon vertraut sind, wissen wie schwer es heutzutage ist, ein Feld zu bekommen um regelmäßig Spiele zu veranstalten. Einerseits ist es von Gesetzeswegen verunmöglicht oder durch Anwohner oder Besitzer und nicht zuletzt Sicherheitstechnisch bedingt nicht machbar. Darum haben wir uns überlegt, eine Halle zu mieten, eine Faszinierende Map zu entwickeln mir vielen technischen Highlights. So stehen wir in keinem Konflikt mit Gesetzen, Behörden und Anwohner.

Somit werden wir Woche für Woche, Jahr für Jahr euch eine Top Location bieten können zu fairen Konditionen.

Hello dear reader, Airsoft enthusiasts, interested

We, the Airsoft club S.I.F.A. and on behalf of the members and the president and vice president, we would like to be able to present and inspire our idea of ​​an Airsoft Arena in Switzerland.

We stand for Swiss Indoor Federation of Airsoft and want to open the first commercially and professionally used Airsoft Arena Switzerland.

The people among you who are already familiar with the team sport, to know how hard it is these days to get a box to organize matches regularly. On the one hand, it is impossible of laws or because of conditions not feasible by residents or owners and not least the safety point. That's why we thought about renting a hall to develop a fascinating map with many technical highlights. So we are in no way conflict with laws, authorities and residents.

Thus, we are every week, every year can offer you a top location at a fair price.

Aber

Wie genau haben wir vor, euch dieses Erlebnis bieten zu können?

Wir sind seit geraumer Zeit daran, eine passende Umgebung zu finden. Es kommen Zentrale Schwerpunkte zum tragen wie;

- Miete
- Grösse
- Infrastruktur wie Büros, WC Anlagen
- Standort

Nun, da du unsere Kampagne liest, bedeutet dies, wir haben passende Lokalitäten gefunden. Die Hallen sind groß, Lichtdurchflutet und besitzen Büros sowie WC Anlagen.

Natürlich kommen kleine Technische Highlights zum tragen wie der Einbau von Schwarzlicht, damit fluoreszieren deine BB's, oder eine Nebelmaschine um deine Sicht zu trügen und und und.

Da Gewerbeobjekte meist über einen längeren Zeitraum gemietet werden müssen stehen wir vor einem großen Risiko. Zudem stellt sich die Frage der Liquidität. Um diese Herausforderung zu meistern und euch ein einmaliges Erlebnis bieten zu können suchen wir nun deine Hilfe um das Objekt für die Mindest Laufzeit von 3 Jahren zu mieten.

How exactly do we intend to be able to offer you this experience?

We have for some time out to find a suitable environment. It features key priorities for wear as;

- rent
- Size
- Infrastructure such as offices, toilets
- location

Now that you are reading our campaign, it means we have found suitable locations. The halls are large, bright and have offices and toilet facilities.

Of course, small Technical highlights to come wearing such as the installation of black light in order to fluoresce your BB's, or a fog machine to be deceptive about your vision and so on.

Since commercial properties must be rented for a longer period usually we are facing a big risk. In addition, the question of liquidity. In order to meet this challenge and to be able to offer you a unique experience, we are now looking for your help around the object for the minimum term of 3 years to rent.


Was passiert danach, Was bekommst du

Sollten wir unser Ziel erreichen, können wir die Halle für 3 Jahre finanzieren und regelmäßige Events anbieten. Mit zusätzlichen Einnahmen können wir das Spielerlebnis verbessern und unser Angebot erweitern. Zudem werden wir durch die Einnahmen die Existenz der Halle sichern und vielleicht in Zukunft expandieren können und Vereinen der ganzen Schweiz ein zuhause zum spielen bieten können.

Jeder Franken, Euro, USD, YEN egal mit was du bezahlst, du erhältst es wieder zurück. Wie das? Wir möchten keinen Profit aus diesem Vorhaben ziehen sondern jedem die Möglichkeit geben, ein Teil davon zu sein. Darum erhältst du den Gegenwert des gespendeten Betrages in Form einer Prepaid Karte mit der du bei Uns spielen kannst! 

Somit hast du dein Geld;
a) für einen guten Zweck gespendet.
b) deine persönliche Prepaid Karte aufgeladen mit dem du bei uns Spielen kannst.
c) für den Erhalt und die Zukunft dieses Sports eingesetzt.

If we reach our goal, we can finance the hall for 3 years and to offer regular events. With additional revenues we can enhance the gaming experience and expand our offering. In addition, we are through the revenue can secure the existence of the hall and might expand in the future and a home clubs throughout Switzerland can offer to play.

Every franc, Euro, USD, YEN no matter what you pay, you get it back. How so? We would like to draw no profit from this project but to give everyone the opportunity to be part of it. That's why you get the equivalent of the amount donated in the form of a prepaid card with which you can play with us!

Thus you have your money;

a) donated to a good cause.

b) your personal prepaid card loaded with which you can play with us.

c inserted) for the preservation and the future of this sport.



Risiken & Herausforderungen

Wie bei jedem Projekt stehen wir vor Herausforderungen und Risiken. 

Werden genügend Leute anklang finden? Werden wir die Halle auch in Zukunft tragen können? Werdet Ihr unser Spielfeld mögen? Das sind Fragen welche unsere Statistiken und Zahlen nicht beantworten können. Darum versuchen wir auch, eng mit euch zusammen zu arbeiten um Vorschläge und Beiträge konstruktiv umsetzen zu können.

As with any project, we are faced with challenges and risks.

If enough people catch on? If we can carry the hall in the future? Will you like our game? These are questions which can not answer our statistics and figures. That is why we also try to work together to implement suggestions and constructive contributions to work closely with you.


Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

Es gibt immer einen Weg! So unsere Vorstellung somit auch unser Ziel. Du kannst auch ohne Geld helfen;

- Erzähle von unserer Idee und begeistere die Menschen
- Biete deine Muskelkraft an beim Aufbau
- Du hast nicht gebrauchtes Material wie Planen, Netze, Paletten oder sonstiges Zubehör welches du spenden willst

There is always a way! So our idea thus also our goal. You can also help without money;

- Tell about our idea and enthusiastic people
- Offer your muscles' energy to build

You do not want to second-hand equipment such as tarpaulins, nets, pallets or other accessories which you donate 


Was passiert bei einer erfolgreichen Finanzierung?

In erster Linie möchten wir natürlich unser Ziel von 108'000 USD erreichen, sollte aber unser Projekt enormen Andrang finden, so werden wir das Geld natürlich entsprechend besser nutzen können:
- besseres Start-Equipment
- technische Highlights auf dem Spielfeld
- ev. Grössere Spielfelder
- zusätzliches Feld-Material
Somit wird in einem Ersten Schritt die Halle eingemietet. Im nächsten Schritt wird mit eurer Hilfe das Spielfeld geplant, gebaut und getestet. Je nach Finanzierung werden technische Systeme welche das Spielerlebnis verbessern eingebaut.
Danach werden die Unterstützer zu einem "Beta" Test geladen um Verbesserungen und Vorschläge mit einzubringen. Nach erfolgreichem Beta Test wird die Geschäftstätigkeit aufgenommen.
Wir rechnen damit, dass wir die Tore ab dem Oktober 2015 öffnen können. Passend zur kalten Jahreszeit.

Primarily, of course, we want to reach our goal of 108,000 USD, but should find our project with enormous, so we will be able to use the money of course correspondingly better:

- Better start-Equipment
- Technical highlights on the pitch
- Ev big pitches.
- Additional field-material

Thus, in a first step, the hall will be rented. The next step is planned the pitch with your help, built and tested. Depending on funding technical systems are installed which enhance the gaming experience.

After that, the supporters are invited to test a "beta" to improvements and suggestions to bring with. After successful beta testing the business is incorporated.

We expect that we can open the gates from October 2015. In keeping with the cold season.


Warum so viel?

Um euch zu veranschaulichen warum wir einen so hohen Betrag suchen, möchten wir euch einige Eckdaten zur Gemüte führen:
Eine Halle in akzeptabler Größe kostet um die > 2500 CHF / Monat. Damit haben wir eine Spielfläche von rund 2/3 eines Fußballfeldes. Zudem werden die Mietverträge auf mind. 3 Jahre abgeschlossen.
Wie oben beschrieben, umso mehr wir hier rausholen, desto grösser wird die Halle sein und einen besseren Standort kann erzielt werden. Wie jedem bewusst ist, sind Mieten beispielsweise in Zürich höher als im Kt. Aargau.
Natürlich versuchen wir auch Staffelungen und weitere Reduktionen rauszuholen um möglichst kostengünstig eine Arena zu betreiben.

Du siehst, wir haben einiges vor, doch zusammen sind wir stark! Verwirkliche unseren Traum, unsere Idee, unser Vorhaben und sei dabei. Du hilfst, die Zukunft von Airsoft in der Schweiz zu besiegeln!

To illustrate to you why we are looking for such a high amount, we would like to bring you some basic data to mind:

A hall in an acceptable size costs about> 2500 CHF / month. Thus we have a play area of about 2/3 of a football field. In addition, leases are negotiated on min. 3 years.

As described above, the more we get out here, the greater the hall will be a better location and can be achieved. As everyone is aware, for example, rents in Zurich is higher than in Kt. Aargau.

Of course, we also try graduations and further reductions rauszuholen to possible cost to operate an arena.

You see, we have big plans, but together we are strong! Realize our dreams, our ideas, our projects and join in. You are helping to seal the future of airsoft in Switzerland!

story:
"Nyoldlunn, a populous country in Rodinia circa 1207. A land divided into four provinces: Wistal, Furwae, Kapveir, Hopstyn. Peace gave way to conflict after those in power unlocked the secrets of magic and grew mad with power. Following a period of unjust oppression, the lower class finally retaliated which started the peasant revolt as history has proclaimed." 

Tails of Tactics is an independent video game being made for Windows, Mac and Linux by Swift Studios. It is a strategy RPG (sRPG) about a tiger-warrior named Yu, who fights in a rebel group seeking to oust the kingdom's corrupted rulers, dubbed "The Tyrants." Inspired by games such as Final Fantasy Tactics and Ogre Battle, we will develop this game using the custom Tethical game engine.

We are a small team of aficionados who strive to realize this concept and together with your support, we can score another fun title for the sRPG genre.


We need $85,000 to cover all of our costs in producing this game which includes contingencies. (A safety net) The project breakdown is as follows:


The lion's share of our listed amount will go towards artists creating all of the game's visuals followed by the programmer putting the game together. We already have our game plan set up and are ready to get started on it after you show us your interest by getting involved in our well-awaited undertaking. We aim on bringing this to Steam Greenlight! =)

Please check out our cool rewards to see what you can get for pledging!

We are making this game because the sRPG genre needs more love and, more importantly, games under its banner. When the Tethical engine gets released sometime in the future, sooner if this successfully gets funded(!), more sRPGs will then be able to get made by people who want to. Also, anthro characters are a fresh and fun twist style-wise. It's all about community members giving back to each other as fellow creators and we hope that you like what Tails of Tactics has to offer. 


Paradox F. writes a webcomic called Crossing-Over, as well as a webnovel in-progress. He has a graduate degree in business and has a background in organizing numbers including budgets. As project lead, he's in charge of directing the team and producing a lot of the writing. 

Scott Overman, aka Lirmont, is a prolific programmer. He has made and worked on his own game engine, Tethical, for nearly four years plus his other game-related software programs such as a sprite animator, an image-based Unicode font tool, a sprite recolorer, a music mood replacement system, and now an auto-tracer. All of which will be used in the making of our game. Overman's coding skill is amazing and matches with his dedication to sRPGs.

Wenart Gunadi is our lead sprite artist. In addition to digital art, he also practices photography, lecturing, animation and has a passion for video games, particularly strategic ones. Well-seasoned for nearly ten years, Wenart has worked on Vandaria Wars, a Trading Card Game from Indonesia, and art for the games Mana Chronicle and Heroes Empire.

-$90,000
Troop customization feature: Change some of your generic troop's looks at specialized stores in the game!

-$100,000
Online multiplayer battle mode: Pit troops from your save file roster against your friends or other players online!

-$105,000
Unlocked rewards: Increases limited slots by 25% for all rewards giving them more room!

-$115,000
Backer upgrade: Backers automatically move up to Plus and 'Extra Customs #2' expansion will be included to them for free!

-$125,000
More future expansions: Backer-suggested game expansions will be worked on and added upon completion. Three major ones and at least five 'Customs'.

-$150,000
Expanded storyline + Gameplay features: The core game will now have scenes/content that was previously cut and an alternate route. A turn do-over mechanic will also be introduced!


    Every Indiegogo project has risks with levels depending on the project and its people. We may not be a triple-A company or such but we do have the manpower it takes to do this and our desire to finish this project burns brightly. Each team member plays to their strengths, manage resources carefully, and keep constant communication with each other. Transparency and making sure our backers are in the loop are top priorities for us at Swift Studios as well. 


      Even if you cannot back us right now, please show our game to your friends, family and peers by sharing this page's links: Youtube, Twitter, Tumblr. Our team would be most grateful since every bump helps... Let's all make this dream a reality!
story_txt:
"Nyoldlunn, a populous country in Rodinia circa 1207. A land divided 
into four provinces: Wistal, Furwae, Kapveir, Hopstyn. Peace gave way to
 conflict after those in power unlocked the secrets of magic and grew 
mad with power. Following a period of unjust oppression, the lower class
 finally retaliated which started the peasant revolt as history has 
proclaimed."  Tails of Tactics is an independent video game being made for Windows, Mac and Linux by Swift Studios. It is a strategy RPG (sRPG) about a tiger-warrior named Yu, who fights in a rebel group seeking to oust the kingdom's corrupted rulers, dubbed "The Tyrants." Inspired by games such as Final Fantasy Tactics and Ogre Battle, we will develop this game using the custom Tethical game engine.We are a small team of aficionados who strive to realize this concept and together with your support, we can score another fun title for the sRPG genre.

story:
Bride of the Nile game is about a legendary yearly festival for the Nile river originated in ancient Egypt where the Egyptians were believed to sacrifice a virgin to the Nile.

The festival is actually held yearly until now in modern Egypt, of course without sacrificing anything :)

The story is deep, with plot twists and based on historical true events, with different themes. You will take part of historical battles between pharaohs, Persians, Arabs and Byzantines. You will play as a Byzantine noble fighting to save the girl he loves, you will also play as an Egyptian girl escaping from an oppressive military rule....

The PC version will have simple stealth and battle gameplay.

Please try our alpha stage demo online from this link.

It should be also available on steam after we get green light (link below).

Please help us get the green light by clicking here and voting for us.

The story begins a long time ago, in ancient Egypt, right before the fall of the ancient Egyptian empire on the hands of the Persians.


The story begins in ancient Egypt during the last days of the Pharaonic empire, before their fall on the hands of the Persian invaders and the betrayal of some of the Pharaoh's military leaders.

The story then shifts to the 7th century BC during the Byzantine rule of Egypt.

You will meet Mary, a very beautiful Egyptian woman. Her mother is afraid that she might be chosen as the Nile’s virgin so she orders her to only come out at night where no one can see her beautiful face. One time she got out with her friends to play by the bank of Nile river, and one Byzantine noble man called Daniel saw her face from his family's nearby palace and he immediately fell in love with her. ♥

He tries to talk to her and they eventually fall in love.

When Daniel’s mother knows that her son fell in love and wants to marry Mary she got angry because the Egyptian are seen inferior by the Byzantine people. She started to think of a way to get rid of that Egyptian girl.

What will happen to Daniel and Marry?

How will the fight between the new Arab and Byzantine army affect their destiny?

These are some of the characters from the game.

  • Bride of the Nile
The poor beautiful virgin chosen to be sacrificed to the Nile river.


  • Pharaoh
Amasis II and his son Psamtik III, the last Pharaohs defeated by the Persians invading ancient Egypt.


  • The High Priest of Amun
The High Priests of Amun had much influence and power at the time of the pharaohs.


  • Daniel
The Byzantine noble who fell in love with an Egyptian beautiful girl 'Marry' and had to fight to protect her.


  • Daniel's Mother
Daniel's mother is a Byzantine noble who will try to get rid of 'Marry', the love of her son, Daniel.


  • Cambyses II
The Persian king who lead an the army that put an end to the long rule of ancient Egyptian civilization.


  • Amr Ibn Al Aas
The leader of the Arab army heading to Egypt to fight the Byzantines.


  • Heraclius
The emperor of the Byzantine empire.


We are still working on the gameplay, but there will be stealth missions and hack and slash missions.

We are planning to improve the gameplay.
Here is a concept video of the hack and slash gameplay for some battle scenes.


You will also play in battle fields, trying to infiltrate sieges facing enemy's arrows and swords.

Here is a list of some of the OST of the game.


Until we start to create the complete 3D game, we decided to create 'Bride of the Nile' as a story (visual novel) and it is already released to android play store in Japanese.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.RamadanSoft.HanayomeSoundNovel

We need $55,000 to create the complete 3D adventure game 'Bride of the Nile' with English voice acting.

More funding over the target will allow us to add extra levels, more 3D or 2D anime cut-scenes and add full voice acting and hopefully more platforms like mobile can be added.

If you are a gamer, please support this game that will dive into the magical world of ancient Egyptians and Arabs with japanese style drawing.


If you cannot contribute, you can always help by Spreading this campaign using social media or any other means



We are an indie game developer team.

We are the creators of ibn al-nafis visual novel (Digital Story) in English and japanese.

We decided to create a 3D game with comic style story telling called Bride of the Nile. The story covers different aspects of Egypt's history.


はじめまして。

ラマダン・ソフトのエジプト人のラマダンです。
エジプトから、アラブやエジプトの歴史の同人ゲームを作成しています。

イブン・アンナフィースの開発をしました。

イブン・アンナフィースは今までになかったアラブの歴史のビジュアルノベル。
偉大な科学者であり医者のイブン・アンナフィースの物語。
舞台はエジプト、1271年（ヒジュラ暦671年）。
歴史的事実に基づいたお話です。

イブン・アンナフィースは同人ゲームのディーエルサイトコムでランキングになったので、応援してくれた人に心から感謝しています。
それで、もっと続くと思います。

そのあと、ナイルの花嫁を作成しました。
ナイルの花嫁は下記のような物語です。

「――西暦600年代、エジプト。

この地には、古代より受け継がれる生贄の儀式が根付いていた。

年に一度、任意に選ばれた”最も美しい女性”が

ナイル川に投げ込まれ、人食い鰐の餌食となるのだ。

人々はこれを「ナイルの花嫁」と呼んでいた。

一方、ビザンツ帝国の容赦無き支配に苦しむエジプトを
エルサレムから、4000人の謎の部隊がその地目指していた
それは・・・イスラム軍の精鋭部隊である。
迎え討つは百千万の兵力を誇るビザンツ帝国軍。

両者がこの地でぶつかり合う時、
ビザンツ帝国の支配に苦しむエジプトに
降り注ぐのは、希望の光か、血の雨か――。」

残念ながら、クオリティがあまりよくなかったです。
それは申し訳ないです。

今度、ゲームの部分も物語の部分もクオリティをあげて、作り直そうと思っています。
戦闘のゲームプレイなども作り直そうと思っています。
物語部分はまだサウンドノベルのようなものですが、イラストを描きなおそうと思っています。

下記はあたらしいゲームプレイ動画です。


約束のとおり、コミケC86で購入してくださったお客様、パソコン版ができたら、同じシリアルでプレイできるようになります。

ぜひわれわれのパートナーになってください。
よろしくお願いします。
ラマダン
