story:
We are based in Montreal - Canada and we work with a team of collaborators worldwide. We were united by our shared affection of mobile gaming; what a great way to make friends! While we celebrated the good times spent playing together, we also commiserated over games we found repetitive as well as the fact that game producers kept ignoring great ideas for improving those games, so we did the sensible thing and decided to create the ultimate game all of us would enjoy playing!

Quantum is a real time mobile Massively Multiplayer Online Role Playing Game (MMORPG) where your mission is to rebuild our civilization after an alien attack and seventy years of occupation have left us depleted. The weekly cooperative events will allow you to test your strength and defenses, and give you the opportunity to pursue and conquer the invaders and overcome the different challenges this harsh planet will throw at you. On a personal level, since you’re an inhabitant of an irradiated and contaminated world, you’ve started to experience strange, yet positive changes; we chose to call them Quantum Abilities. Let’s see how you can master those!

What makes Quantum extra-special is the Feedback System we are putting in place so that all the players of the Quantum community can shape the storyline and the features of the game. You will find more details about the Feedback System and other features in our video, and a bit below.

Our goals with the Indiegogo Campaign

We’re thrilled about this campaign because:

1) It gives us an opportunity to let you know about Quantum and show you a little bit of what to expect from the game. We hope to create a great fan base so that, when the game launches, we will already have a big crowd of eager players ready to get into the action and make the events even more exciting to participate in!

2) It gives you the opportunity to start participating in the development process right away. That’s right! As we go along, you'll be kept in the front row and your input will be solicited so that you can influence some of the developmental decisions before Quantum is launched!

3) We want Quantum to make it onto your devices as soon as possible. Even though the design process and programming of the game have already started, we need your financial support to complete the project. There are also some fees to cover in order to launch Quantum and its integrated Feedback System. Here is the cost breakdown at a glance:

Challenges

This is our first foray into the mobile game world; we are very aware of this. This is why we are being uber-careful and working extra hard to make sure we deliver a unique experience paired with a high quality product. What we may lack in raw experience in the field of game production, we make up for with massive amounts of passion for this project and the strongest of work ethics. We will achieve this because we surrounded ourselves with those we consider the best people to get the job done in a high quality fashion. Therefore, we feel 100% confident of our success; we sure hope you will get on board with our great adventure!

How to participate in the success of this campaign

To thank you for supporting the project, we have set up some pretty cool rewards! Make sure to choose wisely as they will give you a great head start when you play the game. On top of this, the 100 first contributors will get extra rewards.

Here is a table to compare the different Packs.

Also: Share! Share! Share! Every tiny little bit of sharing using the Indiegogo tools is a great help for the campaign and you will be rewarded accordingly through our referral program (more information below). So, please let your family and friends know about the project and participate in the Team Challenge for a chance to get additional rewards! These are ways to ensure that, together, we make this campaign a success!

Thanks a million for your support! 

The Team at Atomic Cloud Studios

You need more details to make a decision?

You've come to the right place! Here is all you will want to know. 

Here is a bit more about what to expect from Quantum.

Storyline and environment

In the year 2026, a vicious alien attack resulted in unprecedented levels of devastation on Earth. Humans have been hiding underground, barely surviving the alien occupation for the past seventy years. Quantum is the story of how we, the survivors, decide to fight back for our world.

In this first chapter of the game, From the Rubble, the alien aggression has left us with a harsh, rusted world. Luckily, plenty of leftover items and goods can be found in the rubble and are up for grabs; we will find these nifty items pretty useful to arm ourselves against the invaders. Moreover, the aliens may have left behind the key to their own destruction in the form of advanced alien technology which we will use to improve and hybridize our own weapons and skills. The opportunity to change the course of mankind’s future is waiting to be discovered, hidden in the ruins of our fallen civilization.

Various weekly events

  • Spy missions (infiltration, extraction, sabotage, kidnapping, etc.);
  • Invasion/Occupation Wars; 
  • Misfortunes and disasters: biological hazards, natural catastrophes, artificial intelligence gone rogue, and more!

Personal Hero and Army

  • 8 base items of equipment to choose from, each one variable and upgradable to strengthen your Hero;
  • 8 different Quantum Abilities for special powers with spectacular effects;
  • Ground, Motorized and Air Forces to fight alongside with;
  • And Special Creatures too!

Partnership

  • Team up with other players and build a strong Partnership;
  • Worldwide coalition to beat the game in a cooperative manner;
  • Leaders' elaborate dashboard during events for an efficient use of strategy and easy management;
  • Players’ history to show achievements and contributions.

Other

  • Defense: Defense Crew, Buildings and other technologies;
  • Utilities: Coach, Builders, Looters, Strategists, etc.
  • Facilities: Resources, Space management (housing, parking, wildlife center), Academy (to train your army), Research facilities (military, genetics, etc.)

For us, there is nothing more inspiring than the many suggestions and ideas enthusiastic players make regarding the enhancement of a game. This is why the Feedback System is an important component of Quantum.

The fully integrated Feedback System will include:

A) A voting system where you will be able to decide on what rewards we should offer next, some components of the events coming up, the implementation of different ideas suggested by the players community, the direction the story should be heading in, etc.

B) Forums where you will be able to provide suggestions and, in collaboration with other players, improve on those suggestions so that we can make those ideas become a reality in the game.

C) A fan fiction space and contests to inspire the direction the story and the following stages of the game should take.  

D) Live events with the creators/producers of the game.

E) Anything else you might be inclined to suggest that we’re capable of bringing to life!

We can't wait to hear what you have to say!

 

To thank you for sharing the campaign information, we will reward you with 15% (in-game Premium Currency) of the value that your friends contribute to the campaign.

For example, if you share the campaign using the Indiegogo sharing features and a bunch of your friends connect to the platform using your link and contribute a total of 1,000$, you will receive 150$ worth of in-game premium currency. Make sure to use the Indiegogo sharing features as this way, we can track all the donations linked to you.

 

Getting loads of rewards is exciting and we can't wait to distribute them to you! We want to make sure that you are 100% happy with your rewards when you get them; this is why transparency is very important to us so you know what you are getting into.

Here is the detailed information you need to know and understand about the perks.

In-Game Premium Currency

First, please note that the Premium Currency value is the only item amongst the rewards that is cumulative and can be merged into a single account.  

Unless we inform you otherwise, for the purpose of this campaign, the Premium Currency worth will be calculated this way: 1 unit = 1 USD cent value. For example, if you choose the Partner Pack (110$ Perk), you will receive 150$ worth of in-game premium currency, which will translate to 15,000 units.

Name in the Credits

The game’s website will feature a page displaying the names of all the contributors (Crew, Partner and Hero Packs). If you prefer to remain anonymous, you will be able to let us know when the time comes. 

Supporter Account Badge

This will be a special badge that will be displayed in your game account to let everybody know that you directly contributed to the success of the game’s development. If you don't want it to appear, you will be able to turn it off.

Quantum Ability Points

You will be able to boost your Quantum Abilities (QA) as you choose in order to give yourself an edge. You could choose to be a specialist with a particular QA boosted to the max, or distribute your points between the eight QA. These points, like all good things, have to be earned and can only be won by participating in fun, yet challenging events. Please note that you can upgrade an ability to its maximum level by using 100 QA points

Special in-game items

If the perk you choose includes receiving a character or a defense unit, you will receive them at the promised level. Please take note that you won’t be able to upgrade them further until you are at the appropriate level to do so (it will be the same level as all the other players). Nonetheless, having those items right from the start will give you a huge head start in the game, so we hope you will enjoy them greatly! Please have a look at this table to know more about when an item unlocks and is made available in the game.  

Also, the items you will receive count as the first one(s) as the game unfolds. For example, there are five towers that are gained through the different HQ upgrades in the game. If your pack offers you one tower, then it counts as the first unlocked tower in the game. You’ll have to wait until you reach the appropriate level to get a second one (the same level all the players get to build two towers). The good thing is that you won’t have to use in-game resources to build it, nor will it require your precious builders’ time to do so.

Tickets to Atomic Cloud Studios Conventions

These tickets will give you access to the activities for the whole duration of the convention. VIP tickets will grant exclusive access to special activities.

You will be able to redeem the tickets for the year and location of your choice. You can decide to redeem the tickets one at a time in order to attend multiple conventions (up to the number of tickets included in your perk), or you can share them with friends.  

Please note that accommodations, transport, etc., are not included; we offer only the tickets to enter the convention(s).

Participation in the testing of Quantum

When the time comes, we will give you more details about this participation. It will be your responsibility to comply with the terms at that time so you can get into the testing events.

Prototype Live Demo

You will have access to a live demonstration of the game prototype.

Creative session with the design team

This will be an hour-long virtual session with our design team so you can pitch a few of your ideas and brainstorm with us. Your opinion could also be solicited about an upcoming event, for example. This session could (or not) be followed up with a few other meetings to fine-tune the concepts and details. We will let you know if that is the case. Of course, not every idea can be produced exactly as imagined, but we will do our best to make your idea come to life, keeping in mind that it will need to be in line with the vision and theme of the game.

Customized Avatar

In collaboration with our design team, you will create a unique and exclusive avatar for yourself. Some limitations (pornographic content, racist content, etc.) may apply.

Follow-up information request and distribution of the rewards

At a date still to be determined, you will receive a request for more information so we can gather all the necessary details needed to deliver the perks.

Our team will work relentlessly so that you can get your rewards as soon as we can distribute them. You will be responsible for providing us with the information in a reasonable time, and to follow our instructions to retrieve your rewards. 

Delays

We aim to distribute the rewards as soon as the game is released so that you can enjoy them right away. If the release of the game ends up being delayed due to unfortunate circumstances, then the distribution of the rewards will be too. This is not the plan, though! Let's keep this project on track, and we will keep you informed every step of the way!

 

***Wow! Very first achievement – reading through all of this! Congrats! :)

The Team at Atomic Cloud Studios

Short Summary

Hi everyone! My name's Oleksandr (Alex) Shumakov, i am from Ukraine. With my 11-year-old son Nikita (Nick) we've formed "DIY interactive" team for this project. I have to state that I'm not affiliated with Microsoft in any way. I have some skills in working with Microsoft Excel and Visual Basic For Applications (VBA). I love this program for it's flexibility. Some time ago I've heard about games written entirely in Excel macros and loved this idea. Besides the fun side, it also gives an opportunity to develop an effective algorithms for VBA (including needed optimizations assuming demanding character of the video games). So this project was started to try the abilities of VBA to run complex macro as fast and stable as it can. Supporting this project, you help to extend the imaginary limits of using Microsoft Excel as universal building platform to do virtually anything (from performing simple spreadsheet calculations to making entertaining software). It's means not just to support another indie retro-pixel game - it means to support new ideology.

What We Need & What You Get

This project exists since 2016. At the present time the project is on the stage of writing the levels for the game (the two of them are complete for now, the number of 7 planned total) and eliminating some minor bugs. This will require some time to work with. Besides the ability to find free time for completing all needed steps, your support will clearly show the interest to this project and it will boost our enthusiasm (all we know how long the so called "pet projects" can be developed and how often they are leaved not finished because of lack of motivation and free time). If everyone of those who interested in progress of VBA programming and who supports above-mentioned idea will spend at least 1$ to support it, we will see decent sum at the end of company. Retro pixel games fans and pixel art lovers also welcomed.

All the bakers will receive the copy of game soon after the ending of campaign. For 10$ and more the game file will be open for edition and API for creation of your own levels will be added (all the documents will be in English). We can guarantee that you will receive working version of game for Microsoft Office on Windows. If you strongly dislike the retro-pixel appearance of the game (110 x 78 "pixels" per game screen, 56 colors palette!) or it's possibility to run unstable in rare circumstances (because we can't test it on all possible Windows / Office/ machine configurations) then you shouldn't fund it.

The Impact

As was described above, this project is not just another indie retro-looking game, but trying to refine the VBA programming and to make the limits of Excel using wider. You should understand that VBA itself has some issues which make the VBA programs weak in terms of speed and stability. Our program tries to overwhelm some of them by electing most effective algorithms for doing some things in Excel (especially, when it comes to the VBA work with spreadsheet cells). The actual version of our 3D engine is working and stable enough to run it as an entertaining game and to have a fun with it. It wasn't easy to make it work at mean 24 FPS on average office "workhorses" (as I am not a professional programmer, it was personal challenge for me too). Another challenge was to achieve some in-game features as reasonably detailed picture with relatively modern shaders (reflection, transparency, blur), having only 110x78 screen with 56 (!) colors, available in Excel for cell-painting user palette. And I have to create special compressor/extractor procedure to store music/sounds within the .xls file not as ActiveX objects (for reasons of running the game on all the versions of Excel). But now it all works. All the additional media in the game (including pixel art, 3D polygonal/voxel models, sounds and music) were created by me too. As i don't know any game projects in Excel which gained the support and audience in crowd-finding platforms, our project will be the first one - just support it to make it happen.

Risks & Challenges

As it was mentioned above, this project need some additional efforts to be completed. I suppose (but I can't guarantee) that we can make it running 100% stable on virtually any PC with Microsoft  Windows / Office installed (for now the game is tested for integrity with the Win XP, Win 8 and Win 10, but on a few machines). Nevertheless I can guarantee that all the game additional parts (including art and sounds/music, levels) will be completed.

 

Testimonial

"I have definitely heard of programming games in Excel before, but have never been able to try one out. For an Excel game this actually looks pretty amazing!﻿"

PlayJAK Plays  (Youtube guest)

PlayJAK Plays  (Youtube guest)

story:
Summary

  • We are a very small group of programmers and game designers ranging from a High School Senior to Post Grads.
  • This project is designed to attract and engage the young voting demographic by providing a free mobile app that is both entertaining and educational.
  • Any and all contributions will be dedicated to the completion and upkeep of this mobile game.

What We Need & What You Get

  • The funding required for completion of this game will have a directly proportional relationship to the release date, server quality and complexity of any analytics extrapolated from user inputs. (Ideally we would like to extract semi-reliable polling data)
  • If we cannot reach our goal we still intend to move forward with the game, however the timeline will be pushed back significantly and we may not be able to provide reliable game servers. All contributions will still go towards the ongoing effort.

The Impact

  • Our primary goal is to attract any and all voters to the polls in November. However during years where there is no US presidential election, interactive links will be modified to various elections throughout the country. 
  • We believe that every eligible voter should provide their vote, whatever it may be.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Our team has over 20 years of combined programming and development experience. We have the ability and determination to complete this task however there are several challenges to overcome. The biggest obstacles are monetary at this point, hence the campaign. Secondly several of us will need to take time off of are day jobs to meet the time constraints involved. 
  • We intend to continue to design and develop informative mobile apps and games however costs involved can be extensive. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • We understand that not everyone can make a monetary contribution and we respect everyone that has taken the time to view or consider this project. Please feel free to share or leave a comment. All suggestions and feedback are welcome.

story:
ABOUT THIS GAME

 

Adventures of forsenE: The Hobo Knight is a platform style game where content is decided by you, the bajs.

 

 

The star is Forsen, a dishevelled hobo streamer whose girlfriend and snus are unexpectedly stolen by a ‘transparent figure’. To reclaim his love and addiction, he must fight through seven levels of warrias, beating long forgotten bosses and making friends along the way. Expect well-known faces in his adventures, such as Pajlada, as you traverse your way to Spain to confront the final boss.

 

Forsen early design

 

This game realies the boundary between entertaining lidl games and polished AAA games. Each level is estimated to be 1 hour long, creating at least 7 hours of grabbing gameplay.

The creators include: InfiniteGachi, the developer and streamer, Tom Streets, a talented graphic designer, and Fatherpucci1, the sound designer and renowned performance artist.

Main Boss design

This is a work of fiction. Some names, characters, businesses, places, events, locales, and incidents are either the products of the author’s imagination or used in a fictitious manner.

 

STAY TUNED FOR MORE UPDATES TO THIS CAMPAIGN!

story:
Overview

The game consists of 2 modes, Survival mode and campaign.

Survival mod --> Goal is to survive against the monsters.4 build available in game.Camp,tower and totem.This 4 build can be upgradable

 

 

Campaign --> Consists of dozens of parts.Each part is more difficult and complex than the previous one.

 

 

You can buy new weapons and armor or upgrade them with the money that you earned from monsters.You get skill point as the level gets higher.You can upgrade your skills with skill points.

 

 

The game has 3 class:Archer,Knight and Wizard.

 

 

Short Summary

I am 19 years old.I'm a software developer.

I started learning software when I was 15 years old.I did many projects in 4 years.

I did websites, mobile games, etc.

I have been doing the "Underground" computer game with the unity game engine for +1 year.

 

My Goal

The money will be used for the following:

  • Buy unity 3D pro licenses.
  • Buy extra 3D models.
  • Buy Sound effect,music,effects,animation...
  • Steam developer payment.
  • Multiplayer support.
  • Advertising costs.

 

Risks & Challenges

I have been working hard for this game for a long time, without any compensation. I have to manage all aspects of this game by myself.I've been working on this game for +1 year.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are interested in this game please share this page and tell your friends, Thanks to everyone who does , help us spread the word by facebooking, tweeting, or sharing this URL.

Thank you so much for your support.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HunelGames/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hunelgames/

 

Demo released!You can go to the game demo from the link below.

 

More detailed new gameplay video will come soon.

story:
ASCEND Pilot Products LLC is an Aviation Training Company.  We are focused on developing exciting and innovative methods of studying aviation.   

NOTE TO CFI's - THIS IS A COMPREHENSIVE STUDY METHOD FOR AVIATION, DISGUISED AS A "GAME" - This is a serious aviation training platform demanding  pilot interaction with other pilots to verbally answer actual FAA questions that are given for the Private Pilot Rating.  I have received comments from pilots who have mentioned that flight training needs to be taken seriously and should not be thought of as a "game" - I wholeheartedly disagree with most of that mindset.  I personally got into aviation because of the freedom, excitement and fun it embodies.  This is a wonderful and interactive method of learning about aviation concepts, terms and test questions that will be asked on the Private Pilot Written Exam.  Student Pilots should utilize their ongoing knowledge and study of aviation through verbal instruction from a CFI, books, CDROM and other training materials  at their disposal to become a solid player of the ASCEND board game.  

Please take a moment to clear your mind.  Focus on the one dream that gave you purpose. Remember back to a time when all you needed was someone's faith to enable your resolve and push you to do great things.

If you are able to focus on the freedom and beauty this picture conveys, then you understand the roll you pay in helping me attain my goal. 

 
Thank you,


Jared Bryant

Founder - ASCEND Pilot Products LLC

                     Hello there!

You will not see ultra polished vids or production value designed to dazzle or convince you to invest in shiny stuff.  If I had money for that kind of production value, I would't need your help.  This is me putting together an accurate representation of where I am at regarding a wonderful product I created in Flight School.  I have seen this training method function flawlessly to train student pilots, both foreign and domestic.  If you have a questions, ask away.  If you see things that could be better, trust me, you will have a chance to become an active participant in the ongoing development of this game after the initial release.  

Full Disclosure - 

I do not employ any of the following:

  • Computer Magician
  • Master Videographer
  • IT Genius 

What I do employ is a vast amount of pre and post print media production and team management experience along with...

  • A veteran sales team waiting to put this product in all 50 states
  • Senior Account Specialist - waiting to "jump ship" and keep the numbers in line
  • Aviation experts and seasoned pilots awaiting a chance to join the ASCEND team 

YOUR HELP IS PARAMOUNT TO THE SUCCESS OF THIS CAMPAIGN!  I have spent no small amount of personal treasure and time developing this study platform.  The launch of this product depends not only on your interest, but your input.  Pledging to this campaign will mean more than helping get this awesome study method on a shelf, it will make you a part of the ASCEND development team.  By purchasing an advance copy of the ASCEND Private Pilot board game, you will become a part of aviation training history along with having a voice for future changes to the game and other products in the ASCEND pipeline.  COME JOIN ME!!


AVIATION ENTHUSIASTS - Want a fun way to learn about aviation?  Grab a like minded friend...it only takes two to play!
NEW AVIATION STUDENTS - Planning on heading to Flight School this fall?  Be the first in your class to break out this game and you'll make some easy friends! 
CERTIFIED FLIGHT INSTRUCTOR's - Learning about aviation doesn't need to put your students to sleep - bring this game to "study Hall" and watch your students teach one another while having fun!
SEASONED PILOTS - Place this game on the community table in your FBO or Pilot Lounge and challenge your colleagues to a refresher course while you wait for your next flight!

              I'm 90% THERE!  

The object of the ASCEND Private Pilotboard game is to become the owner of an airport.  This is accomplished by correctly answering FAA test questions for the Private Pilot rating. Players gain or lose money by answering questions.  There are over 900 question cards divided between 19 aviation specific categories.  Answer them all correctly and pass your FAA written test with flying colors!

OVER 900 QUESTIONS BETWEEN 19 AVIATION CATEGORIES

  1. DEPARTURE - 15 cards
  2. AERODYNAMICS - 44 cards
  3. AIRCRAFT INSTRUMENTS - 54 cards
  4. AERONAUTICAL DECISION MAKING (ADM) - 34 cards
  5. AVIATION GLOSSARY - 50 cards
  6. ENGiNES AND SYSTEMS - 36
  7. WEIGHT & BALANCE - 38 cards
  8. PERFORMANCE - 43 cards
  9. AIRPORTS - 60 cards
  10. AIR TRAFFIC CONTROL (ATC) - 40 cards
  11. AIRSPACE - 34 cards
  12. AVIATION WEATHER - 56 cards
  13. AVIATION ACRONYMS - 50 cards
  14. FLIGHT WATCH - 34 cards
  15. NAVIGATION SYSTEMS - 66 cards
  16. CHARTS AND PUBLICATIONS - 36 cards
  17. CROSS-COUNTRY - 62 cards
  18. FEDERAL AVIATION REGULATIONS (FAR's) - 171 cards
  19. APPROACH - 15 cards
  • 20"X20" Game surface with spinner 
  • 900+ FAA Certified AVIATION Questions for the Private Pilot written test
  • 19 Laminated question category separator cards
  • 130 BONUS AVIATION Questions 
  • 80 Tarmac cards (IFE, HOBBS, BUSH PILOT, ALIEN) 20 each
  • 12 Pewter/silver aircraft tokens  (4 single engine, 4 twin engine, 4 jet)
  • 4 different color Aircraft pedestals
  • Money (8 denominations) 
  • Game Manual 
  • 4 game pencils   
  • 30-second sand timer 
  • Game Tracking "Kneeboard"  
  • Over 40 laminated VISUAL AID Placards depicting over 70 question illustrations
NOT SHOWN: Packaging, vacuum formed box insert, Visual Aid Placards, DC-3

Here's the skinny - 

     



GREAT FOR FOREIGN PILOTS! 

Most of what you will learn about aviation (book-wise), is gleaned from studying the Private Pilot rating.  The Private Pilot License requirements are the foundation your future aviation endeavors will be built upon.  At a price-point of $199 (USD) the ASCEND Private Pilot board game is far less expensive than many CD-Rom and DVD training platforms, while requiring  something current training methods do not  - i.e. direct verbal interaction between pilots...which leads to one of the reasons for creating this method of study - 
  • English is the international language of aviation. 
  • The one thing specific to aviation around the world is the ability to read, write and speak English.  This fact has made the United States the #1 training environment for pilots world-wide.  
  • When international flights go into and out of countries around the world, English is the language used to bridge communication, which makes speaking English extremely important for foreign pilots. 
  • This study platform is an excellent way of training pilots, as it forces verbal interaction to ask and answer the questions in English.

                    It's all about pilot interaction!!

United States issued Commercial Licenses to over 4,820 foreign Pilots in 20l2, and over 10,000 thousand received their Private and Instrument ratings from within the United States.  Many more international licenses are predicted in the next 10 years due to the retiring Global workforce of Aviators. 

  • As a student pilot back in 2007, I witnessed several foreign student pilots lose their Student Visas and be quietly ushered out of the country after the Flight School cashed their check because they could not speak English fluently. 

ASCEND is based on the value of interactive study.  I believe you gain and retain more from studying aviation with a partner than studying alone. While on my journey to the sky, I spent (and wasted) money on training DVD's and CD-ROM training programs that challenged my patience.  I created this game because of an undeniable truth: if you make learning fun, your brain is more receptive to the information.  Utilizing the ASCEND game to interact and train with other pilots creates an atmosphere of inspiration.  Foreign Pilots gain a great advantage using the ASCEND Method.  Communication in English is a necessity throughout the entire game.  Domestic (United States Pilots) gain a huge benefit by interacting with international pilots as well.  When you are circling in a pattern with 16 pilots from various countries, you will have a better understanding of what is being communicated.  Lets face it, buzzing around a training airport with pilots you don't understand, is dangerous.

It is my intent to leave no question unanswered.  Please become an active participant in this campaign by scrutinizing it and asking questions.  After 7 years since inception, there are very few questions I cannot answer quickly.


     The game produces safer pilots. 

  • AVIATION IS ALL ABOUT RULES - If you find this game has too many rules to follow...please save the life of yourself and the people who may fly with you by choosing another hobby or career path...seriously.

PLEASE READ ON...

               

                QUESTION CARDS

Question Cards are the bread and butter of the game.  Different color cards have different monetary value.  The question cards come in a 9"L X 3"W X 4"T box - When a pilot lands on a category, the question card is pulled from the box and read to the pilot.  The card is then returned to the back of the card stack.  The number of cards per category will differ -  i.e. there are more questions pertaining to                                                      AERODYNAMICS than there are for AIRSPACE.

QUESTION CARDS WILL BE UPDATED ALONG WITH THE FAA QUESTIONS THAT ARE ADDED AND SUBTRACTED EVERY YEAR  

FAA questions will be reviewed every 6 months.  Updated question cards will be available to order through the ASCEND Web-site for 1 year from the date of your game purchase.  After the first year you will be able to order updated cards for a nominal fee along with shipping.   If you wish to pass your game onto another student pilot, they can goto the ASCEND web-site and save some money by purchasing new sets of cards or upgrades to the planes or board surface.  It all depends on the success of this campaign!                

                                         

  1. DEPARTURE - 15 cards
  2. AERODYNAMICS - 44 cards
  3. AIRCRAFT INSTRUMENTS - 54 cards
  4. AERONAUTICAL DECISION MAKING (ADM) - 34 cards
  5. AVIATION GLOSSARY - 50 cards
  6. ENGiNES AND SYSTEMS - 36
  7. WEIGHT & BALANCE - 38 cards
  8. PERFORMANCE - 43 cards
  9. AIRPORTS - 60 cards
  10. AIR TRAFFIC CONTROL (ATC) - 40 cards
  11. AIRSPACE - 34 cards
  12. AVIATION WEATHER - 56 cards
  13. AVIATION ACRONYMS - 50 cards
  14. FLIGHT WATCH - 34 cards
  15. NAVIGATION SYSTEMS - 66 cards
  16. CHARTS AND PUBLICATIONS - 36 cards
  17. CROSS-COUNTRY - 62 cards
  18. FEDERAL AVIATION REGULATIONS (FAR's) - 171 cards
  19. APPROACH - 15 cards


                   THE SPINNER   

You will notice an inner and outer circle.  The inner ring (white numbered circle) represents how many spaces a pilot travels around the board after spinning.  This is the primary use of the spinner...so forget about the outer ring until you are called upon to calculate reward or penalty for certain spaces around the game surface.
The outer multi-colored ring is also used to calculate penalty or reward for many different questions - a pilot calculates their penalty or reward by spinning 2 times - the first spin is a number, and the second spin is the value.  The pilot multiplies these to either collect money or give money based on the scenario.  

     


                   

                    THE MONEY  

The color of money coincides with the outer ring of the spinner.  

Players track their progress by collecting money for correct answers and giving money for incorrect answers.  The money you receive or give for questions during the game increases with value as you travel around the board.  This is for three reasons: 

  1. Question categories around the board increase in complexity  i.e. answering a question that requires calculation (weight and balance is a good example) are harder to figure than answering a simple question about the four forces that act on an airplane during straight and level flight - (Aerodynamics)
  2. Most aviation training begins with the relatively simple topic of "Aerodynamics" and introduces more complex topics as you move through your syllabus (Cross Country Flight Planning) - You can't start training a student pilot by telling them to put together a flight plan prior to understanding why the airplane stays in the air.  For this reason, the categories are valued by the general order in which most pilots will be trained - 
  3. I wanted to design money with different planes on it to represent higher monetary value because it was just cool.


         AIRPORTS AND TAIL NUMBERS  

Your AIRPORT and the TAIL NUMBERS are spun for at the beginning of the game along with being the point of the game.

The airport you sit in front of is promised to you, but you cannot charge other pilots for flying through your airspace until you gain enough money and flight time to  purchase it. The tail numbers on your airport will be utilized by you throughout the game at every trip around the board. Communication is one of the biggest reasons for creating this game, so you will verbally utilize your N-numbers when asked questions on approach and departure along with certain other category questions.  

                                      

             


 IN-FIELD CARDS

The cards are placed on the inside of the board (thus the name) - like the "Chance" and "Community Chest" on a Monopoly board.  They are the only cards in the game that are not questions asked in the FAA written test.  The ALIEN and BUSH PILOT cards contain funny happenstance scenarios that pilots have no control over.  The HOBBS cards were created to track progress through the game and the IFE (In-Flight-Emergency) cards were created for sheer torture.  


                                             


          This is the back of the box showing contents of the game


The ASCEND Game Tokens are a HUGE part of gameplay. Not only will you be asked to recite V-speeds and other information regarding the aircraft you are flying around the board (each set of planes comes with V-speeds info to memorize) you will be able to advance from Single Engine to Twin Engine and eventually Jet.  Every time you advance (earn) your next rating, you gain the ability to fly faster around the board while on a  mission to buy an airport before other pilots and charge them for entering your "airspace" - 

ASCEND WILL OFFER DIFFERENT AIRPLANE TOKENS FOR PURCHASE  THROUGH THE WEBSITE  

The original game was going to include 12 different aircraft, but due to the constraints of time and money, we opted to have 3 different types of aircraft and use the color of the airplanes and airplane pedestals to differentiate between pilots.

When the ball gets rolling and we turn a profit, the web-site will offer many customized items to enhance the game experience.  If you look closely at the back of the box (further down in the campaign) you will see the original designs.  We wanted these, but I would have had to sell a kidney to make it happen, and that was unacceptable...but just barely.

         4 Mooney (single engine) 4 DC-3 (Multi-Engine) and 4 Blackbirds (Jet)

                                      

The single engine ASCEND Game token, a representation of the Mooney M20, has 2" wingspan, 1.5" fusalage.  All Game airplane tokens are made from a 95% Pewter/5% Silver mixture, and differ in weight between 8 grams (Mooney),  14 grams (DC-3), and 20 grams (Blackbird).  the planes are manufactured with a  1/4" diameter and 1/16" thick neodymium magnet that is cemented into a fitted recess in the fuselage. 

          

           

This is a short video of the prototype pedestal and airplane

      


          AIRCRAFT PEDESTALS 

These are a few of the aircraft pedestals - each game contains 4 different colors.  Every airplane pedestal is hand poured by yours truly.  Believe me when I say no two pedestals are the same.  They are magnetized and the planes contain a very strong neodymium magnet.  It makes for a work of gaming art.

                                  

                         

          When I say no two pedestals are the same, I'm not kidding.

      


The Future Of The ASCEND Private Pilot board game is going to ROCK SOME SOCKS OFF!!

GAME SURFACE AND QUESTION CARDS WILL BE CUSTOMIZED TO REFLECT DIFFERENT TRAINING  ENVIRONMENTS

Due to my own personal training experience and the huge number of training pilots around Daytona Beach, Florida, the first pressing of the game (500 copies) will all be the same (tailored to KDAB) but future games will be available for customization.  The N-numbers can be customized to reflect actual planes that you trained in, (or an inside joke or your initials and birthdate etc) - likewise, many of the questions pertaining to Departure and Approach frequencies can be tailored through the web-site to reflect your actual flight training scenario.


 The success of this campaign is the realization of a dream that has been ongoing since 2007.  I am grateful for your contribution.  Many of the rewards offered for your help are already produced, packaged and ready for shipment.  Your contribution is being used directly to finish the manufacturing and assembly of the ASCEND Game.  Please spread the word and help me get this product on a shelf.  Please let me know what you would like to see as a reward and I'll try my best to make it happen.  NOTE:  EVERY REWARD WILL CONTAIN AN EASYPLOTTER AS WELL AS WHAT IS LISTED.


$5  PLAN YOUR FLIGHT  $5

Your very own one-of-a-kind EasyPLotter!  Used it for quick navigation calculations and keep it in your kneeboard or glove box.  The Ascend EasyPlotter is easier to handle in the cockpit than full-size plotters, and its design helps a pilot to picture the process of diverting to another airport while en route. The four sides of the plotter are Nautical Mile rulers – 30NM per side, and every hash-mark measurement on the inside is a Nautical Mile. The large outer circle is the 20NM diameter of Class C Airspace.  This is a handy little bugger!  Can be used as a Ninja throwing star in a hostile situation.




$10  KDAB SPECIAL  $10

These beverage coasters are the same 4 designs as the $15 variety, but are about 1/3 as resilient and durable.  They will do the trick to protect your oak table from a sweating glass of ice-cold Mountain Dew!  I added this PERK for friends who are not pilots so they can contribute and receive a gift for their contribution that they can use:)



$10  FLIGHT PLAN +1  $10

These are great for the keychain.  You will receive the EasyPlotter along with the ASCEND travel USB - The USB holds 128 megs, so it holds just enough info to store flight planning info (phone book info and travel reminders along with destination airport info) but not enough to get you into trouble if you lose it.


$10  FLIGHT PLAN +1  $10

Due to allot of my friends and family not being pilots or into aviation, I am creating another $10 PERK to include a ASCEND Travel USB and a set of ACE beverage coasters instead of the Plotter.  I figured the coasters would be more useful to friends who don't need a Plotter in their life...but hey, everyone can use beverage coasters!



$15  OUT OF THE HANGAR!  $15

You have taken your first steps into the wonderful world of ASCEND! Whether you are a pilot, aviation enthusiast, or just need to be inspired vicariously through positive Juju...we are here for you. Live long and prosper, and thank you for your support. You will receive a set of four ACE Beverage Coasters and the ASCEND EasyPlotter

4 Different Designs on the back include...

Popular V-Speeds

Airspace VFR Minimums 

Weather Report Reference Guide

(KDAB) Airport Diagram and Frequencies  


 

 

$25  THE RUNUP!  $25

If you love airplanes and appreciate the hard work of several inspired people...you will love a pewter/silver Mooney MC20 game token on a pedestal along with a heartfelt batch of appreciation and the ASCEND EasyPlotter.   If you get caught flying the plane around while making airplane engine noises...you're on your own.   The airplane also doubles as refrigerator magnet when not being used in the game.
                

As an added bonus, I store all the airplane tokens in old coffee containers...so your plane will smell like Juan Valdez and subsequently make you crave a scone.


$30  THE "GO AROUND"   $30

The SR71 is pretty cool, but some of you have requested the ascend product package instead (and you still get a cool airplane token to stick on your refrigerator;)  You will receive the ASCEND EasyPlotter, a set of ACE Beverage Coasters and the Mooney Pewter/Silver aircraft token with custom Pedestal.  I have all these products in stock, so this will be one of the first PERKS mailed out.



  

$35  TAXI TO ACTIVE   $35

You will receive the magnetic SR-71 Blackbird Game Token with base and set of ACE beverage coasters and the EASYPLOTTER - The SR71 comes in silver or flat black. 
  


  

     $55  TAXI TO ACTIVE   $55

Receive a high quality one-of-a-kind Sportech embroidered short sleeve golf shirt.  Front and back embroidery and multiple colors and sizes to choose from.  These are great to wear in the cockpit as well! - you will also receive a set of ASCEND ACE beverage coasters along with the EASYPLOTTER and a Mooney airplane game token with pedestal.  These shirts retail for $45.00 - you will not be disappointed...and you can say you have been a part of this company since it's humble beginning.  PLEASE EMAIL ME FOR SIZE AND COLOR AVAILABILITY PRIOR TO PICKING THIS PERK.

                                        


   


               


              Colors include Black, Grey, Burgundy, Light Blue, White and Hot Pink

            

                                  


 

$100 BALLS TO THE WALL! $100

You will receive a Full set of question/flash cards with separator cards from the ASCEND Private Pilot game (over 900 in all, color coded and category specific). These are the coolest flashcards ever created for aviation training.  Complete with reference/question numbers that coincide with question explanations and more!    If playing a game to learn about aviation doesn't float your seaplane or you are training alone, using these flashcards will help you prepare for your FAA written test for Private Pilot.  Great to use with a friend as well during that morning cup of pre-flight coffee.  You will also receive the EasyPlotter...which comes in handy if you need to scrape frost from the windshield of your 172 in the early morning hours.  It fits nicely in your kneeboard.


  

$150  FLYIN' HIGH AGAIN!   $150

$50 discount from MSRP!  For your contribution of $150 you will receive a signed copy of the first full pressing of the ASCEND Private Pilot game along with a set of ASCEND ACE beverage coasters and an ASCEND EASY-Plotter.  Your name will be immortalized on the inside top of the game box (280 spaces available) along with lifelong recognition on the ASCEND web-site.

           

 $200  MONEY FOR FOOD  $200

LightSpeed Headset with EQ and noise dampening - It's all or nothing time folks! I have spent my last dime on getting this game produced, and its success will help me upgrade my headset. Until that time, I am selling all my flight gear at a very large discount. This headset was over $800 new in 2007 - it has been fully refurbished by LightSpeed Aviation with new cable, connections and ear pads - I love this headset, and LightSpeed headsets are known for being comfortable. I can testify.  You will also receive the single engine Mooney aircraft token with pedestal, the ASCEND EasyPlotter and a set of ACE beverage coasters.

           

             

           THE THANK YOU LIST

To these people I owe a debt of overwhelming gratitude for their monetary, spiritual and mental support and friendship through the past 7 years since my life-changing quest to fly an airplane - There are many more to add, and the list will grow through this campaign as certain pictures and memories in this campaign will trigger a grateful addition. 

               Here are the ASCEND 

    "Powerhouse Players of Positivity"  

(in order of appearance)

  • Lynda Navarre
  • David Cushman
  • John Eberhardt
  • Dave Grant
  • Stahl Dahl (Stoli)
  • Jackie Gravel
  • Jonathan Challacombe (JC)
  • Andrea Spearman
  • Grant Aviation
  • Homer Air
  • Michael Smith
  • Carolyn Flaherty
  • Brooks Baker
  • Ricky Sueltenfuss
  • Deb Moseley
  • Peggy Swisher
  • Eric Schmidt
  • Rocky the Training Gorilla

With the success of this campaign, I will be able to realize a dream that has been ongoing since 2007. I look forward to completing board games for Instrument Pilot, Commercial Pilot, Air Transport Pilot, and ASCEND for Kids game/training platforms.

The challenges are many, but not overwhelming. If you have made it this far into my campaign presentation, I am grateful. I have buffered my rewards timelines by a few months to allow for snags, and ensure on-time delivery.  The game will require 4 solid months for production and assembly.  I have scheduled 7.  If everything goes semi-smooth with not too many major snags, the game should be available in June.  If Mr. Murphy plays a large roll, the game will ship in August.  I am hoping for normal production scenarios, but am fully prepared to wake and make my way through a Lord-of-the-Rings-sized spider-web made from 1/8" aircraft cable.

Best,

Jared Bryant - Founder - APP
story_txt:
ASCEND Pilot Products LLC is an Aviation Training Company.  We are focused on developing exciting and innovative methods of studying aviation.   
NOTE TO CFI's - THIS IS A COMPREHENSIVE STUDY METHOD FOR AVIATION, DISGUISED AS A "GAME" - This is a serious aviation training platform demanding  pilot interaction with other pilots to verbally answer actual FAA questions that are given for the Private Pilot Rating.  I have received comments from pilots who have mentioned that flight training needs to be taken seriously and should not be thought of as a "game" - I wholeheartedly disagree with most of that mindset.  I personally got into aviation because of the freedom, excitement and fun it embodies.  This is a wonderful and interactive method of learning about aviation concepts, terms and test questions that will be asked on the Private Pilot Written Exam.  Student Pilots should utilize their ongoing knowledge and study of aviation through verbal instruction from a CFI, books, CDROM and other training materials  at their disposal to become a solid player of the ASCEND board game.  


Please take a moment to clear your mind.  Focus on the one dream that gave you purpose. Remember back to a time when all you needed was someone's faith to enable your resolve and push you to do great things.

If you are able to focus on the freedom and beauty this picture conveys, then you understand the roll you pay in helping me attain my goal. 


 Thank you,


Jared Bryant

Founder - ASCEND Pilot Products LLC

                     Hello there!

You will not see ultra polished vids or production value designed to dazzle or convince you to invest in shiny stuff.  If I had money for that kind of production value, I would't need your help.  This is me putting together an accurate representation of where I am at regarding a wonderful product I created in Flight School.  I have seen this training method function flawlessly to train student pilots, both foreign and domestic.  If you have a questions, ask away.  If you see things that could be better, trust me, you will have a chance to become an active participant in the ongoing development of this game after the initial release.  

Full Disclosure - 
I do not employ any of the following:


Computer Magician
Master Videographer
IT Genius 

What I do employ is a vast amount of pre and post print media production and team management experience along with...


A veteran sales team waiting to put this product in all 50 states
Senior Account Specialist - waiting to "jump ship" and keep the numbers in line
Aviation experts and seasoned pilots awaiting a chance to join the ASCEND team 


YOUR HELP IS PARAMOUNT TO THE SUCCESS OF THIS CAMPAIGN!  I have spent no small amount of personal treasure and time developing this study platform.  The launch of this product depends not only on your interest, but your input.  Pledging to this campaign will mean more than helping get this awesome study method on a shelf, it will make you a part of the ASCEND development team.  By purchasing an advance copy of the ASCEND Private Pilot board game, you will become a part of aviation training history along with having a voice for future changes to the game and other products in the ASCEND pipeline.  COME JOIN ME!!


AVIATION ENTHUSIASTS - Want a fun way to learn about aviation?  Grab a like minded friend...it only takes two to play!

NEW AVIATION STUDENTS - Planning on heading to Flight School this fall?  Be the first in your class to break out this game and you'll make some easy friends! 


CERTIFIED FLIGHT INSTRUCTOR's - Learning about aviation doesn't need to put your students to sleep - bring this game to "study Hall" and watch your students teach one another while having fun!

SEASONED PILOTS - Place this game on the community table in your FBO or Pilot Lounge and challenge your colleagues to a refresher course while you wait for your next flight!
              I'm 90% THERE!  



The object of the ASCEND Private Pilotboard game is to become the owner of an airport.  This is accomplished by correctly answering FAA test questions for the Private Pilot rating. Players gain or lose money by answering questions.  There are over 900 question cards divided between 19 aviation specific categories.  Answer them all correctly and pass your FAA written test with flying colors!



OVER 900 QUESTIONS BETWEEN 19 AVIATION CATEGORIES


DEPARTURE - 15 cards
AERODYNAMICS - 44 cards
AIRCRAFT INSTRUMENTS - 54 cards
AERONAUTICAL DECISION MAKING (ADM) - 34 cards
AVIATION GLOSSARY - 50 cards
ENGiNES AND SYSTEMS - 36
WEIGHT & BALANCE - 38 cards
PERFORMANCE - 43 cards
AIRPORTS - 60 cards
AIR TRAFFIC CONTROL (ATC) - 40 cards
AIRSPACE - 34 cards
AVIATION WEATHER - 56 cards
AVIATION ACRONYMS - 50 cards
FLIGHT WATCH - 34 cards
NAVIGATION SYSTEMS - 66 cards
CHARTS AND PUBLICATIONS - 36 cards
CROSS-COUNTRY - 62 cards
FEDERAL AVIATION REGULATIONS (FAR's) - 171 cards
APPROACH - 15 cards


20"X20" Game surface with spinner 
900+ FAA Certified AVIATION Questions for the Private Pilot written test
19 Laminated question category separator cards
130 BONUS AVIATION Questions 

80 Tarmac cards (IFE, HOBBS, BUSH PILOT, ALIEN) 20 each


12 Pewter/silver aircraft tokens  (4 single engine, 4 twin engine, 4 jet)

4 different color Aircraft pedestals

Money (8 denominations) 

Game Manual 
4 game pencils   
30-second sand timer 
Game Tracking "Kneeboard"  
Over 40 laminated VISUAL AID Placards depicting over 70 question illustrations


NOT SHOWN: Packaging, vacuum formed box insert, Visual Aid Placards, DC-3

Here's the skinny - 
     










GREAT FOR FOREIGN PILOTS! 


Most of what you will learn about aviation (book-wise), is gleaned from studying the Private Pilot rating.  The Private Pilot License requirements are the foundation your future aviation endeavors will be built upon.  At a price-point of $199 (USD) the ASCEND Private Pilot board game is far less expensive than many CD-Rom and DVD training platforms, while requiring  something current training methods do not  - i.e. direct verbal interaction between pilots...which leads to one of the reasons for creating this method of study - 
English is the international language of aviation. 

The one thing specific to aviation around the world is the ability to read, write and speak English.  This fact has made the United States the #1 training environment for pilots world-wide.  

When international flights go into and out of countries around the world, English is the language used to bridge communication, which makes speaking English extremely important for foreign pilots. 
This study platform is an excellent way of training pilots, as it forces verbal interaction to ask and answer the questions in English.

                    It's all about pilot interaction!!
United States issued Commercial Licenses to over 4,820 foreign Pilots in 20l2, and over 10,000 thousand received their Private and Instrument ratings from within the United States.  Many more international licenses are predicted in the next 10 years due to the retiring Global workforce of Aviators. 


As a student pilot back in 2007, I witnessed several foreign student pilots lose their Student Visas and be quietly ushered out of the country after the Flight School cashed their check because they could not speak English fluently. 

ASCEND is based on the value of interactive study.  I believe you gain and retain more from studying aviation with a partner than studying alone. While on my journey to the sky, I spent (and wasted) money on training DVD's and CD-ROM training programs that challenged my patience.  I created this game because of an undeniable truth: if you make learning fun, your brain is more receptive to the information.  Utilizing the ASCEND game to interact and train with other pilots creates an atmosphere of inspiration.  Foreign Pilots gain a great advantage using the ASCEND Method.  Communication in English is a necessity throughout the entire game.  Domestic (United States Pilots) gain a huge benefit by interacting with international pilots as well.  When you are circling in a pattern with 16 pilots from various countries, you will have a better understanding of what is being communicated.  Lets face it, buzzing around a training airport with pilots you don't understand, is dangerous.


It is my intent to leave no question unanswered.  Please become an active participant in this campaign by scrutinizing it and asking questions.  After 7 years since inception, there are very few questions I cannot answer quickly.



     The game produces safer pilots. 




AVIATION IS ALL ABOUT RULES - If you find this game has too many rules to follow...please save the life of yourself and the people who may fly with you by choosing another hobby or career path...seriously.



PLEASE READ ON...




               
                QUESTION CARDS

Question Cards are the bread and butter of the game.  Different color cards have different monetary value.  The question cards come in a 9"L X 3"W X 4"T box - When a pilot lands on a category, the question card is pulled from the box and read to the pilot.  The card is then returned to the back of the card stack.  The number of cards per category will differ -  i.e. there are more questions pertaining to                                                      AERODYNAMICS than there are for AIRSPACE.

QUESTION CARDS WILL BE UPDATED ALONG WITH THE FAA QUESTIONS THAT ARE ADDED AND SUBTRACTED EVERY YEAR  
FAA questions will be reviewed every 6 months.  Updated question cards will be available to order through the ASCEND Web-site for 1 year from the date of your game purchase.  After the first year you will be able to order updated cards for a nominal fee along with shipping.   If you wish to pass your game onto another student pilot, they can goto the ASCEND web-site and save some money by purchasing new sets of cards or upgrades to the planes or board surface.  It all depends on the success of this campaign!
