When the ball gets rolling and we turn a profit, the web-site will offer many customized items to enhance the game experience.  If you look closely at the back of the box (further down in the campaign) you will see the original designs.  We wanted these, but I would have had to sell a kidney to make it happen, and that was unacceptable...but just barely.
         4 Mooney (single engine) 4 DC-3 (Multi-Engine) and 4 Blackbirds (Jet)




                                      
The single engine ASCEND Game token, a representation of the Mooney M20, has 2" wingspan, 1.5" fusalage.  All Game airplane tokens are made from a 95% Pewter/5% Silver mixture, and differ in weight between 8 grams (Mooney),  14 grams (DC-3), and 20 grams (Blackbird).  the planes are manufactured with a  1/4" diameter and 1/16" thick neodymium magnet that is cemented into a fitted recess in the fuselage.           



           
This is a short video of the prototype pedestal and airplane
      

          AIRCRAFT PEDESTALS 
These are a few of the aircraft pedestals - each game contains 4 different colors.  Every airplane pedestal is hand poured by yours truly.  Believe me when I say no two pedestals are the same.  They are magnetized and the planes contain a very strong neodymium magnet.  It makes for a work of gaming art.
                                  
                         
          When I say no two pedestals are the same, I'm not kidding.


      

The Future Of The ASCEND Private Pilot board game is going to ROCK SOME SOCKS OFF!!

GAME SURFACE AND QUESTION CARDS WILL BE CUSTOMIZED TO REFLECT DIFFERENT TRAINING  ENVIRONMENTS
Due to my own personal training experience and the huge number of training pilots around Daytona Beach, Florida, the first pressing of the game (500 copies) will all be the same (tailored to KDAB) but future games will be available for customization.  The N-numbers can be customized to reflect actual planes that you trained in, (or an inside joke or your initials and birthdate etc) - likewise, many of the questions pertaining to Departure and Approach frequencies can be tailored through the web-site to reflect your actual flight training scenario.


 The success of this campaign is the realization of a dream that has been ongoing since 2007.  I am grateful for your contribution.  Many of the rewards offered for your help are already produced, packaged and ready for shipment.  Your contribution is being used directly to finish the manufacturing and assembly of the ASCEND Game.  Please spread the word and help me get this product on a shelf.  Please let me know what you would like to see as a reward and I'll try my best to make it happen.  NOTE:  EVERY REWARD WILL CONTAIN AN EASYPLOTTER AS WELL AS WHAT IS LISTED.






$5  PLAN YOUR FLIGHT  $5
Your very own one-of-a-kind EasyPLotter!  Used it for quick navigation calculations and keep it in your kneeboard or glove box.  The Ascend EasyPlotter is easier to handle in the cockpit than full-size plotters, and its design helps a pilot to picture the process of diverting to another airport while en route. The four sides of the plotter are Nautical Mile rulers – 30NM per side, and every hash-mark measurement on the inside is a Nautical Mile. The large outer circle is the 20NM diameter of Class C Airspace.  This is a handy little bugger!  Can be used as a Ninja throwing star in a hostile situation.














$10  KDAB SPECIAL  $10These beverage coasters are the same 4 designs as the $15 variety, but are about 1/3 as resilient and durable.  They will do the trick to protect your oak table from a sweating glass of ice-cold Mountain Dew!  I added this PERK for friends who are not pilots so they can contribute and receive a gift for their contribution that they can use:)








$10  FLIGHT PLAN +1  $10
These are great for the keychain.  You will receive the EasyPlotter along with the ASCEND travel USB - The USB holds 128 megs, so it holds just enough info to store flight planning info (phone book info and travel reminders along with destination airport info) but not enough to get you into trouble if you lose it.









$10  FLIGHT PLAN +1  $10
Due to allot of my friends and family not being pilots or into aviation, I am creating another $10 PERK to include a ASCEND Travel USB and a set of ACE beverage coasters instead of the Plotter.  I figured the coasters would be more useful to friends who don't need a Plotter in their life...but hey, everyone can use beverage coasters!






$15  OUT OF THE HANGAR!  $15
You have taken your first steps into the wonderful world of ASCEND! Whether you are a pilot, aviation enthusiast, or just need to be inspired vicariously through positive Juju...we are here for you. Live long and prosper, and thank you for your support. You will receive a set of four ACE Beverage Coasters and the ASCEND EasyPlotter

4 Different Designs on the back include...
Popular V-Speeds
Airspace VFR Minimums 
Weather Report Reference Guide
(KDAB) Airport Diagram and Frequencies  



 
 
$25  THE RUNUP!  $25
If you love airplanes and appreciate the hard work of several inspired people...you will love a pewter/silver Mooney MC20 game token on a pedestal along with a heartfelt batch of appreciation and the ASCEND EasyPlotter.   If you get caught flying the plane around while making airplane engine noises...you're on your own.   The airplane also doubles as refrigerator magnet when not being used in the game.
                



As an added bonus, I store all the airplane tokens in old coffee containers...so your plane will smell like Juan Valdez and subsequently make you crave a scone.






$30  THE "GO AROUND"   $30
The SR71 is pretty cool, but some of you have requested the ascend product package instead (and you still get a cool airplane token to stick on your refrigerator;)  You will receive the ASCEND EasyPlotter, a set of ACE Beverage Coasters and the Mooney Pewter/Silver aircraft token with custom Pedestal.  I have all these products in stock, so this will be one of the first PERKS mailed out.




  

$35  TAXI TO ACTIVE   $35
You will receive the magnetic SR-71 Blackbird Game Token with base and set of ACE beverage coasters and the EASYPLOTTER - The SR71 comes in silver or flat black. 


  







  
     $55  TAXI TO ACTIVE   $55
Receive a high quality one-of-a-kind Sportech embroidered short sleeve golf shirt.  Front and back embroidery and multiple colors and sizes to choose from.  These are great to wear in the cockpit as well! - you will also receive a set of ASCEND ACE beverage coasters along with the EASYPLOTTER and a Mooney airplane game token with pedestal.  These shirts retail for $45.00 - you will not be disappointed...and you can say you have been a part of this company since it's humble beginning.  PLEASE EMAIL ME FOR SIZE AND COLOR AVAILABILITY PRIOR TO PICKING THIS PERK.


                                        
   


               
              Colors include Black, Grey, Burgundy, Light Blue, White and Hot Pink

            




                                  

 
$100 BALLS TO THE WALL! $100You will receive a Full set of question/flash cards with separator cards from the ASCEND Private Pilot game (over 900 in all, color coded and category specific). These are the coolest flashcards ever created for aviation training.  Complete with reference/question numbers that coincide with question explanations and more!    If playing a game to learn about aviation doesn't float your seaplane or you are training alone, using these flashcards will help you prepare for your FAA written test for Private Pilot.  Great to use with a friend as well during that morning cup of pre-flight coffee.  You will also receive the EasyPlotter...which comes in handy if you need to scrape frost from the windshield of your 172 in the early morning hours.  It fits nicely in your kneeboard.




  
$150  FLYIN' HIGH AGAIN!   $150

$50 discount from MSRP!  For your contribution of $150 you will receive a signed copy of the first full pressing of the ASCEND Private Pilot game along with a set of ASCEND ACE beverage coasters and an ASCEND EASY-Plotter.  Your name will be immortalized on the inside top of the game box (280 spaces available) along with lifelong recognition on the ASCEND web-site.




           

 $200  MONEY FOR FOOD  $200
LightSpeed Headset with EQ and noise dampening - It's all or nothing time folks! I have spent my last dime on getting this game produced, and its success will help me upgrade my headset. Until that time, I am selling all my flight gear at a very large discount. This headset was over $800 new in 2007 - it has been fully refurbished by LightSpeed Aviation with new cable, connections and ear pads - I love this headset, and LightSpeed headsets are known for being comfortable. I can testify.  You will also receive the single engine Mooney aircraft token with pedestal, the ASCEND EasyPlotter and a set of ACE beverage coasters.




           
             
           THE THANK YOU LIST
To these people I owe a debt of overwhelming gratitude for their monetary, spiritual and mental support and friendship through the past 7 years since my life-changing quest to fly an airplane - There are many more to add, and the list will grow through this campaign as certain pictures and memories in this campaign will trigger a grateful addition. 
               Here are the ASCEND 
    "Powerhouse Players of Positivity"  
(in order of appearance)


Lynda Navarre
David Cushman
John Eberhardt
Dave Grant
Stahl Dahl (Stoli)
Jackie Gravel
Jonathan Challacombe (JC)
Andrea Spearman
Grant Aviation
Homer Air
Michael Smith
Carolyn Flaherty
Brooks Baker
Ricky Sueltenfuss
Deb Moseley
Peggy Swisher

Eric Schmidt

Rocky the Training Gorilla


With the success of this campaign, I will be able to realize a dream that has been ongoing since 2007. I look forward to completing board games for Instrument Pilot, Commercial Pilot, Air Transport Pilot, and ASCEND for Kids game/training platforms.
The challenges are many, but not overwhelming. If you have made it this far into my campaign presentation, I am grateful. I have buffered my rewards timelines by a few months to allow for snags, and ensure on-time delivery.  The game will require 4 solid months for production and assembly.  I have scheduled 7.  If everything goes semi-smooth with not too many major snags, the game should be available in June.  If Mr. Murphy plays a large roll, the game will ship in August.  I am hoping for normal production scenarios, but am fully prepared to wake and make my way through a Lord-of-the-Rings-sized spider-web made from 1/8" aircraft cable.
Best,
Jared Bryant - Founder - APP

story:
HABLAS ESPAÑOL? VE LA CAMPAÑA EN TU IDIOMA





AYÚDAME A CAMBIAR LA EDUCACIÓN EN COLOMBIA MEDIANTE TU DONACIÓN.
A CAMBIO PODRÁ RECIBIR ALGUNA DE LAS MUCHAS RECOMPENSAS QUE OFRECEMOS.

“A NEW WAY TO LEARN”

Android/IOS/Windows/MAC/Linux


 

 

DYNAMIC

“Eco de los gigantes” or as in English “Echo of the giants”, is a third-person educational video game, based on a system of free exploration of an isometric environment and various additional dynamics through mini-games. The game focuses on the math curriculum for first grade. 

The player represents a character named Ecco, a child carried by the waves to the beaches of this island after his boat shipwrecked.

 
Upon reaching the coast, Ecco is saved by a monk who will be responsible to guide him through the story.  
 
The purpose of the character is explore the island, solving challenges and helping its inhabitants to fill their knowledge gaps caused by the dark magician, thus discovering that knowledge is everywhere and especially in oneself, through experience and reflection,
   

to finally remove the blindfold from the magician followers and defeat once for all the evil sorcerer who enslaved their minds. 


KNOW SOME OF THE INHABITANTS


 
The idea behind "Echo of the giants" is to present a fun game, at the level of any other video game with entertainment purposes; whereby children can also receive and live learning experiences that are considered significant due to its content, which represent real situations where concepts of mathematics and abstract thinking are applied, which are the basis for our current thinking system. 
Also, it is purpose of "Echo of the giants" make it easier for teachers and parents the task of teaching and introducing the topics of the mathematics curriculum, because they can propose strategies and exercises around the personal experiences that each child has already lived in the game. 
This first installment of “Echo of the giants” focuses on mathematics for first graders. Therefore, the game is intended to accompany the school year, setting limits according to the progress of the curriculum set by the teacher.


STAGES

The game is divided in three different stages:

FIRST STAGE: EXPLORATION

The game is set in a 3D world where the child can explore it freely. It contains different characters and elements that set out problems to be resolved by the student in order to continue their progress in the story. 
 
 
 

SECOND STAGE: FREE INTERACTION

Each object and character within the game provides different options for interaction in the microworld; they introduce some small games or dynamics, but others pose complete problematic situations. 
 
 
 
 

THIRD STAGE: MINI-GAMES

Each mini-game is posed around the curricular axes for math created by various international institutions. The characters who the child interacts with will propose these. For further learning, no mini-game is allowed to be completed by trial and error, so that the child understands what and why is answering that. Every success and every mistake counts. 
 

 
Currently the prevailing teaching method in the classroom has created in the students apathy, disinterest and lack of motivation towards acquiring new knowledge;
   
This is the specific case of mathematics, where the student has become a passive actor of their learning process, by simply memorizing formulas and operations without knowing their real applications, banishing in this way the young people who fail to have good grades in this area from the paradise of the mathematics, labeling this subject as tedious, boring and useless. 
 
The game is based on a system of free exploration of a virtual environment where the child is master of time and the way they explore it. A world that presents them challenges that simulate the situations that gave rise to the concepts of mathematics. If you want to learn well, you need to understand well, but this requires to reconstruct mentally not only the concept, but also the path that leads from the physical gesture to its concept or object. 
 
“Echo of the giants” proposes a system where all actors of the learning process can find relevant tools towards their point of view, but that revolve around the same experience, the game.
These actors are: teachers, parents and students; In addition to educational institutions, which represent the collective interest of teachers. 
Advantages of using "Echo of the giants": 
  • Allows to decouple learning from the mental limits of a classroom or specific hours, because it can be used both inside and outside school. 
  • Brings the teacher and the concepts closer to the children minds, because with the experiences lived in the video game the teacher can carry out a dialogue in a common field known by both.
  • It presents an alternative to the classic video games, with great fun, entertainment and educational quality. 
  • It can be consolidated as an alternative to the grading system, because not only measures the child's performance at a specific moment with a written test, but its development throughout the school year.

PINVED

As we know, the task of parents and teachers is different from the students, so we created a tool called "Platform for integration of educational video games" or PINVED (for its acronym in Spanish). 
 
PINVED will allow parents and teachers to participate in the knowledge acquired by the children throughout the game, but with the use of control, supervision and guidance tools. 

PINVED is a web platform that can be used from any browser. This platform provides different tools for parents and teachers such as:

  • Being able to access guidelines for parents or teachers that explain the use of the platform and video games (in the future there will be more games on the same line).

  • Control the maximum progress in the game of the students in charge, so they don't surpass the teacher progress in class.

  • Detailed charts of the progress of their children or students, where the overall progress in the history (curriculum) and individual progress by topic (per mini-game) are outlined.

  • Knowing the quantity of successful and failed attempts to play each mini-game, representing the progress, understanding and affinity the player has of the topic represented by it.

  • Knowing the curricular content of each mini-game from the video games which the teacher or parent has an active subscription.

  • Full control over child accounts (for parents), which includes parental control over playing time.

 
 
 
The usage mode of the video game "Echo of the giants" is through subscription. The usage mode of "PINVED" is free, as long as the subscriber has a subscription to one of the video game from the platform.


LET'S GET IN AN ADVENTURE TOGETHER


We want to go in an adventure like Ecco of “Echo of the giants”, the future is unknown but the goal is clear, transform the way we and our kids learn, and we want you to go with us. We believe that with this project we open the door to many of us to create and found a new way to learn, where the knowledge matters in the real world and we get prepare to fight the real enemy, the apathy and the ignorance, instead of training to fill papers and test after test. “Echo of the giants” is going to be the first step of many we want to take with you. The idea is to create environments and stories that teach the children not only the basis of science but the basis of our society and how they are useful through the use of their unique set of skills and the knowledge they can get from the world an others, that's why we are betting to use a character (Ecco) whit whom the child and even us can make a travel to rediscover the path our ancestors made to create the society we live nowadays. 
The project is long and will cover the entire school year through repetitive learning reinforcement dynamics, gradual release of events, global goals and a community around the game. It is a task that requires effort and commitment. We want to position the country as an alternative when developing video games. To do so, we need your support. Although we have already received financial support from the national government (developing important parts of the game and the web platform) we need your help to keep delivering the same high quality that we have presented, until the final phase. 
We have currently developed the first part of the first unit and the basis of “Echo of the giants”, as well as the rudiments of the platform PINVED, as was intended at first with the government contribution, but we want to finish the game. The game is going to be formed by 8 units, which represents the topics:

  • Pre-math concepts (about 9 mini-games)

  • Numbers until 10 (about 20 mini-games)

  • Basic adding and subtracting (about 16 mini-games)

  • Operations with 3 single-digit numbers (about 5 mini-games)

  • Numbers until 100 (about 10 mini-games)

  • Advanced adding and subtracting (about 9 mini-games)

  • Adding and subtracting with 2-digit numbers (about 11 mini-games)

  • Measurement units (about 15 mini-games)

There are about 100 mini-games just for solely curricular purposes, but it is intended to have a lot of more mini-game for fun, objects to collect, comics to read, characters to know, a lot of exciting options!

It is planned to fulfill the following goals with your contributions:

  • Voice acting in both English and Spanish for all the texts and dialogues within the game, to ease the process of reading to children.

  • Music and sound effects.

  • Complete the game programming.

  • Finish the development of the platform PINVED both in English and Spanish.

The contributions received are going to be distributed as follows:


Note that this is a fixed funding campaign, that means “Eco de los gigantes” (Echo of the giants) will only be possible if the goal is reached. When funded, we hope to make the first release of the game 10 months from then.
 
 
“because there's a whole life to play”
see our web page 
Founded in 2015, in the city of Bucaramanga, Colombia; as a product of a persistent idea that materialized as a company. Life2play is a company dedicated to game development and to create complete experiences that embark the viewer in an experience that transcends the screen and the controller, and the mere concept of harmless fun. Created in order to contribute to solving social problems. 
Life2play was conceived in the Universidad Industrial de Santander (UIS), or as in English: Industrial University of Santander.

MISSION


Contribute to the improvement of educational quality by using innovative techniques in technology, computing and communication, to create engagement and fun around the learning process.

VISION

Be a leader in the education field, promoting the appropriation of one's learning processes, and the inclusion of all actors in this formative process, through our products and the creation of our own proposals for education, both nationally and internationally.

Conceived in 2014, we have gone through many processes of selection and evaluation by the government of Colombia to make us worthy of seed capital delivered by the "Fondo emprender", which was given in 2015. The idea was supported by the degree project of our founder, in which he proposed the video game "Echo of the giants" and the recommended learning environment to apply the suggested learning strategy. The project was awarded the best possible grade and was a candidate for the laureate degree project award.

THE FOUNDER

Gonzalo Barrera has been a professional recognized multiple times nationally. He was one of the top 100 high school graduates in the country in 2008 and one of the top 100 undergraduate graduates of the country in 2014, obtaining the recognition "SUMMA CUM LAUDE" as the best systems engineer of 2014 from the Universidad Industrial de Santander (UIS) due to his academic performance.

THE CORE STAFF

Our team was chosen after a rigorous selection process with the aim of supporting new talent.


In Life2play we care not only to create stunning and immersive experiences, but also to contribute to the solution of social problems; therefore, we committed to support young talent and train professionals... rather people with great professional and personal qualities that contribute to the growth and improvement of the video game industry.


 

Backer

$5: Wallpaper and newsletter subscription

we appreciate your support, and we demonstrate it with a set of stunning wallpapers for your desktop. We also want to keep you updated with the last news of the project, We know you're gonna love it.

Ultra Backer

$15: Backer's + Special item code

Maybe you want to play the game in the future, so, we give you a special item code to redeem within the game; this item will only be avaliable to the early backers. We don't know... it might be a new hair style for Ecco, we don't know...

I want the game!

$30: Ultra Backer's + The game!!

You are eager to have the game in your hands. We give you a full year subscription to the game, and a parents guide about how to use it as a educational tool; plus all the previous rewards.

Curious Teacher

$60: Ultra Backer's + The game!! + activities for children

You not only want the game, you are a curious teacher and want to see if you can use it in your classroom. We give you the game, a high resolution poster (digital) for your classroom, a digital activity book for children, the teacher's guide and the set of digital trading cards.

Game Fan

$60: "I want the game!"'s + Poster + Activity book + Trading cards + Sound track

You not only want the game, you really like it and want to be more in deep with it. We give you the game plus a digital poster, a digital activity book for children, a set of trading cards and the sound track of the game.

Ultra Fan

$90: Game fan's + art book + name in credits!

We really appreciate your commitment, so, we give you all the game fan's rewards plus a digital copy of our art-book and we will put your name in the credits.

Teacher's pack

$120: Curious teacher's + soundtrack + art book + name in credits + thank you video + 5 one year game subscription + PINVED subscription

You have already decided to take a closer look to the game and want to try it in your classroom. We give you 5 one year subscriptions for your students, plus a digital copy of the art book, the sound track, your name in the credits, a custom thank-you video, and the theacher subscription to PINVED.

Mega Fan

$150: Ultra fan's + thank-you video + T-shirt + physical thank-you card

We really appreciate your commitment and you wanna get farther, you don't wanna just feel the experience, but you wanna touch it; we give you a custom thank-you video, a t-shirt of "echo of the giants" and a physical thank you card, plus all the rewards for the ultra fan package.

Fan Teacher

$250: teacher's pack + T-shirt+ Physical thank-you card

All the teacher's pack rewards plus physical rewards: a T-shirt (for adult) and a thank-you card.

Hiper Fan

$250: Mega fan's + Physical Art-book + Notebook for children

All the Mega fan's rewards plus a physical copy of the art-book (hard cover) and a gorgeous notebook for children with stickers (you can pick the model)

Classroom pack

$500: Fan teacher's pack + 15 one year subscription instead of 5 + Physical art-book

All the fan teacher's pack rewards but instead 5 one year subscriptions, you get 15 one year subscriptions for your students, plus a physical copy of the art-book.

Super Parent

$500: Hiper fan's + Physical activity book for children + Ecco plushie + Ecco figurine

Because we know you are a super parent, we give you all the hiper fan pack's rewards plus a physical activity book for your children, a plushie of Ecco and a Figurine of Ecco all for the delight of your children.

Ultra Parent

$750: Super Parent's + Digital Commission

Because we know you are a super parent, but you want to give something artistic and unique to your kids, we offer you a custom digital commission just for you, plus all the super parent's rewards.

Mega Parent

$1,000: Super Parent's + your kid as a NPC

Because we know you are a super parent, but you want your kid to be part of the game, we offer you the opportunity to see your kid as a NPC within the game; you get a 3D full color model of your kid with the style of "Echo of the giants" to fit the game; everybody who plays the game would see your child, in a visible area, and it will identify itself with your kid's name and country; plus all the super parent's rewards.

King Supporter

$2,5000: Super Parent's + design a monster

You want to be part of the design process, we want to let you live the dream with us of watching your ideas becoming true in a video game, design a monster and watch it being a fundamental part of "Echo of the giants" (note that it most fit the game and its audience); plus all the super parent's rewards.

Emperor Supporter

$5,000: Super Parent's + design an antagonist

You want to be part of the design process, we want to let you live the dream with us of watching your ideas becoming true in a video game, but you just don't want to be a little part, but to impact the story, we offer you to design an antagonist to Ecco, a true "Echo of the giants" experience (note that it must fit to the game and its audience); plus all the super parent's rewards.

Heavenly Supporter

$7,500: Super Parent's + design a pet for Ecco

You want to be part of the design process, we want to let you live the dream with us of watching your ideas becoming true in a video game, but you just don't want to be a little part, but to impact the story and to watch your creation everytime you play, we offer you to design a pet for Ecco, a true "Echo of the giants" experience (note that it must fit to the game and its audience); plus all the super parent's rewards.

Supporter Producer

$10,000: Super Parent's + design a mini-game for "Echo of the giants"

You jump straight to your dream, being a video game producer, we are truly grateful with your support, in exchange we want you to design one of our recurrent minigames, there's not higher honor for a video games fan than to be part of the design crew (note that it must fit to the game and its audience); plus all the super parent's rewards AND YOU GET YOUR NAME IN THE CREDITS AS SUPPORTER PRODUCER!



Since the process of conception to the implementation and monitoring of the company, we have had the support of the following entities:



UNIVERSIDAD INDUSTRIAL DE SANTANDER


The Industrial University of Santander is a prestigious public university on the top ten from Colombia. The UIS supports the project through its entrepreneurship unit: during the ideation, creation of the business plan, foundation of the company and project monitoring. It was this unit the one who supported the project in front of the government to gain the seed capital, and it knows the idea since it was just a degree project. 

 

     


THE PRESIDENCY OF THE REPUBLIC OF COLOMBIA AND THE NATIONAL LEARNING SERVICE (SENA)


Through the “Fondo emprender” and FONADE: Seed capital for the foundation of the company and the development of the project "Eco of the giants"; auditing and monitoring the project. We are part of the selected group of ideas that have been backed by the colombian government.

 

Other ways you can help

 

We appreciate just the fact you spent the time to watch our proposal, and it would  help us a lot if you:

 
     
  • Share this with all the people you know or think they can be interested. Remember, sharing is caring.
    •  
  • Write us an email with your point of view about this project, we love being sent an email.
    •

AYÚDAME A CAMBIAR LA EDUCACIÓN EN COLOMBIA MEDIANTE TU DONACIÓN.

A CAMBIO PODRÁ RECIBIR ALGUNA DE LAS MUCHAS RECOMPENSAS QUE OFRECEMOS.

Android/IOS/Windows/MAC/Linux

divided in three different stages:

Each object and character within the game provides different options for interaction in the microworld; they introduce some small games or dynamics, but others pose complete problematic situations. 

 

 

 

 

THIRD STAGE: MINI-GAMES
Each mini-game is posed around the curricular axes for math created by various international institutions. The characters who the child interacts with will propose these. For further learning, no mini-game is allowed to be completed by trial and error, so that the child understands what and why is answering that. Every success and every mistake counts. 




 


 
Currently the prevailing teaching method in the classroom has created in the students apathy, disinterest and lack of motivation towards acquiring new knowledge;
  
 
This is the specific case of mathematics, where the student has become a passive actor of their learning process, by simply memorizing formulas and operations without knowing their real applications, banishing in this way the young people who fail to have good grades in this area from the paradise of the mathematics, labeling this subject as tedious, boring and useless. 

 
The game is based on a system of free exploration of a virtual environment where the child is master of time and the way they explore it. A world that presents them challenges that simulate the situations that gave rise to the concepts of mathematics. If you want to learn well, you need to understand well, but this requires to reconstruct mentally not only the concept, but also the path that leads from the physical gesture to its concept or object. 

 
“Echo of the giants” proposes a system where all actors of the learning process can find relevant tools towards their point of view, but that revolve around the same experience, the game.
These actors are: teachers, parents and students; In addition to educational institutions, which represent the collective interest of teachers. 
Advantages of using "Echo of the giants": 



Allows to decouple learning from the mental limits of a classroom or specific hours, because it can be used both inside and outside school. 


Brings the teacher and the concepts closer to the children minds, because with the experiences lived in the video game the teacher can carry out a dialogue in a common field known by both.


It presents an alternative to the classic video games, with great fun, entertainment and educational quality. 


It can be consolidated as an alternative to the grading system, because not only measures the child's performance at a specific moment with a written test, but its development throughout the school year.


PINVED
As we know, the task of parents and teachers is different from the students, so we created a tool called "Platform for integration of educational video games" or PINVED (for its acronym in Spanish). 

 
PINVED will allow parents and teachers to participate in the knowledge acquired by the children throughout the game, but with the use of control, supervision and guidance tools. 




PINVED is a web platform that can be used from
any browser. This platform provides different tools for parents and
teachers such as:



Being able to access guidelines for
	parents or teachers that explain the use of the platform and video
	games (in the future there will be more games on the same line).


Control the maximum progress in the game
	of the students in charge, so they don't surpass the teacher
	progress in class.


Detailed charts of the progress of their
	children or students, where the overall progress in the history
	(curriculum) and individual progress by topic (per mini-game) are
	outlined.


Knowing the quantity of successful and
	failed attempts to play each mini-game, representing the progress,
	understanding and affinity the player has of the topic represented
	by it.


Knowing the curricular content of each
	mini-game from the video games which the teacher or parent has an
	active subscription.


Full control over child accounts (for
	parents), which includes parental control over playing time.



 

 

 




The usage mode of the video game "Echo of
the giants" is through subscription. The usage mode of "PINVED"
is free, as long as the subscriber has a subscription to one of the
video game from the platform.







LET'S GET IN AN ADVENTURE TOGETHER


We want to go in an adventure like Ecco of “Echo of the giants”, the future is unknown but the goal is clear, transform the way we and our kids learn, and we want you to go with us. We believe that with this project we open the door to many of us to create and found a new way to learn, where the knowledge matters in the real world and we get prepare to fight the real enemy, the apathy and the ignorance, instead of training to fill papers and test after test. “Echo of the giants” is going to be the first step of many we want to take with you. The idea is to create environments and stories that teach the children not only the basis of science but the basis of our society and how they are useful through the use of their unique set of skills and the knowledge they can get from the world an others, that's why we are betting to use a character (Ecco) whit whom the child and even us can make a travel to rediscover the path our ancestors made to create the society we live nowadays. 
The project is long and will cover the entire school year through repetitive learning reinforcement dynamics, gradual release of events, global goals and a community around the game. It is a task that requires effort and commitment. We want to position the country as an alternative when developing video games. To do so, we need your support. Although we have already received financial support from the national government (developing important parts of the game and the web platform) we need your help to keep delivering the same high quality that we have presented, until the final phase. 
We have currently developed the first part of the first unit and the basis of “Echo of the giants”, as well as the rudiments of the platform PINVED, as was intended at first with the government contribution, but we want to finish the game. The game is going to be formed by 8 units, which represents the topics:




Pre-math concepts (about 9 mini-games)


Numbers until 10 (about 20 mini-games)


Basic adding and subtracting (about 16
	mini-games)


Operations with 3 single-digit numbers
	(about 5 mini-games)


Numbers until 100 (about 10 mini-games)


Advanced adding and subtracting (about 9
	mini-games)


Adding and subtracting with 2-digit
	numbers (about 11 mini-games)


Measurement units (about 15 mini-games)


There are about 100 mini-games just for solely
curricular purposes, but it is intended to have a lot of more
mini-game for fun, objects to collect, comics to read, characters to
know, a lot of exciting options!
It is planned to fulfill the following goals
with your contributions:


Voice acting in both
	English and Spanish for all the texts and dialogues within the game,
	to ease the process of reading to children.


Music and sound effects.


Complete the game
	programming.


Finish the development
	of the platform PINVED both in English and Spanish.


The contributions received are
going to be distributed as follows:


Note that this is a fixed funding campaign, that means “Eco de los gigantes” (Echo of the giants) will only be possible if the goal is reached. When funded, we hope to make the first release of the game 10 months from then.



 

 

“because there's a whole life to play”
see our web page 
Founded in 2015, in the city of Bucaramanga, Colombia; as a product of a persistent idea that materialized as a company. Life2play is a company dedicated to game development and to create complete experiences that embark the viewer in an experience that transcends the screen and the controller, and the mere concept of harmless fun. Created in order to contribute to solving social problems. 
Life2play was conceived in the Universidad Industrial de Santander (UIS), or as in English: Industrial University of Santander.


MISSION


Contribute to the improvement of educational
quality by using innovative techniques in technology, computing and
communication, to create engagement and fun around the learning
process.
VISION

Be a leader in the education field, promoting
the appropriation of one's learning processes, and the inclusion of
all actors in this formative process, through our products and the
creation of our own proposals for education, both nationally and
internationally.
Conceived in 2014, we have gone through many
processes of selection and evaluation by the government of Colombia
to make us worthy of seed capital delivered by the "Fondo
emprender", which was given in 2015. The idea was supported by
the degree project of our founder, in which he proposed the video
game "Echo of the giants" and the recommended learning
environment to apply the suggested learning strategy. The project was
awarded the best possible grade and was a candidate for the laureate
degree project award.

THE FOUNDER
Gonzalo Barrera has been a professional
recognized multiple times nationally. He was one of the top 100 high
school graduates in the country in 2008 and one of the top 100
undergraduate graduates of the country in 2014, obtaining the
recognition "SUMMA CUM LAUDE" as the best systems engineer
of 2014 from the Universidad Industrial de Santander (UIS) due to his
academic performance.
THE CORE STAFF

Our team was
chosen after a rigorous selection process with the aim of supporting
new talent.


In Life2play
we care not only to create stunning and immersive experiences, but
also to contribute to the solution of social problems; therefore, we
committed to support young talent and train professionals... rather
people with great professional and personal qualities that contribute
to the growth and improvement of the video game industry.




 




Backer
$5: Wallpaper and newsletter subscription
we appreciate your support, and we demonstrate it with a set of stunning wallpapers for your desktop. We also want to keep you updated with the last news of the project, We know you're gonna love it.






Ultra Backer
$15: Backer's + Special item code
Maybe you want to play the game in the future, so, we give you a special item code to redeem within the game; this item will only be avaliable to the early backers. We don't know... it might be a new hair style for Ecco, we don't know...








I want the game!
$30: Ultra Backer's + The game!!
You are eager to have the game in your hands. We give you a full year subscription to the game, and a parents guide about how to use it as a educational tool; plus all the previous rewards.











Curious Teacher
$60: Ultra Backer's + The game!! + activities for children
You not only want the game, you are a curious teacher and want to see if you can use it in your classroom. We give you the game, a high resolution poster (digital) for your classroom, a digital activity book for children, the teacher's guide and the set of digital trading cards.












Game Fan
$60: "I want the game!"'s + Poster + Activity book + Trading cards + Sound track
You not only want the game, you really like it and want to be more in deep with it. We give you the game plus a digital poster, a digital activity book for children, a set of trading cards and the sound track of the game.














Ultra Fan
$90: Game fan's + art book + name in credits!
We really appreciate your commitment, so, we give you all the game fan's rewards plus a digital copy of our art-book and we will put your name in the credits.

















Teacher's pack
$120: Curious teacher's + soundtrack + art book + name in credits + thank you video + 5 one year game subscription + PINVED subscription
You have already decided to take a closer look to the game and want to try it in your classroom. We give you 5 one year subscriptions for your students, plus a digital copy of the art book, the sound track, your name in the credits, a custom thank-you video, and the theacher subscription to PINVED.

















Mega Fan
$150: Ultra fan's + thank-you video + T-shirt + physical thank-you card
We really appreciate your commitment and you wanna get farther, you don't wanna just feel the experience, but you wanna touch it; we give you a custom thank-you video, a t-shirt of "echo of the giants" and a physical thank you card, plus all the rewards for the ultra fan package.



















Fan Teacher
$250: teacher's pack + T-shirt+ Physical thank-you card
All the teacher's pack rewards plus physical rewards: a T-shirt (for adult) and a thank-you card.


















Hiper Fan
$250: Mega fan's + Physical Art-book + Notebook for children
All the Mega fan's rewards plus a physical copy of the art-book (hard cover) and a gorgeous notebook for children with stickers (you can pick the model)



















Classroom pack
$500: Fan teacher's pack + 15 one year subscription instead of 5 + Physical art-book
All the fan teacher's pack rewards but instead 5 one year subscriptions, you get 15 one year subscriptions for your students, plus a physical copy of the art-book.




















Super Parent
$500: Hiper fan's + Physical activity book for children + Ecco plushie + Ecco figurine
Because we know you are a super parent, we give you all the hiper fan pack's rewards plus a physical activity book for your children, a plushie of Ecco and a Figurine of Ecco all for the delight of your children.





















Ultra Parent
$750: Super Parent's + Digital Commission
Because we know you are a super parent, but you want to give something artistic and unique to your kids, we offer you a custom digital commission just for you, plus all the super parent's rewards.





















Mega Parent
$1,000: Super Parent's + your kid as a NPC
Because we know you are a super parent, but you want your kid to be part of the game, we offer you the opportunity to see your kid as a NPC within the game; you get a 3D full color model of your kid with the style of "Echo of the giants" to fit the game; everybody who plays the game would see your child, in a visible area, and it will identify itself with your kid's name and country; plus all the super parent's rewards.





















King Supporter
$2,5000: Super Parent's + design a monster
You want to be part of the design process, we want to let you live the dream with us of watching your ideas becoming true in a video game, design a monster and watch it being a fundamental part of "Echo of the giants" (note that it most fit the game and its audience); plus all the super parent's rewards.





















Emperor Supporter
$5,000: Super Parent's + design an antagonist
You want to be part of the design process, we want to let you live the dream with us of watching your ideas becoming true in a video game, but you just don't want to be a little part, but to impact the story, we offer you to design an antagonist to Ecco, a true "Echo of the giants" experience (note that it must fit to the game and its audience); plus all the super parent's rewards.





















Heavenly Supporter
$7,500: Super Parent's + design a pet for Ecco
You want to be part of the design process, we want to let you live the dream with us of watching your ideas becoming true in a video game, but you just don't want to be a little part, but to impact the story and to watch your creation everytime you play, we offer you to design a pet for Ecco, a true "Echo of the giants" experience (note that it must fit to the game and its audience); plus all the super parent's rewards.






















Supporter Producer
$10,000: Super Parent's + design a mini-game for "Echo of the giants"
You jump straight to your dream, being a video game producer, we are truly grateful with your support, in exchange we want you to design one of our recurrent minigames, there's not higher honor for a video games fan than to be part of the design crew (note that it must fit to the game and its audience); plus all the super parent's rewards AND YOU GET YOUR NAME IN THE CREDITS AS SUPPORTER PRODUCER!








Since the process of conception to the
implementation and monitoring of the company, we have had the support
of the following entities:




UNIVERSIDAD INDUSTRIAL DE SANTANDER

The Industrial University of Santander is a prestigious public university on the top ten from Colombia. The UIS supports the project through its entrepreneurship unit: during the ideation, creation of the business plan, foundation of the company and project monitoring. It was this unit the one who supported the project in front of the government to gain the seed capital, and it knows the idea since it was just a degree project. 


 


     

  

THE PRESIDENCY OF THE REPUBLIC OF COLOMBIA AND THE NATIONAL LEARNING SERVICE (SENA)

Through the “Fondo emprender” and FONADE: Seed capital for the foundation of the company and the development of the project "Eco of the giants"; auditing and monitoring the project. We are part of the selected group of ideas that have been backed by the colombian government.

 
Other ways you can help We appreciate just the fact you spent the time to watch our proposal, and it would  help us a lot if you:  Share this with all the people you know or think they can be interested. Remember, sharing is caring. Write us an email with your point of view about this project, we love being sent an email.

story: Hallo my friend! What are you looking for? Hmm?
story_txt: Hallo my friend! What are you looking for? Hmm?

story:
What is "Global Nightmare"?

This is a new RTS game which uses new technology to more immersive gameplay. Multiplayer will be working on the system "Client-Client", this will allow all players to play without error factor on the server side. Due to Unreal Engine 4 the game will present a dynamic maps(real time map destruction), dynamic weather and beautiful graphics.Because of the engine on which the game is based for it it will be easy to create mods and maps.And will also be support DirectX 12. 

(real time rendering on a dx11, prealpha version)

Tech Specifications

Because of the high initial optimization, system requirements will not be as high. For ultra graphics settings, will be required GTX 650 or Radeon 7790

What We Need

Best budget is $ 3500: for faster game creation and music licensing.

Recommended budget is $ 3000:the process of creating the required 6-7 months, music will be added to the update after the first 1000 game sales.

Minimal budget is $ 2500: the process of creating the required 7-8 months? music will be added to the update after the first 1000 game sales,there is the risk of certain errors in the game.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can not help but you are interested in the project tell your friends or people you know are in social networks on the pages about this game :-D

story:
Hello everyone! We're Prochnost Studios, an indie-team from Moscow. Our numbers are small, but our souls are strong! 

We love creativity, in particular how it can be reflected and transformed in computer games. That's why we decided to develop our own game. And today we want to introduce you to our creation. "Fearsome Creatures of the Night" is a dark farytale action/adventure game for Windows & Mac. You can visit our Steam Greenlight concept page here (click)!

We have no doubt that you want to know why we're collecting money and what the game is about. Well, then read on. And If you like what you see - you can buy one of the perks and support our project!

The concept is based on the stories about so called fearsome creatures, mythical animals from the North American folklore. The story takes place in the dark forest, which is the habitat of these beasts. You play as Jackalope, the rabbit with horns. The protagonist doesn't remember who he is, why he has these strange scars on his chest and what happened. Mysterious Spirit guides you to the center of the woods to "fulfill your destiny." Why? What does this spirit want from you? Who are you and what happened with your memory? Try to find out.



As we mentioned earlier, in "Fearsome Creatures of the Night" you play as Jackalope, a humanoid rabbit with horns. Your main goal is to reach the forbidden grove in the center of the woods. Thus says the spirit. "To fulfill your destiny"... but what is it? 

At the beginning the game may look like a pureblood platformer, but we can assure you that the gameplay is quite unique. It combines many different mechanics with non-standard survival features. Interaction with enemies is very unusual, because you can't attack monsters directly. The protagonist is too weak for that. Although he has some effective tricks to interact with inanimate objects.

 You'll need to find other ways and means of interplay with the environment in order not to perish in the mysterious forest. That's why you should be clever to outsmart predators!

So the gameplay is built on the fact that you need to use different ways to divert attention and sometimes draw it yourself. On your way you'll find a wide variety of monsters with different customs, habits, and even taste preferences. Most of them are not friendly at all. You need to find a unique approach for each beast.  Find out what attracts them and what scares, apply this knowledge to make them hunt each other, use some monsters for your own purposes to move the story forward. 

For example, let's take this strange creature Tripodero. It may not be easy to anger him, but rather just to get his attention.  His strange appearance and the light that shines through his eye scares predators. It’s handy when you have to go through dangerous areas of the forest.

Also you can try to find bait to lead monsters into a trap. And that is not the only example of what we’re planning to create. We have tons of ideas and we can assure you that there will be lots of mechanics and tactics to explore.




"The forest calls you, the smallest and the weakest creature of all. You WILL reach the forbidden grove deep inside the woods. This is your destiny. This is your purpose. I say so! But be careful! The forest is inhabited by a variety of creatures that can kill you in a heartbeat! Use your ingenuity, distract their attention, lure them into traps or try to find hidden workarounds - this is your only way to survive!"

The plot is based on the stories about so called fearsome creatures, mythical animals from the North American folklore. It all begins at the edge of the dark forest, which is the habitat of these beasts. You play as Jackalope, the weakest creature of all. Mysterious spirit guides you and you don't even know why, because any attempt to remember anything leads nowhere.  And the thing is that Jackalope is the only creature in the woods, who looks like human. So, your main goal is to reach the forbidden grove in the center of the woods. Thus says the spirit. "To fulfill your destiny"... but what is it? On your way you'll find a wide variety of monsters, and many of them are not friendly.  What will it be? Can you survive in such conditions, using the power of you intellect and the aid of a strange spirit? 

This is only the beginning of the plot. We have long come up with a scenario and prepared a couple of interesting and unusual twists. The forest is not what it seems at first glance, it is full of stories of lumberjacks who once invaded the center of the woods and awakened some dark force that changed the animals. The story of our hero is full of interesting details, which you will find out for yourself if you play!



“Fearsome Creatures of the Night” has a dark gothic atmosphere. We needed a soundtrack that shows the perverse beauty of the game. Acoustic melodies played on piano, guitars and even ethnic wind instruments, mixed with occasional splashes of ambient and rhythmic electronics... Just what the doctor ordered. What a joy to know that there's a man in your team capable of creating such a thing!

Here is a small example of the music so you could get an idea about the atmosphere of the game.



Music:

  • Akira Yamaoka
  • The Birthday Massacre
  • Jakalope
Movies:

  • Donnie Darko
  • Beetlejuice
  • El laberinto del fauno (Pan's Labyrinth)
  • The Village
Games:

  • Limbo
  • Silent Hill series 
  • Knock-knock
Books:

  • "Fearsome creatures of the lumberwoods" by William T. Cox
  • "Alice in Wonderland" by Lewis Carroll



The very first test that we're ready to overcome - budget issues. We have no doubt that you want to know how the money will be spent. And especially for this purpose we've prepared a detailed graph.

As you can see, we're going to spend every earned penny on development and bonuses production.

Of course this is not the only obstacle in our way. Currently the game is in the early stages of development. For a long time we've been  developing it on our own, but now we realize that the idea is too big and we need support.

With your help we will improve every aspect of the game, and by that we mean real enhancement. With successful financing it will be possible to develop the game full-time, which will allow us to create:

  • Beautiful and realistic animation, one of the key points of the right image.
  • Impressive graphics, sound and music, with the ability to record audio at the recording studio.
  • Unusual gameplay situations that will surprise you during the game.
We have a clear vision of what "Fearsome Creatures of the Night" should be.  And we know perfectly well that it should be a high-quality product. In addition, we're planning to communicate with the community in order to understand what things they would like to see in the game.

If this campaign is successful, estimated release date will be the end of 2015 - beginning of 2016.



If you can't or don't want to give us your money, you still can help us! Spread the word about the game and this campaign so that other people can learn about it as much as possible! Post stuff about "Fearsome Creatures of the Night" on Twitter, VK, Facebook, YouTube, IndieDB or anywhere else (even in the astral plane)! Also you can visit our website, we will be very pleased.

We want this game to be something special not only for us, but for all of you! You can help us bring our vision to life, we are counting on it!

The very first test that we're ready to overcome - budget issues. We have no doubt that you want to know how the money will be spent. And especially for this purpose we've prepared a detailed graph.

As you can see, we're going to spend every earned penny on development and bonuses production.
Of course this is not the only obstacle in our way. Currently the game is in the early stages of development. For a long time we've been  developing it on our own, but now we realize that the idea is too big and we need support.
With your help we will improve every aspect of the game, and by that we mean real enhancement. With successful financing it will be possible to develop the game full-time, which will allow us to create:  Beautiful and realistic animation, one of the key points of the right image. Impressive graphics, sound and music, with the ability to record audio at the recording studio.
Unusual gameplay situations that will surprise you during the game. 
We have a clear vision of what "Fearsome Creatures of the Night" should be.  And we know perfectly well that it should be a high-quality product. In addition, we're planning to communicate with the community in order to understand what things they would like to see in the game.



If this campaign is successful, estimated release date will be the end of 2015 - beginning of 2016.
   







 
If you can't or don't want to give us your money, you still can help us! Spread the word about the game and this campaign so that other people can learn about it as much as possible! Post stuff about "Fearsome Creatures of the Night" on Twitter, VK, Facebook, YouTube, IndieDB or anywhere else (even in the astral plane)! Also you can visit our website, we will be very pleased.We want this game to be something special not only for us, but for all of you! You can help us bring our vision to life, we are counting on it!

story:
Hey guys!

Now I want to share those cool stuff with you! I'll randomly pick a converted game and email it to you combined with tutorials on how to run it on a Mac. Those games are guaranteed working well.

I bought a large box of 5  1/4'' floppy disks for Apple II last month in a flea market. It contains nearly 50 vintage softwares. It takes me some time to figure out how to converted them and run those vintage software on Mac. 

 

Hard drive and chips I used for converting data

  

 

Done!

story:
GanjaSyns: match-3 RPG Shooter mining game!

Blockchain game with built-in wallet. The format itself will make it possible to be a mobile multi-platform for the interaction of completely different devices.

The meaning of the game, whose idea for me is the perfect balance of match-3, RPG and shooter, due to the animation of the models during special moves, does not change the attitude towards the built-in crypto wallet with its own currency, as well as vice versa.

The game doesn't lose its meaning. The perfect balance of interest in both processes. GS Tokens can always be bought. And of course, the tokens on the Beta test will be definitely cheaper and will later be reflected in the wallet of the main game.

There are 9 stones in the game, standard 5, and 4 additional ones, which open up the possibility of developing the skills and abilities of heroes, as well as open access to the call of heroes of a completely new type.

Each summon is endowed with internal bonuses, and makes it possible to get not only a new hero, but also to catch weapons and useful items such as armor, disguises, thermal imagers and much more.

Accessories in the game increase the parameters of skills by the corresponding number of units, adding the ability to dodge bullets, pass through mines, and get pets (Drons) to help in battle.

There is a lot of work to be done, characters and weapons have to be re-rendered. More than one team should program. And that's why I took the calculation based on the data of the development of large computer games, designed for a staff of 100 people. And a year of development. Average $ 2.5 million per month.

And now, watch please presentation one more time, that could answer for a lot of questions.

Risks:

While lunching game, we create cryptocurrency and promote it in many steps, as minimum You participate in CPO of starting value of currency. So You can take very good benefits.

http://ganjasynz.com

story:
Short Summary

The main feature of the game is that spells aren’t infinite. The Tiny Wizard has no visible level and gains no XP, instead of this the spells have. Crafting the same spell again will raise this spell power. You are collecting spell recipes that describe ingredients and how to gather them right. Used spells can be recharged with power crystals (e.g. on level start).

The storyline is moving forward by giving you quests to complete. There will be NPCs in a game that will appear on a location. Need to say here that all world is procedurally generated, so every level start is not like previous. You will not find NPC second time, instead found another NPC with another quest. The random will have a prediction to control a story canvas, but my idea is to make it various as possible.

E.g of a spellcraft. So you have your first recipe. There is a description - to cook this spell you need to put two snakes and five blue mushrooms into a cauldron with boiling mana.

You need to find an instruction - how to find blue mushrooms and snakes? And here's an NPC comes to help, giving a quest “Bring me a water from ten evil drops, and I’ll tell you how to find mushrooms” and “I’ve dropped my staff into this cave, help me to find it. But beware, there is a lot of snakes in that caves”.

There are no levels in the game but there are locations. So you will need to visit one location several times, searching for a quest boss or trying to collect ingredients. Every time this location will look different and will contain different enemies and ingredients. The quests will teach you what you will need to do to un-reveal all secrets of the location and collect all recipes.

What game will be on the release

  • A free game that will be available in mobile stores at the end of the first development stage:
  • At least five locations of the Dark Forest, each with additional art, enemies, and bosses
  • The storyline that involves you into the game
  • Dozens of enemies with different behaviors
  • Bosses with different tactics
  • A spellbook to hold pages that you will find in the game. A lot of awesome spells to find
  • Secret caves, secret rooms
  • Daily challenges

Roadmap

First development stage:

  1. Playable prototype with random level, monsters, and rooms generation (done)
  2. Pre-alpha with UI, inventory, working spellcraft system, and battle system (work in progress)
  3. NPC’s and a Quest system
  4. Alpha with working game loop and a balance.
  5. List of enemies
  6. List of Bosses
  7. Storyline embedded into the quest system linked to levels and bosses.
  8. Beta release with music, sfx, intro.
  9. Release candidate. Act I is done with additional monsters, spells, art.
  10. Release at Google Play
  11. Release on AppStore

Second development stage:

  1. PC version that will have slightly different speed and challenge, with the corresponding controls and UI
  2. Release on Steam

Third development stage:

  1. Act II. New environment. New storyline, NPCs, monsters, spells, ingredients.

Work In Progress

https://alvsgl.itch.io/dark-forest-pre-alpha(Warning! It's just a playable prototype, no core game loop.)

Update #1 Playable prototype. Looks like fun even without fightback to monsters. The level is generated based on numeral seed.

Update #2 Made a spell system and first battle spell. Now is the time to work on spellcraft UI.

 

Update #3 Working on NPCs

Update #4 Working on UI and Live Ingredients behavior

story:
Thank you for stopping by and checking out Rumblers! First of all, I would love to say welcome and I hope you enjoy my project. After months of figuring out how to code I have finally been able to put together an idea I've had for a very long time. Being a father of two beautiful girls doesn't really allow for dedicated time but with planning (during their nap/sleep time) I was able to submerge myself into the world of Rumblers. First released on a browser, users are able to connect with others and battle to be number one. It has always been my thing to allow my creation to be enjoyed with friends/family, so play with up to Six(6) Players in a Free-for-All Battle to be Crowned the Winner. If you are feeling risky you can also jump into our live matchmaking system that connects you to players all around the world. After the release, I began to discover issues that are fixes and improvements needed for Rumblers that I, unfortunately, can not correct by myself. In search of a solution, I am reaching out to all video game lovers around the world to give a helping hand in making this project really come to life.

Thank you for your time and I hope to connect with you soon! 

 

After the release of the first build I have realized many options that I will have to complete in order to give the player the full experience I have envisioned  

Break down of my Road-Map of Rumblers:

  • Stage #1: Stabilize Rumblers Base coding with all features tested and added for user end experience. During these stages we will attach a downloadable desktop version to allow user to easily connect to the Rumblers Environment. 
  • Stage #2: Added Networking System that allows users to create an Account and save their progress. During these stages players will be able to track their wins/losses and have access to leader boards, earn custom skins and work on their player profile rank. 
  • Stage #3: After completion of the first and second stages, we will begin to build up our players feature list including cross-platform formatting, giving access to iOS & Android Playable. Also adding Maps & Weapons to the game which will open custom weapons skins for players.
  • Stage #4: Upgrade Servers to increase performance for end users which will provide servers access all around the world for reduced pinging and engineer next level networking coding and web sockets to improve overall game-play. 
  •  

Your support during this process is critical in hiring an extra set of professionals to accomplish our end results game. I understand helping could be challenging and hard but any little bit can take us to that next stage.  

 

Understand Early Access games can be a little worrisome to supporters/players as they seem to not hold their word on things during the process of development. I ensure you that you will always have a direct connection with myself or someone else on the Rumblers Team. All questions and concerns will be answered on a personal level and we will provide every form of communication to connect to the team. 

  • Official Discord
  • Official Twitter
  • Email

 

Can't contribute? That's okay! Here are a few options that are free you can do that only take a few minutes of your time and are just as important.

  • Post our Project on your Social Media Accounts
  • Play Rumblers with your Friends/Family

story:
Overview

We are creating a game that smashes together the new Auto Battler genre (e.g. Teamfight Tactics/Auto Chess) with the Roguelike format (e.g. Slay the Spire) to create a completely unique single player experience. Add on top of that colourful Nintendo style worlds, characters and mini-games you get Auto Blobs!

If that sounds like something you’d want to play, we need your help!

Auto Battler games already come with a lot of Roguelike elements built in. You are encouraged to build a new strategy every single time you play with randomized shops, items and opponents. It's clear to us that expanding on those elements and adding more with a procedurally generated map, boss fights, tons more items, special events and more would make an awesome game!

We’ve played countless hours of both Auto Battler games and Roguelikes and we know we’ve got what it takes to deliver on both at once. Our goal is to have you finding new and interesting strategies after hundreds of runs. You'll be taking on new challenges hundreds of hours in and making the craziest thing happen at 2am when you should be asleep instead of playing Auto Blobs, what are you doing? Go to bed!

In Auto Blobs you’ll begin as a rookie blob strategist with a small team of starter blobs. As you progress through the game you will upgrade your team, buy new blobs and items from shops and deck out your team to fight harder and harder groups of enemies. Whenever your team loses a battle, you will take damage and when you reach 0 health, the run ends! (Better luck next time kiddo.) 

5+ vibrant worlds.

Each run will contain 4 random worlds in a different order each time, the more worlds we can make the more varied your runs become! Worlds have special map mechanics inspired by the Super Mario series and other games with interesting world maps that make traversing the overworld a puzzle game by itself.

 

30+ unique enemies, and loads of variants with special traits.

Each world introduces a brand new enemy set into the pool, meaning you’ll see fresh combinations in every run. Add on top of that the random elite trait system (explosive bloblins, fiery bats, giant mushblobs) and you’ll be facing a new challenge every time you press play.

 

12+ thrilling boss encounters.

As soon as you enter a world the end boss and all of their abilities will be revealed to you. Not only do you need to focus on keeping your party alive as you progress, you’ll need to construct a strategy to take down the boss at the end.

 

5+ special event mini-games.

As well as combat, the map will contain Event spaces that you can land on to play a mini-game (think of Mario Party). Our ideas range from arcadey games like claw-grab to little self-contained games in their own right, like an idea we have for a card game. We don’t want to confirm anything until we know we can deliver though, so these are just examples for now!

 

At least 2 additional game modes.

We have so many ideas for game modes it’s hard to hold them back, but we don’t want to promise any until we know they’re fun. So far we know Puzzle mode and Endless mode are a lot of fun to play and realistic for us to make, so we’ll be adding those in at some point during early access.

 

40+ blob allies.

Each character in Auto Blobs has a class (e.g. Wizard, Ranger, Knight) and an element (e.g. Blazing, Glacial, Earthen) and by combining these two together you get a unique blob with its own stats, ability and synergies. Finding a team that works together well and learning the counters to certain enemies is the key to becoming a blobtastic expert.

 

50+ items.

We. Love. Items. Items builds are one of our favourite Auto-Battler features, we want choosing the right item combination to turn a good run into an amazing, once in a lifetime, run. For now we can promise there will be a lot of different possible item builds, but let’s just say we have some creative ideas we want to try out that could see the number of item combinations skyrocket. Here’s a few of the many, many, ideas we have so far:

  • Eternity Orb: This unit’s remaining mana at the end of a round is stored in this items (To be added next battle).
  • Stop Sign: Whenever a unit uses their ability they are stunned for 2 seconds.
  • Gumball Machine: Attacks have a chance to spawn a collectible (e.g. Coins, Experience, Items and Potions).
  • Arcanist’s Cube: This character casts a random ability instead of their own when they reach maximum mana.

 

Special single use potions.

Sometimes you’re deep into a run and, despite your best efforts, you’re thrown up against a seemingly impossible fight. Potions can help you turn the tide of the battle in your favour, or give you an extra push to take down a difficult boss without losing any health at all. We have tons of ideas for potions but here’s a few to get your mouth watering;

  • Shrink Elixir : Reduces an enemy’s level.
  • Vial of Dragon’s Breath: Double’s an ally’s attack speed this round.
  • Mini Mana Font: Gives an ally 50% of their maximum mana this round.
  • Medusa’s Tears: Turns an enemy to stone for the first 3 seconds of the round. 

 

Experience a new adventure every time with randomly generated maps, enemies and boss combinations.

 

Connor -- Lead Developer/Designer. 

Can usually be found either making or playing a video game, other endeavors seem pointless. He will be responsible for coding the underlying combat systems and designing the character abilities/items in the game.

Favourite Games: Kirby Super Star, League of Legends, Binding of Isaac, Realm of the Mad God

‘I’ve been working on games of all shapes and sizes for… professionally just over 5 years… but to be honest I was making card games on the back of cereal boxes when I was 8 years old.’ 

 

Tom -- Lead Artist

The guy that attempts to make things look nice. He appreciates all the art forms but especially game art. He probably wouldn't have chosen a career in it if he didn't. He used to love playing games but now doesn't get the chance since acquiring a baby daughter who consumes all his time. Proficient at 3D art but terrible at 2D, which probably doesn't need drawing attention to.

Favourite Games: Guild Wars 2, most GTA's, Ocarina of Time, Skyrim, modded Minecraft, Dota 2

“If only I knew what I was doing!”

 

Joey -- Gameplay Developer

Likes to play video games and guitar, and makes games and VR experiences professionally. He's got a few years programming experience, but more importantly a LOT of years coffee drinking and eyebrow furrowing experience. His job on Auto Blobs mainly involves UI and Combat interface implementation and design.

Favourite Games: Transistor, XCOM 2, Mount and Blade, Darkest Dungeon, Borderlands

“Hey, it would be nice if you could come up with a quote for yourself - Someone that isn't Joey“

 

Adrian -- Boss Man

Bloke that founded the company and makes sure the bills get paid. Knows a thing or two about making video games, has been doing it since he was 10 years old - which if we told you how old he was you'd see is a very long time.

Favourite Games: Age of Empires, Monkey Island, Counter-Strike and Dungeon Master

"I promise to stop the arm falling off my office chair if this project gets proper money"

 

Find us in all of these lovely places!

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Even more variety in each run with an extra 2 worlds. And once again, you’ll be deciding which ones through a Discord vote!

We think this game would fit right in on Switch. We want to play it on the.. Uh.. Train.. Don’t you?

5 more mini-game events - Even more variety in each run with an extra 10 mini-games. And better yet, you’ll be deciding which ones through a Discord vote!

Help our items come to life! With 3D items your blobs can hold a sword a staff and wear plate armor, hold 3 swords or better yet, wear 3 different hats.

Design your own puzzle levels and upload them to our database to share them to the Auto Blobs community. Our very own Super Blobio Maker.

Currently we’ve been developing Auto Blobs in evenings and weekends as a passion project. Meeting this goal would allow us to work on it full time, and let it reach its full potential.

As well as supporting us, funding would allow us to hire 2D artists for the user interface and animators for our blobs in combat. Both would be a massive level up for the game’s visuals!

Ultimately, the more interest and support we receive the more items, enemies, events and modes we can add.. So the better the game will be!

Even if you can’t help fund us, or you want to do more, sharing this page with your friends or community, talking about it, or even joining our Discord and giving us your ideas are all great ways to help us bring this idea to life! We really want to know what you think, help us make the Auto Blobs you want to play!
