story:
Current Demo contains:

  • Tutorial Map
  • LAN multiplayer
  • Full controller support
  • AI
  • 5 weapons
  • 1 Map

Current Demo does not contain:

  • Online multiplayer (LAN and local only)
  • Achievements
  • Customization

Join discord to get alpha access of the game!

Project Retrograde is a multiplayer twin stick brawler with a twist where bullets don’t kill, but the environment does. All weapons cannot directly damage the players, but they will instantly die when they touch any red walls or objects in the map.


Use physics to your advantage by using your own weapon’s recoil to evade or propel yourself to great speeds. Utilize bullets’ ricochet, push boxes, and body slam others to win.


Varieties of weapons are available. Some weapons just shoot bullets, some bounces back bullets, some are just there to screw with you. Machine guns, railguns, shotguns, we got'em all and more to come.​

This game features online & local multiplayer, play with friends on the same PC with multiple controllers, or use LAN or Internet to play with other people. Each PC supports up to 4 controllers (4 players) and can join any online match with up to 6 players.


Arenas or “Maps” will determine the experience of the match. Each arena has their own layout, and some have unique quirks that requires different strategies to win the game. We are planning to release 10 maps initially on launch and then updating additional maps after that.

Unlock and choose different textures, thrusters and particle effects to personalize your ship. Look different and show off your achievements online.

“This is a very fun party game, I like the fact that you struggle with the the recoil control that adds fun to the flavour of the game. The art is also really attractive, this is one of the very few games that actually pull off tron like graphics really well"

- Wan Hazmer, Lead Designer Final Fantasy 15, 2018

“Something that would make you ROFL with your friends, or wreck friendships altogether simply because of the ensuing rage”

- Pladidus Santoso, Senior Editor of/at Jagat Play, 2018

We've been working on this for a year with our own funds. We use crowdfunding funds as final push and too add more content to the game. We already have plans to add more features, maps, modes, weapons & customization, but our focus for now is to finish the game first. Any extra funds above the goal will be put towards developing more contents & features for the game. Those extra contents and features will be released for free at launch or at later updates.

The Polished game, complete with 10 Levels and Online Multiplayer

More songs to pump out your adrenaline in the game. We plan to collaborate with the composer of the current songs in the game.

No controllers to play together? With the smartphone controller it’s easier than ever to play together. The Mobile controller would be distributed as an app to download with various customization options.

Create your own levels and play together. Boost your creativity and create your own levels with Level Editor.

We don’t have any perks that offer merchandise, soundtracks, or any additional stuff outside the game itself, we want to focus on making a fun game & delivering it to you first. In turn, we can give you multiple copies of the game discounted for you to share with your friends, family, stranger or whoever you want to play with.

We really appreciate the help you give on our game. We’ll work hard to deliver the game! Your name will be on the credits

Lone wolves out there need not worry. Play locally or online to compete with more people. You will get a copy of the game when it is released, Early Access, and your name on the credits.

  • One copy of the game
  • Early Access
  • Your name on the credits

Ruin your friendship together or ruin others through online play. You will get two copies of the game to play with your friend,two Early Accesses, and your name on the credits.

  • Two copies of the game
  • Two Early Accesses
  • Your name on the credits

Quadruple the fun with more people. Assert your dominance by defeating all of your friends in a game you just gave them. You will get four copies of the game to dominate your three mates with, Four Early Accesses, and your name on the credits.

  • Four copies of the game
  • Four Early Accesses
  • Your name on the credits

For those of you who are lucky enough to have 5 friends, this is the right pick for you. You will get six copies of the game to laugh at your five mates with, Six Early Accesses, and your name on the credits.

  • Six copies of the game
  • Six Early Accesses
  • Your name on the credits


Other than backing us, there are many ways you could help. Spread the word and share this campaign to your friends, families or any other strangers you find. Visit and follow our Facebook or Twitter page and share our posts and tweets. Our game emphasizes on multiplayer gameplay, so more people equals more fun!

The discord community is the place for you to talk with us directly! Follow us through the development, give your suggestions, get free limited beta access of the game and be the first one to get news on our development.

We are Freemergency Studio, established in 2018. Starting from groups of friends who had similar dreams, a humble studio was made. We took a leap of faith into the opportunity without any support. Throwing away other lifeline, we dive in with the hope of making it big.

Our goal is to leave our legacy to the world in the form of video games.

story_txt:
Current Demo contains:

Tutorial Map
LAN multiplayer
Full controller support
AI
5 weapons
1 Map

Current Demo does not contain:

Online multiplayer (LAN and local only)
Achievements
Customization

Join discord to get alpha access of the game!

 


 
Project Retrograde is a multiplayer twin stick brawler with a twist where bullets don’t kill, but the environment does. All weapons cannot directly damage the players, but they will instantly die when they touch any red walls or objects in the map.



 
Use physics to your advantage by using your own weapon’s recoil to evade or propel yourself to great speeds. Utilize bullets’ ricochet, push boxes, and body slam others to win.




Varieties of weapons are available. Some weapons just shoot bullets, some bounces back bullets, some are just there to screw with you. Machine guns, railguns, shotguns, we got'em all and more to come.​






 
This game features online & local multiplayer, play with friends on the same PC with multiple controllers, or use LAN or Internet to play with other people. Each PC supports up to 4 controllers (4 players) and can join any online match with up to 6 players.
 


 
Arenas or “Maps” will determine the experience of the match. Each arena has their own layout, and some have unique quirks that requires different strategies to win the game. We are planning to release 10 maps initially on launch and then updating additional maps after that.
 



Unlock and choose different textures, thrusters and particle effects to personalize your ship. Look different and show off your achievements online.

 



 
 








 
 


 
 


 
 





 

“This is a very fun party game, I like the fact that you struggle with the the recoil control that adds fun to the flavour of the game. The art is also really attractive, this is one of the very few games that actually pull off tron like graphics really well"
- Wan Hazmer, Lead Designer Final Fantasy 15, 2018


“Something that would make you ROFL with your friends, or wreck friendships altogether simply because of the ensuing rage”
- Pladidus Santoso, Senior Editor of/at Jagat Play, 2018




 
 


 
 




 
We've been working on this for a year with our own funds. We use crowdfunding funds as final push and too add more content to the game. We already have plans to add more features, maps, modes, weapons & customization, but our focus for now is to finish the game first. Any extra funds above the goal will be put towards developing more contents & features for the game. Those extra contents and features will be released for free at launch or at later updates.


The Polished game, complete with 10 Levels and Online Multiplayer



More songs to pump out your adrenaline in the game. We plan to collaborate with the composer of the current songs in the game.



No controllers to play together? With the smartphone controller it’s easier than ever to play together. The Mobile controller would be distributed as an app to download with various customization options.




Create your own levels and play together. Boost your creativity and create your own levels with Level Editor.




  
We don’t have any perks that offer merchandise, soundtracks, or any additional stuff outside the game itself, we want to focus on making a fun game & delivering it to you first. In turn, we can give you multiple copies of the game discounted for you to share with your friends, family, stranger or whoever you want to play with.


We really appreciate the help you give on our game. We’ll work hard to deliver the game! Your name will be on the credits



Lone wolves out there need not worry. Play locally or online to compete with more people. You will get a copy of the game when it is released, Early Access, and your name on the credits.

story:
We here at WAVE 1 GAMES are starting a fund raising campaign to get AQUA BLUE TRANSPARENT Jaguar shells made. These shells will be made by the same person who made the blood red and frog green shells for us. He is also the same person who made the reproduction pro-controllers. The purpose of this campaign is to get the funds necessary to produce the custom color shells for our summer Jaguar release SHARK BYTE. We will be asking for $5 donations from each backer. Everyone who backs this project will get 10% off their purchase of Shark Byte should they choose to buy it and each backer will automatically get a special Jaguar CD compilation of our 6 released games that will also include the unreleased SAUCER WARS W.I.P. demo. This will not be something you can purchase from WAVE 1 GAMES EVER. It will be exclusive to the cart backers only. I  Jeffrey Johnson will also sign each copy by hand.
The minimum order quantity for these shells is 2000. We do not expect to sell more than 300 copies of Shark Byte, so the rest of the shells (overstock) will be sold individually in the WAVE 1 GAMES store to anyone interested in obtaining this cool new color.

We do promise that if we do not meet our required goal to purchase the shells in time, then everyone who backed the project will be refunded their $5. Currently the translucent red shells and bright green shells that we were able to get out into the market before have been received quite well by the Jaguar community. We are hoping for the same results with this new Aqua color option, and the best thing is the same person who did those colors for us as well as the re-production pro controllers will be handling the production of these new shells as well.

 

We here at Wave 1 Games have done our best to keep the Atari Jaguar alive and we are excited to be continuing to bring more new home brew releases to the community. We thank you in advance for supporting this exciting new project!

story:
ABOUT THE BAR
The bar will be located in Essex in the Southend area, however final location details may change depending on the financial backing this campaign receives.

The location, budget and all possible research into making this a success is all in place. Having spoke to professionals already in the business, made inquiries with industry insiders and understanding what will be needed to make this work, we feel confident we can deliver. All that's needed now is the extra financial security a successful crowd funding campaign would bring.

THE FUN
So apart from friends, drinks and video games what else will be happening at this bar?

- Gaming Tournaments
- New Game Release Opening Nights
- Live Streams from the venue!
- Venu Hire Options
- Gaming themed cocktails and drinks
- Theme nights (RPG, Old School ect)
- Special Guest Nights! (Youtubers and Twitch Broadcasters)
- Gain XP while you play! (Customer loyalty rewards)

BE A PART OF GAMING HISTORY
Why crowd funding? The crowd funding raised by this campaign will allow us to not have to search funding from investors which might not have the same vision, allowing us to bring a true gaming experience without compromise! We are already investing as much as possible into this campaign and the crowd funding would be the final push needed to put everything into place.

Become a backer today so you can say you helped launched an awesome location and be a part of gaming history!

THE MAN BEHIND THE PLAN
JayEx23 is a veteran Gaming based Youtuber and Twitch broadcaster. Having served the gaming community for over 8 years with thousands of gaming videos, live streams and community events.

With over 370,000 Youtube subscribers, 50,000 Twitch followers and over 70 million views Jay feels like he understands the gaming community and what they would love to see in a venue!

The XP Bar would be the next step in providing a location where thousands of gamers can come together and have experiences to remember!

CAN I INVEST?
If you would like to get involved with this project on an investment level please email xpgamingbar@gmail.com

story:
THE VENTURE

DoughBoyFTB is an online multimedia streamer focused on developing memorable experiences that engross game enthusiasts to their core. Project DoughboyFTB will be an online streaming personality providing the best experience for our streamers and our members. In conjunction with DoughboyFTB, we are also launching Feed the Beast Gaming, a multimedia platform that will allow game enthusiasts to watch, commentate, and build new communities that support new content creators. Our mission is to revolutionize the streaming industry.

 

Starting a career on platforms like Twitch, YouTube, or Facebook often means spending some time broadcasting to absolutely no one. As a result, discoverability is an issue: when you log into Twitch, the most visible people already have a large following.  Most people starting without built-in audiences from other platforms or supportive friends and family end up staring at a big, fat zero on their viewership counter. This lonely live stream purgatory can last anywhere from a few days, weeks, months, sometimes even years, depending on your luck. But, according to people who have gone through it, lacking an audience is one of the most demoralizing things you can experience online.

 

WHY INDIEGOGO?

 

After careful consideration, we decided it would be ideal to start this venture by allowing our audience (YOU!) to get in on the ground floor.

A crowdfunded soft opening will allow incorporating preliminary feedback from the audiences.

WHERE YOUR SUPPORT WILL GO!

Our base goal of $40,000 means we will break even on Indiegogo and on Project DoughboyFTB and FTB Gaming fees.

 

A man chooses, a slave obeys!

Feed the Beast Gaming is a community, and we are looking for early adopters to join us on this adventure. Together we are much stronger than we ever could be alone. The funds that we raise here will be used to further development, improve support, market the site, and create innovations.

Since we are targeting a January 1st launch date, everyone that backs the site via Indiegogo will be able to use their Beast tokens on our live beta site and after the official launch. Our payout structure sends more money to the streamers and members and not to the most prominent companies' shareholders.

We can't do this alone; we need your help. 

 

Project DoughboyFTB & Feed the Beast Gaming (22%)

•     Web hosting

•     Podcast hosting

•     External hard drive & cloud storage

 

INDIEGOGO Materials and Rewards (53%)

•     Video editing

•     Special Edition Merchandise

•     Equipment Upgrades 

•     Marketing

 

Taxes and Fees (25%)

•     Income tax

•     Indiegogo Fee

•     Consultant fee

 

Website Production RoadMap

 

Limited Edition Merch Schedule/RoadMap

 

STRETCH TARGETS

FUNDED! $5,000 - Audio Equipment and more

At our first stretch goal, we'll be able to buy new microphones, stands, and headphones for all members of Project DoughboyFTB, meaning our new stream/podcast will sound even better!

 

$11,500 – FTB Podcast!

This stretch goal includes:

•     Audio equipment and external hard drive

•     Custom art and music

•     Podcast hosting fees

 

Other Ways You Can Help!

While we know that not all people can support us financially, that doesn't mean you can't be a part of the journey. Here are a few other ways that you can help us to ensure success:

Share this project on your social media to increase visibility - Getting the word out to others is just as important as financially backing us. Since we are just getting started, visibility is one of the essential commodities for us. So we appreciate all of the help that we can get.

 

On Behalf the Entire Team: Thank you!

I hope you can help us  – help us bring this projecr to life.  It started as a pass time and has steadily grown into a full-time job.  It means a lot to us to create memorable, weird, comedic, and supportive content that makes anyone smile or laugh.  Help  us share the magic of this story – and the people who made it all possible.  I think you’re going to like It. Thank you for contributing and sharing the word.

story:
Someone has said that the most beautiful things must be created with love. And he was right.

     EliteGameCom is a small independent game studio, consisting of professionals of the computer industry. Together, united, we have been applying our experience to create something  beautiful and incredible. And now, when most of the work is done, we proudly admit that this is a revolution in the computer industry. Our team has created amazing graphics as well as the engine, which allows you to play effectively even on a $ 70 mobile phones without the screen jerks and delays.

 

  Wonderful Milky Way Galaxy:

     For us the main goal has always been the same - to create wonderful solutions in a short period of time.

 The main rules of the game are the following:

  • Freedom of the player's will (there is no special mandatory behaviour for the players - the game is an open world where players can choose themselves, what will be the fate of the galaxy)
  • The game is constantly improving and acquiring new ships, space stations and characters
  • We as developers can create events in the galaxy (for example invasion of an alien race or other actions) to balance the gameplay or add interesting moments

  Prototype already includes:

  • Trade in goods at space stations of the solar system
  • Support for mobile phones with slow graphics processors
  • Clans of users (now up to 25 players in the clan)
  • Up to 50 players in the location (but in some locations this number can exceed 250)
  • Battles of the clans with fast flying ships (not in static bubbles)
  • Animation of the characters
  • Fights on the surface of the planets (in the combat soldier's suits)
  • Interior design of the spaceships
  • Captain's bridge, crew cabins and cargo compartments, * hangar for shuttles (only in Nirvana)
  • Internal space station compartments (commercial premises, observation platforms, places for passengers to rest)
  • Battle of the spaceships not only in space, but also in the atmosphere
  • Chat between users inside the location
  • Map of the Milky Way galaxy with nearly a hundred thousand planets (which are suitable for life)

It can contain errors or pieces of the game world that we did not have time to complete -  but we do our best every day to improve it - because we really enjoy this game and play it ourselves

EliteGameCom Story:

Battle on the terrain:

We have already made eight different spaceships (from small to huge):

Nirvana is the most powerful ship at the moment. Only it can be equipped with the most destructive Laser Annihilator and quantum powerful Shield Magx. This ship was created to establish your power in this stellar system and easily destroy clusters of smaller ships. Also, its interior decoration is not comparable to any ship. This is the most expensive ship in the game at the moment:

Captain's cabin:

With the separate shower, desk and panoramic window:

Hangar for shuttles:

Captain's bridge with the large panorama window:

This spaceship saved our hero when he drifted in space near Saturn:

This spaceship you can get with the 40% discount now (see perks). It will help establish your control over profitable galactic routes and trade stations, since new pilots (who will come after) will start from the Earth and Mars, passing these ways to the distant stars.

There are some unique possibilities of how you can upgrade your ship, regardless of whether you acquired the ship Nirvana or not. They are available for purchase only here (in perks) and will not be available to other players for purchase in the game itself:

  • Unique Energy Device will help to equip the weaker ship with powerful lasers and shields. (each ship has the limitations on the installation of more powerful lasers and shields and this Energy Device will help to bypass it).
  • Incredible hyperdrive amplifier that will make your jump to the distant stars of the galaxy almost instant (saving your time) and there is no need to stop for refueling at every star on the way to the distant stars.

You can also order the Space station in the orbit of the planets of stars located near by to the solar system. It gives you a profitable financial advantage because all pilots start their journey from the solar system and the probability of trade in goods at your stations near neighboring stars is much higher (note: the owner of the station receives a percentage of the trade of other players at his station).

Agreements governing how you get purchased stations:

  • In the orbit of the planet there can be only one space station
  • If you purchase a station before others, it will be economically profitable as it will be closer to the solar system.

   We achieved the main goal as we have designed the system for a large number of users and managed to create one of the fastest server solutions and our studio succeeded in this.

   How did we achieve this? A significant part of our specialists worked for more than ten years as engineers to improve the speed of Oracle, MS SQL and other databases. Many of us have devoted our lives to creating games and for decades worked as programmers in the computer industry. Some specialists are making programs since the creation of computers Atari and ZX-Spectrum.

   We brought together programmers from different professional areas with the excellent experience in a small but effective studio for creating the games and this is great.

   We always build our work so that you get the expected result at a pre-approved time and not a minute later. And this is our main task.

 

Visit our website: www.ELITE-GAME.com

email: elitegameonline@gmail.com

Follow us on Instagram:  www.instagram.com/elite_game_com

There are some unique possibilities of how you can upgrade your ship, regardless of whether you acquired the ship Nirvana or not. They are available for purchase only here (in perks) and will not be available to other players for purchase in the game itself:


Unique Energy Device will help to equip the weaker ship with powerful lasers and shields. (each ship has the limitations on the installation of more powerful lasers and shields and this Energy Device will help to bypass it).

Incredible hyperdrive amplifier that will make your jump to the distant stars of the galaxy almost instant (saving your time) and there is no need to stop for refueling at every star on the way to the distant stars.

You can also order the Space station in the orbit of the planets of stars located near by to the solar system. It gives you a profitable financial advantage because all pilots start their journey from the solar system and the probability of trade in goods at your stations near neighboring stars is much higher (note: the owner of the station receives a percentage of the trade of other players at his station).
Agreements governing how you get purchased stations:

In the orbit of the planet there can be only one space station
If you purchase a station before others, it will be economically profitable as it will be closer to the solar system.

   We achieved the main goal as we have designed the system for a large number of users and managed to create one of the fastest server solutions and our studio succeeded in this.
   How did we achieve this? A significant part of our specialists worked for more than ten years as engineers to improve the speed of Oracle, MS SQL and other databases. Many of us have devoted our lives to creating games and for decades worked as programmers in the computer industry. Some specialists are making programs since the creation of computers Atari and ZX-Spectrum.
   We brought together programmers from different professional areas with the excellent experience in a small but effective studio for creating the games and this is great.
   We always build our work so that you get the expected result at a pre-approved time and not a minute later. And this is our main task.

 
Visit our website: www.ELITE-GAME.com
email: elitegameonline@gmail.com
Follow us on Instagram:  www.instagram.com/elite_game_com

story:
The game is a character progression RPG game, in which you manage your character’s development. The goal is making your character as strong as possible during the PVP sessions. Of course PVP is not mandatory, playing the game with no PVP at all is a very fun experience too. We want to give you more content than our rivals do, even from the start. Also we are giving special attention to the visual content, we want it to be completely unique and artistic. To avoid any misunderstandings, I’m going to specify some games that are similar to ours: Shakes & Fidget and Zero Hero. These are the ones that worth the mentioning, huge respect to the developers.

You’ll find a lot of innovation in our game, which you can read about below. We don’t follow the ordinary system that represents today’s RPGs, instead we worked out a completely new system for you, so that the game we are working on can give you a unique experience. 

It is very important to mention, that the amount of money we targeted in the campaign is the minimum amount of money for us to keep working on the game, and it only covers the salary of the developers by now. If you want this game published as soon as possible, than we need much more money so we can pay off the developers.
  • You can also help us by sharing the game with your friends, relatives.

***Every visual component of the game is hand made and it requires a lot of hard work and effort.***


You'll have 5 types of stat points, which will bring revolutionary new opportunities:

  • After every level you'll receive 5 stat points (Strange, Agility, Dexterity, Stamina, Critic)
  • You won't have to choose from any classes (for ex.: warrior,defender,rogue,etc.), instead you'll have the opportunity to progress your character in any direction you want

The values will be calculated from the stat points, which will have a very big role in fights.You will have to vary these values if you decide to improve your character in a specific way. We wanted to give the players the opportunity to decide in which way they want to improve their character.

Action points will be needed to enter Common Locations. These have two types:
  • Free: There are 10 free action points and they regenerate in 15 minutes if you use one of them.
  • Premium:  There are 5 premium action points which regenerate faster than the free action points, but only if you have at least one active premium action point.

There will be a lot of equipments and much more will be added soon.

On every level there will be 1488 equipment variations in 5 different rarities.

  • In the future updates we would like to introduce the equipment sets, which will bring much more equipments.
We design character portraits for a lot of tastes, for you to find the one you like the most.
Every armor will have 6 parts and you'll have the opportunity to use your character's hands in any way you wish:

  • One one-handed weapon + shield
  • Two one-handed weapons
  • One two-handed weapon
The armors will be categorized by their material, which means we'll have 6 different armor types.

On bigger levels (20+) you'll have the chance to place gems in your equipments to strengthen them.

(The picture below represents the inventory screen)

  • For example, the character behind the equipment slots was made like this:


The looting will have a big role which will have some consequences:

  • There will be no trading between players, you'll have to fight for your own equipments.
  • We split the fighting in two categories: Common and Dungeon locations. Dungeon locations will have better drop rate. You will have to pay with Dungeon Coins to enter Dungeon locations (You can read about Dungeon Coins below).
(The picture below is just a sketch of the locations tab)

PVP will have a big role:
  • We took PVP very serious and tried to prevent the higher level players from taking advantage of the lower level players
  • Players receive Dungeon Coins from PVP, which can be used to enter Dungeon Locations
  • The PVP will be broken down to 10 levels and the top 10 rated players will receive bonuses from time to time (only if they can remain in their current position)

  • In the future updates we will introduce the portals, which will work on a survival based system, for high drop rates in exchange


The team building will take place in camps, which will work roughly the same as in other web based RPGs.

-  There will be buildings with the opportunity of upgrading of them (this will affect the players inside the camp in every aspect)

-  Inside the camps you'll have the chance of taking part in Dungeon Raides, where you'll able to get very powerful equipments


To prevent cheating the game is completely online. We put big effort in online security and tried to achieve low mobile traffic requirements to play the game. We also put hard work in balancing the strength gap between the players, so that high level players won't have the chance to farm low level players, thus balancing the PVP too.


Gold is only needed to buy premium content, we give no premium content in terms of character strengthening. You can earn gold by completing quests or purchase:

What can you buy?

How much does it cost? (Gold)

Instant fight

10

Regain instantly 5 action points

100

Unlock premium action points for 7 days

400

Regain instantly all action points

150

Instant PVP

50

Complete STAT reset

1000

If you want to see this game published as soon as possible (we are working enormously hard to finish the game), than please donate. We guarantee that we will put maximum effort in this game, just like we've done by now, so that we can give you the best game experience possible. As you can see we are lacking some graphical content. This is the main reason why we choose to start this campaign.

The target amount is the minimum for us to keep working on the game. The more money we can get, the faster it will be for us to finish and publish the game, with the most and best content possible.

Android is not our final destination in terms of publishing. In the future we want to publish the game on iOS, Web and PC too, but we need a lot of money to do so.


Humans are the most ancient creatures created by the gods . Gods were uncapable of mastering magic, thus making men strong against sorcery, and strengthening their physical power.

Time was passing by and other creatures began to appear. They did master magic fairly easy and were always unfriendly with men. This was caused by a wise Elf who foretold that men will be the cause of extinction for them.To keep the balance between the races the gods were always standing on their own creatures sides, but did not share their might and power with them, they only helped them when they needed it.

Men started to desire their gods power, and to fight with their weapons. This rebellion caused the gods to leave the humanity on it’s own. During the rebellion men managed to steal some divine weapon and armor from the gods, but only a few warriors could use it, so these equipments were scattered around the world over a few generations.

They did manage to win the battles against the magical creatures, but soon another threat began to rise.

Hell’s creatures began to spread because of the bad human souls, also their world under the surface was too small for them. They took away a lot of territory from humans with battles and blood. Because to the aptitude and endurance of the remaining men, humans got strong and used to the menace. They built a decent defence with building camps around the remaining villages. Hell’s creatures built big walls and fortresses to restrain humans from taking their territory back.

Children were trained to fight evil starting from their birth. If a child is old enough, he can join a camp he wishes to, where he can become a legendary warrior. Our story begins here...

story:
Brief Summary

 

If you are a person that loves gaming, comics, fueling your inner nerd, and would love to be a part of something unique, boy do we have a website for you!

HeroGrab started in Seattle, WA by its founder, Mark Reynolds, in hopes to create a fun and competitive user experience that members would be able to participate in events and win awesome products.

With the help and encouragement of many bright minds that share a common belief, HeroGrab is creating a business that is unique and special to its members and fans. With the support from contributors in reaching our campaign goal, HeroGrab will be able to support an amazing product line to offer its members, allow the ability to create a company store with uniquely line of nerd products, ability to support a superior marketing campaign in order share the fun with the world, and support future design /development concepts.

 

How Does it Work?

We wanted to make an environment that was simple to understand and allow our members to jump in and have fun right away. This is done by simply signing up to become a member, acquiring a Grab Pack and participate in any event you would like.

The Main Event is where you can win the amazing products that were voted on by members and currently available to win. This is done by being the last person to Grab a product before the timer hits 0.

Each time you place a grab it will display your username as the next winner. The Main Event timer starts at 30-minutes and counts down to zero. Once the timer is below 1 minute, the timer resets to 1 minute each time a member presses the Grab button. This allows another user the opportunity to grab if interested. To increase the skill difficulty, the more grabs that are placed in a single event and the more activity the main event receives, the less time is applied on the clock. Allowing skilled players and hot items to be won faster.

HeroGrab also has created 2 other unique and exclusive interactive features, the Battle Arena and Epic Item Unlock. Each Grab credit used applies damage to the HeroGrab Monster in the Boss Battle Arena. The more time that remains on the clock when the Grab button is placed, the more damage is applied and the quicker the boss is defeated. But be careful! Lack of member damage activity allows the boss monster's time to heal up before being attacked again, so stay engaged and work together to take down the monsters. Each Grab also helps HeroGrab unlock the next Epic Item (A rare and high-value item that will be moved to the main event and rewarded to a future skilled member.

 

Other Sweet Features

We built in a voting system for you to participate in and ensure HeroGrab products are what you want every time!

We built an alert system so you can be notified when the product you want to win is now listed on the main event!

We love when our members win, so we have a few locations where we display our recent HeroGrab winners and High Score members.

Main Event Product Line Up -

All products that are listed on HeroGrab will always compete against one another, and the members are the ones who vote to control which one will win. In order for us to offer an amazing product lineup, we need the help of you to make that possible.

We will use these funds to get the starting products on the site and prepared to be won by our members!

Company Store and Products -

We will also be launching our own company store that will sell HeroGrab branded products to show off to all your friends as well as some unique loot you know and love. Some of the products we will be creating are Shirts, Phone Cases, cups, sweaters, gamer gear, comic books, and more.

These funds will help support the customized design, development, printing and stock supplies needed in order to get this portion of the site off the ground.

Marketing Campaign -

These funds will help use launch multiple social media and local marketing campaigns, to include videos, banners, and even our own live streaming Twitch.tv account. With each of these campaigns, we will be giving away a ton of free stuff and exclusive offers.

If we don't meet our goal number, that's ok! We are just as invested in this project as you are. We will still make sure the items above will be completed eventually, it just may mean that it will take a little longer to deliver than expected.

 

The Impact

We put in the time, drive, and preparation to start this business. From countless hours in designing, to internal web development and customized functionality, we will be ready to launch this experience soon. With your help, we will launch it even sooner than expected and offer our members an amazing list of products to ensure its excitement and success.

 

I (Mark) have been fortunate enough that for a majority of my career, I have been able to assist in the growth and development of some amazing project outputs for some of the top companies in the world. On top of developing solutions and ensuring that project development is met by the expected deadlines.

I have an ability to simplify complex ideas, articulate forecasted project milestones, and produce results that exceed the original standards while improving the team's morale and productivity. I believe that this will give me a unique outlook on this business adventure and surpass my original vision and dreams.

 

The Team

 

Funding Perks

 

Other Ways To Support HeroGrab

Like our pages and subscribe to our updates:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HeroGrabisAwesome/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Hero_Grab
Linkin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/herograb
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/herograb/
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/herograb/
Twitch.tv: https://www.twitch.tv/herograb

Share this with others you think will enjoy our website.

Become a member once the site is live at www.HeroGrab.com

story:
Hello, we are small team called Empty Inventory. We are here on IndieGoGo to show you a glimpse of our upcoming game: Blue Traces In Outer Space. It's a 2D Spacesim with visual novel elements. Keep in mind that what you are about to witness is only an early prototype of the game and the sprites and gameplay are subject to change throughout development, however, we assure you that this will be at least somewhat similar to the final product.

 

 

Blue Traces is set in a bleak neo-80s cyberpunk future where large megacorporations colonize space and use proxy political factions to influence and control society for their personal gain. You play as a simple mercenary in the criminal underworld trying to scrape together a living in an oversaturated and dangerous market who somehow gets tangled into a mess of threads involving some of the most powerful players in the galaxy.

 

 

In terms of gameplay, our main design philosophy is to create a varied and interesting experience through different gameplay styles and endings. We want building combat strength to not be the only choice the player has, thus we’ll incorporate more story and relationship choices besides combat. If you want to get an idea of how the game will play, think Space Rangers 2 with a few elements from FTL just with a more cyberpunk and dystopian atmosphere.

 

 

Currently, our team is working on pure enthusiasm alone, because of this development isn’t nearly as fast as it could be. We will use the money to pay our artists and fully focus on the game.

 

2k - Redrawn Trailer\Short demo

Everything redrawn and new sprites by paid artists. Gameplay trailer showcasing most of the features and close to final artstyle of the game. Possible playable short demo.

27k - Initial

Absolute minimum for half a year of development.

  • 3k - Gamedesign - food, bills.
  • 3k - Programming -  food, bills.
  • 2k - Music - recording studio, food, bills
  • 10k - Graphics, hardware, food, bills.
  • 5k - Possible Steam charges
  • 4k - Unexpected and other.

35k - Mac, iOS, Android

Buying Apple hardware, optimization for mobile devices.

40k - Survival mode

Additional hardcore mode balanced around costs and expenses of everything.

50k - Your companion walks with you and adds unique dialogue options.

Additional animations and writing.

100k - Female main character.

Story from a different perspective. Gotta do some research, lots of additional writing.

Backer Rewards

story:
OVERVIEW

Fantasy Dimension is:

* Dark Fantasy Theme - no disneyland, no japan.

* Turn Based Tactical Combat - fight groups of enemies, plan every move, choose from variety skills and spells.

* Party Based - specialize up to 6 characters.

* Freedom Character Creation - no classes, create own by mixing any skills and spells.

* 100% Line Art - two color illustration graphics like in old books.

* Imagination - no computer effects, played like a paper game.

* 5 Difficulty Modes - changeable during play.

* Multiplatform - browser based, Windows, Linux, Mac, Android, iOS.

* FREE - ads based.


GAMEPLAY

Game starts with party creation. Player chooses unique traits (they are not available in later progress) and starting skills or spells, for up to 6 characters.

In the town, party buy and sell items, learn or extend skills and spells for experience points, and visit some places. When each member is prepared for combat, they leave main gates, choose 1 of 5 difficulty modes and location type to travel. There is a chance that before they meet the enemy, some event may occur.

On the battlefield, there is turn based combat, divided into whole turns and their phases. On each phase, player or enemy choose 1 of their unused members to do 1 action, which can be basic attack, defense, use of item, use of skill or use of spell. Each skill and spell can be used once per certain number of turns. Side which has more available characters, may have more than 1 move in their phase. After all characters on the battlefield have been used, new turn begins. Winning the battle will result in coins, items and experience points. If player will lost 1 or more party members, then new ones can be recruited in the town. 

To progress each character, player can spend experience points on learning new skills and spells, or extend current. Freedom in character creation allows every party member to have access to any knowledge. There are multi level skills and spells, but most of them do not depend on others to learn. The only thing that can make each character to be more unique are traits set at the beginning.

Gameplay Video - Combat In The Forest:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=puF8OAlTLd0

Gameplay Video - Combat In The Crypt:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PZIFfDDkiNA



GOALS

* 500$ - guaranteed release, faster progress, base game, forest/fields location and enemies.

* 600$ - cementery/crypt location and enemies.

* 800$ - cave/dungeon location and enemies.

* 1000$ - mountains/desert location and enemies.

* 1200$ - swamp/lake location and enemies.

* 1400$ - fortress/ruins location and enemies.

* more - even faster progress, possible extension updates in the future.


BACKERS

* 0$ - advertisements, 1 save game slot, public beta state access.

* 1$ - thanks!

* 10$ - no advertisements, 10 save game slots, early alpha access, suggesting ideas to the game for consideration (skills, spells, enemies, items, locations, events, traits).

* 100$ - same as before, but with name in game credits with optional link


FUNDS

Funds going for time spent on programming part and server upkeep costs.


RISKS AND CHALLENGES

I am independent programmer since late 90s, long time experienced with web programming in various languages and technologies (JavaScript/PHP/Ajax/ActionScript/Flash). I know technical limitations and server requirements after working on many commercial and completed projects.

Early alpha access for basic game with forest/fields location should be available for backers within a month, and public beta within a month later. Each new location (guaranteed if funded) should be available within another month later. There are always possible delays, so please be patient.

Remember that game is browser based. Your game progress will be stored on a server with daily backup. There is always very small chance for server technical malfunction (not available), but I am using professional hosts with quick response to such situations. Used system is flexible, but I will run additional resources if needed.


FAQ

Requirements?
It is a browser based game, so any computer or device with internet access and modern internet browser like Chrome or FireFox. Game will work on Windows XP or later, Mac, Linux, Android, iOS, and probably something else.

Multiplayer?
In current base version, no. There are plans in near future, if the game will get enough interest.

Release date?
Early alpha state with forest/fields location within a month for backers. Public beta state within a month later. Each new location (guaranteed if funded) within another month later. Some delays are always possible.

How long this game will be supported?
If minimum for base game will be funded, then 2 years of support are guaranteed. Later, if this game will still get noticable positive response from current and arriving new users, there is no reason to kill it. It will be a reason for new extension updates. It is also possible that it might be released as standard desktop and mobile game.

story:
PC game for Windows


Main goal:

$10,000 - Improved graphics:

We will hire an artist to work with us throughout the entire development process and purchase all the required materials. He will work hard to replace all the existing art in the game and will be responsible for creating new graphical elements, which means we will dedicate more of our time to programming the game. Currently we have a limited amount of building models, which is why many of them repeat in different districts of the city. Moreover, even those models leave a lot to be desired. However, with the help of an artist, we will be able to diversify the city and make it look more alive. The result will be improved graphics and animations of the game.

A comparison of graphics:


Story:

The main character in this game is a lonely emigrant from a country where it is near impossible to find a job. Without family or friends to support him, his only choice is to leave his country and go abroad looking for better opportunities. Our hero has worked honestly and responsibly until one day the economic crisis caught up with him even here. An entire country is hit by a crisis and faces a default. People are losing their jobs, businesses close and our hero is laid off and left with no roof over his head and no without possibility to secure his livelihood. He has no choice but to adapt and seek new ways of surviving below the poverty line.


Game mechanics:

To Do List

Let me give you an example of how the demand system works. Let us look at the demand for food. If the demand for food is not saturated for a long time it leads to starvation. A prolonged state of starvation leads to one of the three states, one of which is debility. Debility is an evolution of a physical demand. Debility may lead to a loss of consciousness, evolution of the sleep demand or it can worsen the psychological state of the character. The evolution of the sleep demand, in turn, leads to a further worsening of the emotional and physical states of the character. The evolution of the psychological state of the character leads to a further worsening of the psychological state, which may cause panic, meltdown, random mood swings, hallucinations and so on. All of these states will be more comprehensible in-game than they appear in reading.

What we have as a result is a system, where each of the demands that character has influences all other demands. Food saturation affects physical strength, physical strength affects the demand for sleep, sleep affects psychological state. 

Demand system PDF


About the project:

Help us improve this game!

Currently two people handle the development of this game, in our free time. This game will be finished regardless of the funds we manage to raise, and we will do our best to expand the game by adding additional game mechanics. However, with your support we will get the opportunity to improve the graphics, sound effects, get more people working on this game and dedicate more time to its development.

Currently our team is missing an artist and the necessary equipment, however, what we do have is the desire to make something new and original.

The price of this game is 1$ not because little time and love is invested into it, but because we are not professional game developers. It is not our intention to delude or misinform people. Our goal is to create the game and we will accomplish that goal no matter what.


Obstacles:

  • Two people handle the development of this project and we are learning things as we go.
  • Lack of hardware (camera for graphics, microphone for sounds, and a screen that is not held together with duct tape).
  • Lack of free time.

These are the main obstacles in our way, but we do not intend to let them stop us. With your help these obstacles can be overcome.


Stretch goals:

$11,200 - Improved sound effects:

We will replace all the sound effects in the game. We will no longer have to use free sounds that we find on the Internet that do not always fit our game. Instead, we will be able to purchase all the necessary sound effects or record them in a studio if we do not manage to find them.

$14,200 - We will purchase additional hardware, which is required for game development:

We will purchase one additional PC, a camera, proper lightning and a microphone.

$38,600 - We will hire additional members and dedicate most of our time to game development


What is not affected by your donations:

  • The game will be released no matter what
  • The number of game mechanics
  • Our desire to improve the game

story:
The Call of Liriel is an indie RPG game inspired on 90's first-person party-based free movement RPGs. Main inspiration from classics Might and Magic 6,7,8 and Wizardry 8. Over the past few years, all the first-person RPGs developed by the big companies were either solo (no party), or grid movement (no free movement). This is a game that recovers the first-person party-based free movement RPG.

We have already developed most of the main gameplay features. We have advanced far, but there is still much to do. We need your help supporting this campaign so we can dedicate ourselves full time to this fantastic (and huge!) project.


  • 90's first-person party-based free movement RPG look with modern 3D graphics
  • Open world (sandbox) game with an epic story going on in the background
  • Custom realtime with pause combat (similar to turn based combat)
  • 9 different professions to select from
  • Character leveling and skills proficiency
  • Spells divided in different magic schools (around 50 different spells with the 3rd funding goal)
  • Different monsters and creatures to battle with (around 35 different creatures with the 5th funding goal)
  • Weapons animations while attacking
  • Speaking characters
  • Day/time cycle and weather system
  • Platforms: Windows, Mac & Linux

 

You are a party of four novice monster hunters looking for your next adventure. You heard about an island where inhabitants are terrorized by a group of giant spiders. You travel there to start your epic monster hunter career. Things will become increasingly complicated as you join the battle between light and dark forces!

 

We have developed most of the main gameplay systems but there are some remaining to be done. For the campaign we defined a fixed goal of $8,000, matching the first delivery. This will ensure that we can deliver an enjoyable experience.

The Call of Liriel will have a number of locations/quests depending the funding goal you help us achieve. After each funding goal date is triggered, we'll release a version you can play. You won't have to wait until our final release date (AUG 2019) to start playing with it.

When the gameplay programming is finished we'll release the source code so anyone can add more content. Also, we are open to receiving help from other first person party-based free movement RPG fans out there that have knowledge of Level designing.

 


FUNDING LEVEL 1 [$ 8,000] -> [MAY 2018]

Main gameplay programming finished (custom realtime with pause combat, magical weapon bonuses, character leveling, learn spells, first level spells, first level 2D spellbook art). Characters with computer generated voices. Enjoyable main island environment and quests.

World size: 1 outdoor location, 2 indoor locations, 3 different creatures.


FUNDING LEVEL 2 [$ 14,000] -> [AUG 2018]

Humans/Elves war quests & locations.

World size (including previous): 5 outdoor locations, 8 indoor locations, around 15 different creatures.

 

FUNDING LEVEL 3 [$ 19,000] -> [NOV 2018]

Remaining spells, magic resistances, minimap and remaining minor features.

World size: no new locations.

 

FUNDING LEVEL 4 [$ 28,000] -> [MAR 2019]

First profession promotions quests & locations.

World size (including previous): 10 outdoor locations, 15 indoor locations, around 25 different creatures.

 

FUNDING LEVEL 5 [$ 49,000] -> [AUG 2019]

Light & Dark quests & locations. Second profession promotions quests & locations. Ending quests & locations.

World size (including previous): 13 outdoor locations, 40 indoor locations, around 35 different creatures.

 

FUNDING LEVEL 6 [$ 52,000] -> [AUG 2019]

Drama school students will perform the voices (English). Texts translations to Spanish, French & Russian.
 

  Diego López Bugna

Game developer & Level designer. Software engineer, started programming on the commodore 128. Game developer since 2015. MM7 lover.
 

  Gabriel Perdomo 

Level designer & 3d artist. Jack of all trades man.
 

MaestroMod images being used for the portrait characters, items and other 2D art.

 

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/The-Call-of-Liriel-198...

VK:
https://vk.com/thecallofliriel

IndieDB:
http://www.indiedb.com/games/the-call-of-liriel

 

Thank you for taking the time to read all this.
Your support is crucial for the project to come to life.
Making this game was always our dream, we want to share it with you.
We'll be forever grateful.

story:
We know there are people like us out there who get inspired by larger than life stories and awestruck by the imaginative thrill of boss fights. What was originally to be a manga or a comic became something much larger once the epiphany struck. “We could make a game out of this” said one of us.. 

 

From that moment we knew exactly what Entropy’s Fall will be –rich characters, massive scale, lore of epic proportions and gigantic boss fights!! But we knew that only the idea will not be enough. To convince you, we had to display our potential and we’ve emptied our pockets to do just that and get the prototype ready. The current trailer at the pre-alpha stage is only a fragment of our vision for what Entropy’s Fall could be.

 
We, at PSS are determined to make Entropy’s Fall a reality and bestow upon all the gamers out there a game which they can relentlessly describe to be one with ONLY BIG BOSS FIGHTS! Take a look at our 1st Official Trailer below:

 
 



⦁    2D Action Adventure
⦁    Single Player
⦁    PC/ Mac/ Linux


Imagine a world where you are the entity, chaos (Kayos- the protagonist) whose existence is randomness. You are wedded to your opposite, Mistress Order who somehow completes you and your purpose. And one day, that purpose is gone. Like a lightning strike, a God (the Guardian) ends your family and happiness. 


On the planet of Entropy, death is just a transfer to the afterlife. Since suicide blocks the gates of afterlife, Kayos will have to wait in agony to see his family again. However, the very thing you crave right now appears in front of you. Justice! The God Tribunal has a task for you…revenge in exchange for 9 innocent lives! Would you serve such a grim purpose? Even if it was just?

But Beware!! Those innocents are the legendary ‘Arafas’ – massive ancient warriors who have never been killed before! So… Will Kayos have revenge? Will The Tribunal have justice? Can the Arafa be beaten? or will it all just lead to Entropy's Fall?

 

 

Music is one of the most crucial aspects for Entropy's Fall. For the prototype, even though we've included Royalty free music we made sure that each track and its position added an impact to the gaming experience. We are thrilled to announce that for the end user version of the game, we have Caleb Blood on board with us who will be composing the full sound track. Check out some of his awesome stuff on his Website:

http://calebblood.com

 


 

Level design puzzles, smooth movement and fast paced platforming mechanics combined with secret areas, rewards and the beautiful world of Entropy to explore will back the game's narrative driven experience.

 

There will be no minions to kill or grinding elements to hold the players back from experiencing the boss fights and mini boss fights that are the highlight of the game.

 

Fast paced, brutal attacks from the gigantic Arafa must be dodged, blocked or countered by Kayos to stay alive. A head-on approach is suicide. Find an edge that will take down the beasts.

 

Each fight will have a unique puzzle to solve and each Arafa has to be defeated in a different way. The AI for each Arafa will vary and respond to the player’s position and actions. 

Beware, you will die. A lot.


The animations and mechanics of Entropy's Fall will give players action like they've never seen in a 2D game before. Climb on the Arafa, exploit their weaknesses and finish them off with epic mini-games.

Who knows what new moves or powers Kayos might unlock after defeating these legendary warriors?


Each victory unlocks unused skill for Kayos. These skills could prove to be major game changers, for example, aerial dodge or hit counters but the player will have limited slots to equip them. Your skillset will define your play-style.  




The planet Entropy is alive. It is a living breathing cosmic deity and the creator of all it's residents. In the world of Entropy's Fall, abstract concepts such as Chaos (Kayos) and Justice (Tribunal) possess physical forms. They are the physical embodiments representing these concepts and abide by the rules of their creator, Entropy. 


The most unpredictable entity on Entropy. The limit of his powers and the purpose of his existence are both unknown and strange.

The loss of his family has forced him to take arms and seek vengeance against 'The Guardian', the one responsible.

Though the Guardian is the protector of  Entropy, Kayos has pledged to help The Tribunal in annihilating him. As to why the Guardian committed such an act remains a mystery.



One of the most respected and powerful Gods of Entropy is justice, The Tribunal.

The judge, jury and on occasion the executioner, the Tribunal has declared war on another God, the Guardian. The 9 legendary Arafa are his targets since they hold parts of the Guardian's soul.

Since direct conflict between the gods is forbidden by Entropy, for reasons unknown, the Tribunal finds it just to unleash Kayos upon Entropy.



Shintaur is one of the 9 legendary Arafa. Protector of the Indigo forests, Shintaur is the beast of honor and duty. He has served the Guardian and Entropy for many wars over the span of thousands of years. 

 

 

The Arafa hold parts of the Guardian's soul and to kill the Guardian, the Arafa must die. However, the Arafa are innocent, all 9 of them. They are colossal, powerful beasts who protect and serve Entropy in times of need. The Arafa are worshiped and respected and killing them not only seems wrong but is considered greatly difficult.  

 

From a design perspective, all the Arafa will be a unique combination of mythical creatures (such as the Centaur) and warriors from history (for example, the Samurai). 

This unique combination unlocks a huge variety of potential Arafas to choose from. Select backers will get to vote  for finalizing future Arafas. Prospective candidates include:

And many many more!!....


Given that we have managed to work almost without a budget in hand, we certainly will be able to fulfill our promise with the required push and support. Although our Indiegogo goal of 98,000$ might come across to be on the higher side on the face of it, but veterans of the gaming industry would vouch that 98,000 $ as the entire budget to complete a game is extremely nominal.

Here is an approximate break-up of utilization of our goal amount:


 

YAY!! Goodies!!

We, at Poor Small Studio, always wanted to insure that our backers don't get disappointed with what we have to offer. We have some pretty cool rewards to offer along with a huge heartfelt thank you for all our backers. Check out the super-cool ones along with a detailed list of all our perks below!!

 

 

From the beginning, the vision for Entropy's Fall has been much larger than what we are aiming to accomplish within our goal of 98,000$. However, we know that asking for anything more than our current goal would require more credibility and a certain amount of experience. Therefore, what we are seeking for is the bare minimum amount that we will require to be able to deliver a quality product and a polished game to our backers that can give them a truly enjoyable experience. 

Still, hope for the best right? Here are some of the goals we set in case we get over-funded:

 

Until the current stage of Entropy’s fall, Poor Small Studio has been a team of two who have borne the brunt (very enthusiastically!) of everything that goes into making of a game; from developing it, to quality assurance, graphics, editing, etc. But we need more people in our team: people who can love Entropy’s Fall with a similar passion, people who are skilled and have the talent to contribute and nurture our lovechild into being a memorable game for everyone.

 

It has been difficult journey so far but we have turned the odds and developed Entropy’s Fall to what it is today. We already have a few people who can help us create what we wish to, but we lack financial resources. Once we have that, we are more than confident that we will not disappoint you and deliver what we promise!

 

We understand that some of you might like Entropy’s Fall but are not able to back us with your contribution…  firstly, we thank you for appreciating our work!!!

..

And secondly, we have GOOD NEWS!!! You can still contribute by spreading a word about Entropy’s Fall in your circle of family, friends and social network. Contribute your social network instead of money! Even if we are able to reach one backer through your support, it will help us a lot!! Just click on the Indiegogo share tools and shout out to your peeps on facebook, twitter, instagram, google+, snapchat, etc.!

 

Sugam Kher is a college drop out and a tech and gaming enthusiast who has devoted everything into making this game. He's solely responsible for Character Design, Animation, Music Design, A.I. Programming and Lighting for Entropy's Fall. A former musician, science lover and a regular gamer. He worked as a game tester for Ubisoft India for 2 years before he started out as an Indie.
 

Vansh is an 18-year-old who wanted to be a game developer since he first heard of such a profession. He is solely responsible for Sound Effects, Lead Level Design, Particles and Camera work for Entropy's Fall. Apart from working on the game Vansh likes taking part in a lot of MUNs (Model United Nations) and in his free time be the gamer that he is. He also likes reading manga and watching animes.

 

Sejal Parashar is a lawyer with masters in Intellectual Property with a bunch of experience in taxation. Her efficiency and organized work ethics are what carry the burden of an otherwise chilled-out team of PSS to the finish line. She's handled the PR and Marketing for the game on a 0$ budget. Away from work she likes to dance, chill and hang out with Sugam.

 

  1. Is there going to be multi-player or co-op?

We do plan to launch a Multi-player version but only if we get over-funded to a large extent. So it is safe to assume that for now, Entropy’s Fall will be a single player experience. We do not plan to have co-op features in the game.  

  1. What platforms will the game be released on? Will there be a DRM-free option? 

With the current funding amount, the game will be released for PC/MAC/Linux. Xbox One and PS4 versions are planned as over-funding goals.

Entropy’s Fall will be completely DRM-free.

  1. What will the international shipping costs for the physical rewards be?

International Shipping Costs are not included in the perk amount and will be payable by the backer at the time of shipment of the physical awards. We will get in touch with the backer and send them a link to pay for shipping at the time of dispatch.

Shipping rates will depend on the location of the backer and the product. It will range from 10$ - 20$.

  1. What will be the delivery date for digital content (wallpapers, digital art, etc.)?

Desktop wallpapers will be delivered to the backers by July 2017. All other digital content such as OST, Manual/ Guide, etc. will be delivered at the time of release approximately in November 2018.

  1. How confident are you in your delivery date?

Game development is a very difficult task and requires a lot of planning and foresight and you can never predict unforeseen circumstances that may cause delays in the game's release. That being said, we at PSS have gained some experience while developing the prototype and are confident that we will deliver the product on the mentioned date.

  1. If I live outside India and want to add on an additional tier, do I have to pay the additional tier’s shipping fee?

No.

  1. Can I upgrade my pledge later?

Yes.

  1. Will there be a physical release of the game after it comes out?

No physical copies are planned as yet.

  1. What about customs for international shipping?

We would suggest that you inquire about the customs before ordering a perk with physical goods in it. Given that we are looking to ship our rewards all over the world, it is difficult for us to comment on the customs situation in each country. In case you are unsure about the custom duty implication, we advise that you avoid the perks with physical content in it. However, if you are interested to back us with a particular perk containing physical rewards, you can get in touch with us and we will work out something to offer you instead of the physical reward.

For any other queries, please write to us as poorsmallstudio@gmail.com and we will get back to you at the earliest!
story_txt: We know there are people like us out there who get inspired by larger than life stories and awestruck by the imaginative thrill of boss fights. What was originally to be a manga or a comic became something much larger once the epiphany struck. “We could make a game out of this” said one of us..  From that moment we knew exactly what Entropy’s Fall will be –rich characters, massive scale, lore of epic proportions and gigantic boss fights!! But we knew that only the idea will not be enough. To convince you, we had to display our potential and we’ve emptied our pockets to do just that and get the prototype ready. The current trailer at the pre-alpha stage is only a fragment of our vision for what Entropy’s Fall could be. We, at PSS are determined to make Entropy’s Fall a reality and bestow upon all the gamers out there a game which they can relentlessly describe to be one with ONLY BIG BOSS FIGHTS! Take a look at our 1st Official Trailer below:  ⦁    2D Action Adventure⦁    Single Player⦁    PC/ Mac/ LinuxImagine a world where you are the entity, chaos (Kayos- the protagonist) whose existence is randomness. You are wedded to your opposite, Mistress Order who somehow completes you and your purpose. And one day, that purpose is gone. Like a lightning strike, a God (the Guardian) ends your family and happiness. On the planet of Entropy, death is just a transfer to the afterlife. Since suicide blocks the gates of afterlife, Kayos will have to wait in agony to see his family again. However, the very thing you crave right now appears in front of you. Justice! The God Tribunal has a task for you…revenge in exchange for 9 innocent lives! Would you serve such a grim purpose? Even if it was just?But Beware!! Those innocents are the legendary ‘Arafas’ – massive ancient warriors who have never been killed before! So… Will Kayos have revenge? Will The Tribunal have justice? Can the Arafa be beaten? or will it all just lead to Entropy's Fall?  Music is one of the most crucial aspects for Entropy's Fall. For the prototype, even though we've included Royalty free music we made sure that each track and its position added an impact to the gaming experience. We are thrilled to announce that for the end user version of the game, we have Caleb Blood on board with us who will be composing the full sound track. Check out some of his awesome stuff on his Website:http://calebblood.com  Level design puzzles, smooth movement and fast paced platforming mechanics combined with secret areas, rewards and the beautiful world of Entropy to explore will back the game's narrative driven experience. There will be no minions to kill or grinding elements to hold the players back from experiencing the boss fights and mini boss fights that are the highlight of the game. Fast paced, brutal attacks from the gigantic Arafa must be dodged, blocked or countered by Kayos to stay alive. A head-on approach is suicide. Find an edge that will take down the beasts. Each fight will have a unique puzzle to solve and each Arafa has to be defeated in a different way. The AI for each Arafa will vary and respond to the player’s position and actions. Beware, you will die. A lot.The animations and mechanics of Entropy's Fall will give players action like they've never seen in a 2D game before. Climb on the Arafa, exploit their weaknesses and finish them off with epic mini-games.Who knows what new moves or powers Kayos might unlock after defeating these legendary warriors?Each victory unlocks unused skill for Kayos. These skills could prove to be major game changers, for example, aerial dodge or hit counters but the player will have limited slots to equip them. Your skillset will define your play-style.  The planet Entropy is alive. It is a living breathing cosmic deity and the creator of all it's residents. In the world of Entropy's Fall, abstract concepts such as Chaos (Kayos) and Justice (Tribunal) possess physical forms. They are the physical embodiments representing these concepts and abide by the rules of their creator, Entropy. The most unpredictable entity on Entropy. The limit of his powers and the purpose of his existence are both unknown and strange.The loss of his family has forced him to take arms and seek vengeance against 'The Guardian', the one responsible.Though the Guardian is the protector of  Entropy, Kayos has pledged to help The Tribunal in annihilating him. As to why the Guardian committed such an act remains a mystery.One of the most respected and powerful Gods of Entropy is justice, The Tribunal.The judge, jury and on occasion the executioner, the Tribunal has declared war on another God, the Guardian. The 9 legendary Arafa are his targets since they hold parts of the Guardian's soul.Since direct conflict between the gods is forbidden by Entropy, for reasons unknown, the Tribunal finds it just to unleash Kayos upon Entropy.Shintaur is one of the 9 legendary Arafa. Protector of the Indigo forests, Shintaur is the beast of honor and duty. He has served the Guardian and Entropy for many wars over the span of thousands of years.   The Arafa hold parts of the Guardian's soul and to kill the Guardian, the Arafa must die. However, the Arafa are innocent, all 9 of them. They are colossal, powerful beasts who protect and serve Entropy in times of need. The Arafa are worshiped and respected and killing them not only seems wrong but is considered greatly difficult.   From a design perspective, all the Arafa will be a unique combination of mythical creatures (such as the Centaur) and warriors from history (for example, the Samurai). This unique combination unlocks a huge variety of potential Arafas to choose from. Select backers will get to vote  for finalizing future Arafas.
